Meƒëutim, potrebna su dodatna istra≈æivanja u koja ƒáe se ukljuƒçiti unos razliƒçite koliƒçine energije te razliƒçiti oblici tjelovje≈æbi.                             Komentari                             Povezani ƒçlanci
translation: Cheese proteins also useful to women's whey proteins as dietary supplements in combination with exercise positively affect the construction of muscle mass in women just like in men, new research has shown. Until recently, whey proteins were assumed to lead to an undesirable increase in body weight in women, but scientists have been able to prove with recent research that this dietary supplement can still help with their definition of muscle mass. Scientists have examined 1800 papers and found 13 relevant research on this topic with 28 control groups. Healthy women participated in research that lasted at least 6 weeks, and scientists have studied data on their consumption of whey proteins, exercise and changes in body weight. It has been found that dietary supplement proteins can still help women improve the body composition, although modestly, especially if it reduces energy intake to lose body weight. However, additional studies are required to include intake of different amounts of energy and different forms of exercise. Comments related articles

It has been found that dietary supplement proteins can still help women improve the body composition, although modestly, especially if it reduces energy intake to lose body weight.  However, additional studies are required to include intake of different amounts of energy and different forms of exercise.  Comments  Related articles

What the zucchini are in the summer, these are pumpkins for us in the fall!The perfect fruit you can prepare in so many different ways that we sometimes fail to repeat the same meal in one season!

text: SADR≈ΩAJ                             Drama. Tridesete godine u Njemaƒçkoj, doba je Weimarske Republike. ƒåokoladni magnat i ruski emigrant Hermann Hermann (D. Bogarde) polako ali sigurno tone u ludilo. Kako Njemaƒçka nije tako gostoljubiva kao prije, Hermann sanja o bijegu od svega. Poƒçelo je s do≈æivljajima napu≈°tanja vlastitoga tijela kad vodi ljubav sa svojom ≈æenom Lydiom (A. Ferr√©ol), pri ƒçemu on sjedi u stolcu i sve to promatra. Slijedili su ispadi s radnicima, poslovnim partnerima i neznancima... Ton ovoga filma je ironiƒçan kao ≈°to je u istoimenom romanu Vladimira Nabokova prema kojem je scenarij napisao poznati britanski dramatiƒçar, rodom ƒåeh, Tom Stoppard. Na festivalu u Cannesu 1978. redatelj Rainer Werner Fassbinder nominiran je za Zlatu palmu. Iste je godine u Njemaƒçkoj film dobio tri nagrade: za najboljeg redatelja, fotografiju i produkciju.                             Fotografije                             Recenzije
translation: The contents of the drama. In the thirties in Germany, the time of the Weimar Republic. Chocolate magnate and Russian emigrant Hermann Hermann (D. Bogarde) slowly but surely sinking into madness. As Germany is not as hospitable as before, Hermann dreams of the escape from everything. It began with the experiences of leaving his own body when he made love with his wife Lydio (A. Ferr√©ol), with he sits in a chair and watching it all. The outbursts of workers, business partners and strangers followed ... The tone of this film is ironic as in the novel of the same name by Vladimir Nabokov, according to which the scenario was written by a well -known British playwright, a native Czech, Tom Stoppard. At the 1978 Cannes Festival, director Rainer Werner Fassbinder was nominated for Zlata Palma. In the same year, the movie received three awards in Germany: for the best director, photography and production. Photos of reviews

text: O klubu                             Klub za starije osobe ‚ÄûMari≈°ka‚Äú neprofitna je i nevladina organizacija, upisana u Registar udruga Republike Hrvatske i samostalna u svome djelovanju. Klub su osnovali zaposlenici Doma za starije i nemoƒáne osobe Koprivnica, u ƒçijim prostorima Klub djeluje, a na inicijativu upravo sada≈°njih ƒçlanova Kluba.                             Klub ‚ÄûMari≈°ka‚Äú svoje ime dobio je po Mari≈°ki Holoubek Funjak, poznatoj koprivniƒçkoj glazbenici maƒëarskog podrijetla, koja je cijeli svoj ≈æivot pomagala drugima, svirala s brojnim profesionalnim i amaterskim glazbenicima i pouƒçavala mlade, a svoju najveƒáu popularnost stekla u sastavu ‚ÄûMari≈°ka band‚Äú. Klub je osnovan u ƒçast i sjeƒáanje na legendarnu baku Mari≈°ku, koja je svojom energijom i ljubavlju prema ≈æivotu pokazala kako je i starost ≈æivotno doba koje se mo≈æe pro≈æivjeti na aktivan i zdrav naƒçin.                             Klub provodi aktivnosti vezane uz osmi≈°ljavanje, organiziranje i provoƒëenje programa i projekata usmjerenih na pobolj≈°anje kvalitete ≈æivota starijih osoba i drugih skupina u riziku od socijalne iskljuƒçenosti te sadr≈æaja i aktivnosti vezanih uz organizirano kori≈°tenje slobodnog vremena (sportsko-rekreativne, kulturno-umjetniƒçke, kreativne, dru≈°tvene, zabavne i sliƒçne aktivnosti), organizira struƒçna predavanja iz podruƒçja djelatnosti Kluba, a naroƒçito iz podruƒçja gerontologije, socijalne i zdravstvene za≈°tite, programe cjelo≈æivotnog uƒçenja (teƒçajeve, seminare, edukacije).                             Klub pru≈æa savjetodavnu pomoƒá i podr≈°ku, prati stanje ljudskih prava, naroƒçito prava starijih osoba te poduzima akcije i inicijative vezane uz promicanje ljudskih prava i socijalne pravde, organizira tribine, okrugle stolove i druge struƒçne skupove vezane uz razvoj civilnog dru≈°tva, promociju dru≈°tvene solidarnosti, razvoj socijalne djelatnosti, za≈°tite zdravlja i drugih podruƒçja od interesa Kluba, kao i razmjene iskustava i primjera dobre prakse, izdaje publikacije (ƒçasopise, vodiƒçe, bro≈°ure i sl.) iz podruƒçja djelatnosti Kluba, provodi istra≈æivanja vezana uz procjenu stanja i probleme starije populacije i prati zakonsku regulativu vezanu uz starije osobe, sudjeluje u javnom zagovaranju te predla≈æe izmjene i dopune zakona i propisa, u interesu pobolj≈°anja dru≈°tvene brige i skrbi za starije osobe.                             Jedna od glavnih aktivnosti Kluba vezana je uz organiziranje, pru≈æanje i razvijanje socijalnih usluga (pomoƒá u kuƒái, halo pomoƒá, usluge prijevoza), kao i drugih usluga i pomoƒá iz podruƒçja socijalne djelatnosti, u skladu sa Zakonom o socijalnoj skrbi i drugim propisima, kao i poduzimanje akcija senzibiliziranja i podizanja svijesti javnosti i vlasti o potrebama i problemima starije populacije te moguƒánostima njihovog rje≈°avanja.                             Podruƒçja djelovanja Kluba sukladno Statutu su: socijalna djelatnost, za≈°tita zdravlja, kultura i umjetnost, obrazovanje i istra≈æivanje, ljudska prava, meƒëunarodna suradnja, demokratska politiƒçka kultura, za≈°tita okoli≈°a i sport.
translation: The club for the elderly "Mariska" club is a non -profit and non -governmental organization, enrolled in the Register of Associations of the Republic of Croatia and independent in its activities. The club was founded on June 12, 2002 and operates in the area of ‚Äã‚ÄãKoprivnica-Kri≈æevci County, with the aim of gathering the older population and designing activities for the best possible implementation of their free time and taking actions aimed at solving the problem and the needs of this population, respecting all their options , needs and affinities. The club was founded by the employees of the Home for the Elderly and Disabled Koprivnica, in whose premises the club operates, and at the initiative of the current members of the club. The Mariska Club was named after Mariska Holoubek Funjak, a well -known Koprivnica musician of Hungarian descent, who helped his life all his life with many professional and amateur musicians and taught young people, and gained his greatest popularity in the "Mariska Band". The club was founded in honor and memory of the legendary grandmother Mari≈°ka, who, through her energy and love for life, showed that the age of the life age that can be experienced in an active and healthy way. The club is carried out by activities related to the design, organizing and implementation of programs and projects aimed at improving the quality of life of the elderly and other groups at risk of social exclusion and content related to organized use of leisure time (sports and recreational, cultural and artistic, creative, social , entertaining and similar activities), organizes professional lectures in the field of club activity, and especially in the field of gerontology, social and health care, lifelong learning programs (courses, seminars, education). The club provides advisory assistance and support, follows the state of human rights, especially the rights of the elderly, and takes action and initiatives related to the promotion of human rights and social justice, organizes stands, round tables and other professional gatherings related to civil society development, promotion of social solidarity, development Social activities, health protection and other areas of the club's interests, as well as exchanges of experience and examples of good practice, publishes publications (magazines, guides, brochures, etc.) in the field of club activities, conducting research related to the assessment of the situation and problems of the older population and follows The legal regulation related to the elderly participates in public complication and proposes to amendments to law and regulations, in the interest of improving social care and care for the elderly. One of the main activities of the club is related to the organization, provision and development of social services (home assistance, halo assistance, transportation services), as well as other services and assistance in the field of social activity, in accordance with the Social Welfare Act and other regulations, as And taking action to sensitize and raise public awareness and authorities about the needs and problems of the older population and the possibilities of solving them. The area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe club's activity in accordance with the Statute are: social activity, health protection, culture and art, education and research, human rights, international cooperation, democratic political culture, environmental protection and sport.

text: Ga≈æenje principa kao jeftina medijska strategija                             Kad je vrijeme u godini kad ima najmanje vijesti? Kolovoz/august. ≈†to rade novinari kad ostanu bez vijesti?                             Zovu Boru ƒêorƒëeviƒáa da im ka≈æe kada ƒáe nastupati u Zagrebu, a oni, valjda njemu zauzvrat uplate listiƒá (tiket) na 4 para. Ukratko to je sa≈æetak priƒçe u kojoj se ƒêorƒëeviƒá, nekako u isto doba ukazuje u medijima te malo potpali vatru na vjeƒçnu temu srpsko-hrvatskih odnosa.                             Konkretno, nedavno je uskoƒçio jednom srpskom listu s izjavom da postoji ideja o nastupu u Zagrebu, i da bi mu bila ƒçast ako se to dogodi. Posljednji put je takva priƒça bila aktivna pred Schengenfest 2012., kada je jedan od glavnih izvoƒëaƒça upravo bio ƒêorƒëeviƒáev sastav Riblja ƒçorba. Nedugo nakon toga ƒåorba je izdala novi album, tako da cijela halabuka podsjeƒáa samo na dobru reklamnu strategiju iz interesa s bud≈æetom od jako malo eura.                             Ili ne? Insajderi bliski organizatorima koncerata ka≈æu da se potiho, svo ovo vrijeme, uistinu pregovara o koncertu Riblje ƒçorbe u Zagrebu. A znate kako zavr≈°ava priƒça u kojoj djeƒçak stalno viƒçe: ‚ÄúVuk!‚Äù? Na kraju se vuk pojavi i nikog ne bude briga, tako da mo≈æda ƒåorba i doƒëe u Zagreb. I nikog ne bude briga?
translation: Pushing principles as a cheap media strategy when is the time of the year when there is the least news? August/August. What do journalists do when they run out of news? They call Boro Djordjevic to tell them when they will perform in Zagreb, and they, I guess in return, pays him a leaf on 4 pairs. In short, this is a summary of the story in which Djordjevic, somehow, appears in the media at the same time and fell a little fire on the eternal topic of Serbo-Croatian relations. In particular, he recently jumped in a Serbian list with a statement that there was an idea of ‚Äã‚Äãperforming in Zagreb, and that it would be his honor if that happened. The last time such a story was active before Schengenfest 2012, when one of the main performers was Djordjevic's composition of a fishing broth. Shortly afterwards, Corba released a new album, so the whole halabuk reminds only a good advertising strategy out of interest with a budget of very little euros. Or not? Insiders close to the organizers of the concert say that he is quietly, all this time, really negotiating a concert of a fish broth in Zagreb. And you know how the story ends in which the boy constantly shouts, "Wolf!"? In the end, the wolf appears and no one cares, so maybe Corba came to Zagreb. And no one cares?

Or not?Insiders close to the organizers of the concert say that he is quietly, all this time, really negotiating a concert of a fish broth in Zagreb.And you know how the story ends in which the boy constantly shouts, "Wolf!"?In the end, the wolf appears and no one cares, so maybe Corba came to Zagreb.And no one cares?

text: Tko osvaja majicu Drugi par rukava                             Odu≈°evljeni rijeƒçkom povije≈°ƒáu i razoƒçarani njezinom eksponirano≈°ƒáu, pogotovo meƒëu mladima, odluƒçili su pribli≈æiti povijesne zanimljivosti Rijeke upravo toj populaciji. Iako su majice edukativne, dizajnom su prilagoƒëene mlaƒëoj populaciji koja bi ih ponosno mogla nositi na svojim putovanjima, a interesantnim spojem vizualnog i verbalnog pobuƒëuju znati≈æelju te podsjeƒáaju javnost na rijeƒçke zanimljivosti i bogatstvo grada. Dizajn je dijelom preuzet iz konteksta povijesti a dijelom prilagoƒëen urbanom vizualnom jeziku, dok su poruke ƒçesto dvosmislene. Uz svaku majicu dobije se i njezina priƒça tako da nema straha od nepotkovanosti informacijama.                             Dosad su realizirane ƒçetiri majice: priƒça o Rijeƒçkoj tvornici konopa, o tvornici ƒçokolade Elefant, o Rafineriji ≈°eƒáera i o Baltazar Gradu, no serija motiva dalje ƒáe se razvijati. Projekt je dobio podr≈°ku Turistiƒçke zajednice grada Rijeke koja mu je dodijelila certifikat suvenira Izvorno rijeƒçko. translation: Whoever conquers the T -shirt with the second pair of sleeves delighted with the Rijeka history and disappointed with its exposure, especially among young people, decided to bring the historical interesting things to the river right now. The young Rijeka residents behind the "second pair of sleeves" believe that there is a good story behind each good product, so they decided to portray Rijeka's history through an illustrated story that would somehow revive that piece of history. Although the T -shirts are educational, the design is adapted to the younger population that could proudly carry them on their travels, and with an interesting blend of visual and verbally arousing curiosity and reminding the public of Rijeka's interesting things and wealth of the city. The design is partly taken from the context of history and partly adapted to urban visual language, while the messages are often ambiguous. With each T -shirt, her story is obtained, so there is no fear of the irresistibility of information. So far, four T -shirts have been realized: the story of the Rijeka rope factory, the Elephant chocolate factory, the sugar refinery and the Balthazar city, but the motif series will further develop. It is time for Rijeka and Rijeka residents to boast about their city and spread its heritage, and they will also help them with the patron saint, who, each in their own way, have a mission to convey the word about the river as far away from. You can find more details about stories at http://www.facebook.com/noparparrukava. The project received the support of the Rijeka Tourist Board, which assigned it a souvenir certificate originally Rijeka. These new Rijeka promoters can also be viewed and purchased at the Kantoon Shop in Rijeka, under Ka≈°el 5. A good story is heard far away, so the next time you will be in doubt what to donate to a cousin in Germany - Kantoon Shop's direction! In our prize game, the T -shirts were won by Sanja Zeravica from Rijeka and Tea Gatackic from Zagreb. We send girls to the mail information on the rewarding of the award and more lucky to others the second time. Privacy
translation (annotation, run 2): Who wins a T -shirt second pair of sleeves  Delighted with the Rijeka history and disappointed with its exposure, especially among young people, they decided to bring the historical interests of Rijeka to this population.  The young Rijeka residents behind the "second pair of sleeves" believe that there is a good story behind each good product, so they decided to portray Rijeka's history through an illustrated story that would somehow revive that piece of history.Although the T -shirts are educational, the design is adapted to the younger population that could proudly carry them on their travels, and with an interesting blend of visual and verbally arousing curiosity and reminding the public of Rijeka's interesting things and wealth of the city.The design is partly taken from the context of history and partly adapted to urban visual language, while the messages are often ambiguous.With each T -shirt, her story is obtained, so there is no fear of the irresistibility of information.  So far, four T -shirts have been realized: the story of the Rijeka rope factory, the Elephant chocolate factory, the sugar refinery and the Balthazar city, but the motif series will further develop.It is time for Rijeka and Rijeka residents to boast about their city and spread its heritage, and they will also help them with the patron saint, who, each in their own way, have a mission to convey the word about the river as far away from.You can find more details about stories at http://www.facebook.com/noparparrukava.  The project received the support of the Rijeka Tourist Board, which assigned it a souvenir certificate originally Rijeka.These new Rijeka promoters can also be viewed and purchased at the Kantoon Shop in Rijeka, under Ka≈°el 5. A good story is heard far away, so the next time you will be in doubt what to donate to a cousin in Germany - Kantoon Shop's direction!  In our prize game, the T -shirts were won by Sanja Zeravica from Rijeka and Tea Gatackic from Zagreb.We send girls to the mail information on the rewarding of the award and more lucky to others the second time. text: Natjeƒçaj za sufinanciranje znanstvenoistra≈æivaƒçkih projekata u sklopu zajedniƒçke hrvatsko-maƒëarske suradnje u trajanju od 1. sijeƒçnja 2021. do 31. prosinca 2022. godine >                             Rok: 24. rujna 2020.                             Na temelju Ugovora o znanstvenoj i tehnolo≈°koj suradnji izmeƒëu Vlade Republike Hrvatske i Vlade Republike Maƒëarske i Programa suradnje izmeƒëu Ministarstva znanosti, obrazovanja i sporta Republike Hrvatske i Ministarstva ljudskih resursa Maƒëarske u podruƒçjima obrazovanja i znanosti, s ciljem intenziviranja meƒëunarodne znanstvene suradnje obiju zemalja i poticanja mobilnosti znanstvenika u sklopu bilateralnih znanstvenoistra≈æivaƒçkih projekata, Ministarstvo znanosti i obrazovanja objavljuje                             NATJEƒåAJ                             Uvjeti prijave                             Natjeƒçaj se raspisuje za sufinanciranje tro≈°kova putovanja i boravaka hrvatskih i maƒëarskih znanstvenika u cilju provoƒëenja zajedniƒçkih projekata iz sljedeƒáih zajedniƒçki dogovorenih prioritetnih podruƒçja:                             znanosti o ≈æivotu;                             prirodne znanosti;                             in≈æenjerstvo.                             Prednost ƒáe imati oni prijedlozi projekata koji imaju potencijal za nastavak suradnje u sklopu Okvirnoga programa za istra≈æivanje i inovacije Obzor 2020/Obzor Europa.                             Pravo prijave na natjeƒçaj imaju znanstvenici na sveuƒçili≈°tima, akademijama, veleuƒçili≈°tima i drugim javnim znanstvenim i istra≈æivaƒçkim ustanovama.                             Preduvjet za prijavu je definiran zajedniƒçki znanstvenoistra≈æivaƒçki projekt na kojemu namjeravaju suraƒëivati znanstvenici obiju zemalja.                             doktorat znanosti;                             Minimalan broj suradnika (uz voditelja) na projektu je dva, a maksimalan ≈°est. U sklopu ovoga natjeƒçaja moguƒáe je prijaviti sudjelovanje samo na jednom projektu (ili kao voditelj ili kao suradnik).                             Financijske odredbe                             Sredstva se dodjeljuju namjenski za putovanja i boravke znanstvenika u sklopu zajedniƒçkoga znanstvenoistra≈æivaƒçkog projekta. Zemlja po≈°iljateljica pokriva tro≈°kove putovanja, smje≈°taja i dnevnica za svoje istra≈æivaƒçe. Maksimalni ukupni odobreni iznos po projektu s hrvatske strane je 6.500,00 eura za cjelokupno razdoblje trajanja projekta (dvije godine).                             Uvjet za dodjelu financijskih sredstava za drugu godinu provedbe projekta predano je struƒçno i financijsko izvje≈°ƒáe o izvr≈°enim aktivnostima u sklopu projekta u prvoj godini provedbe.                             Odluku o broju odobrenih projekata te iznosu odobrenih sredstava donijet ƒáe Zajedniƒçko hrvatsko-maƒëarsko povjerenstvo na temelju provedenih evaluacija u obje dr≈æave.                             Odabir projekata i evaluacijski kriteriji                             Evaluaciju prijedloga projekata obavit ƒáe struƒçnjaci s hrvatske i maƒëarske strane, polazeƒái od sljedeƒáih kriterija:                             znanstvena relevantnost istra≈æivanja;                             primjerenost prikazane znanstvene metode;                             kvalificiranost podnositelja projekta i suradnika s hrvatske strane;                             va≈ænost i potreba bilateralne znanstvene suradnje (korist za znanost u objema dr≈æavama te moguƒánost za iskoristive rezultate i patente, licencije itd. ili za nove znanstvene spoznaje);                             moguƒánost nastavka suradnje u sklopu Okvirnoga programa za istra≈æivanje i inovacije Obzor 2020/Obzor Europa;                             sudjelovanje mladih znanstvenika (do 35 godina) s hrvatske strane.                             Naƒçin prijave                             Prijavu projekta pod zajedniƒçkim nazivom u skladu s propisanim uvjetima i na propisanim prijavnim obrascima hrvatski voditelj projekta u natjeƒçajnome roku podnosi Ministarstvu znanosti i obrazovanja Republike Hrvatske, a maƒëarski voditelj projekta prijavu podnosi maƒëarskome Nacionalnom uredu za istra≈æivanje, razvoj i inovacije. Projekti koji nisu u propisanome roku prijavljeni s obje strane neƒáe se razmatrati.                             Projektna prijava dostavlja se na hrvatskome jeziku.                             popis najva≈ænijih publikacija i objavljenih radova u posljednjih pet godina koji se odnose na sadr≈æaj projekta (svih hrvatskih i maƒëarskih sudionika na projektu);                             kratki opis partnerske ustanove u Maƒëarskoj;                             kratki opis zadaƒáa svih ƒçlanova projektnoga tima.                             Natjeƒçajnu dokumentaciju treba poslati u elektroniƒçkome obliku na e-mail: silvana.siebert@mzo.hr, a jedan tiskani primjerak do 24. rujna 2020. godine na adresu:                             (Natjeƒçaj za hrvatsko-maƒëarske projekte)                             Donje Svetice 38
translation: Competition for co-financing scientific research projects as part of a joint Croatian-Hungarian cooperation on January 1, 2021 to December 31, 2022> Deadline: September 24, 2020. On the basis of a contract on scientific and technological cooperation between the Government of the Republic of Croatia and the Government of the Republic Hungary and the Program of Cooperation between the Ministry of Science, Education and Sports of the Republic of Croatia and the Ministry of Human Resources of Hungary in the fields of education and science, with the aim of intensifying international scientific cooperation between both countries and encouraging scientists' mobility as part of bilateral scientific research projects, the Ministry of Science and Education publishes a tender of applications. The competition is announced to co -finance the cost of traveling and stays of Croatian and Hungarian scientists in order to implement joint projects from the following jointly agreed priority fields: Life Sciences; natural Sciences; engineering. The advantage will have those proposals for projects that have the potential to continue cooperation as part of the framework program for research and innovation Obzor 2020/Obzor Europe. Scientists at universities, academies, polytechnics and other public scientific and research institutions are entitled to the competition. A prerequisite for the application is a common scientific research project, which is intended to cooperate with both countries scientists. doctorate of science; The minimum number of associates (with the leader) is two and a maximum of six on the project. As part of this competition, it is possible to apply for only one project (or as a leader or as an associate). The financial provisions of the funds are awarded for purpose for traveling and staying scientists as part of a joint scientific research project. The shipment country covers the costs of travel, accommodation and daily allowance for its researchers. The maximum total approved amount per project on the Croatian side is 6,500.00 euros for the entire period of the project (two years). The condition for the allocation of financial resources for the second year of the project implementation has been submitted to the expert and financial report on the activities performed as part of the project in the first year of implementation. The decision on the number of approved projects and the amount of approved funds will be made by a joint Croatian-Hungarian commission on the basis of evaluation in both countries. The selection of projects and evaluation criteria will be evaluated by experts on the Croatian and Hungarian sides, starting from the following criteria: scientific relevance of research; appropriateness of scientific methods presented; qualifying for the applicant of the project and associates on the Croatian side; the importance and need of bilateral scientific cooperation (benefit to science in both countries and the possibility for useful results and patents, licenses, etc. or for new scientific cognition); the possibility of continuing cooperation as part of the Framework Program for Research and Innovation Obzor 2020/Obzor Europe; participation of young scientists (up to 35 years) on the Croatian side. The manner of applying the project application under the joint name in accordance with the prescribed conditions and on the prescribed application form Croatian manager of the project in the competition period submits to the Ministry of Science and Education of the Republic of Croatia, and the Hungarian project manager submits the application to the Hungarian National Office for Research, Development and Innovation. Projects that are not registered with both sides will not be considered. The project application is submitted in the Croatian language. a list of the most important publications and published papers in the last five years relating to the content of the project (all Croatian and Hungarian participants on the project); short description of the partner institution in Hungary; A brief description of the task of all members of the project team. The tender documentation should be submitted in electronic form to e-mail: silvana.siebert@mzo.hr, and one printed specimen by September 24, 2020 to: (Competition for Croatian-Hungarian Projects) Donje Svetice 38

Better ever than never :) What I can definitely boast about the game (before playing) that they think of insert. in Core Box Stane Exp and a building supplement .. and that without any major problems.

translation: Guingamp: More members than inhabitants less than a month ago we wrote about a socios project in French first -team Guingamp. The joining began last Saturday before the Guingamp -Monaco match, and the membership fee costs 40 euros. For less than six days from the start of Guingamp, it has already passed the figure of 7,000 members. The figure is respectable for such a short period, but also even more respectable when considering that according to the 2014 census, Guingamp has 7003 inhabitants! text: Preporuƒçene objave                             Investitor je zainteresiran kupiti 51 % udjela u tvrtki kako bi pomognuo i sudjelovao u dobiti od interesantnog projekta. Da li se mo≈æe ugovorom (kod odvjetnika ili javnog bilje≈ænika) sprijeƒçiti da onaj koji ima 51 % preglasavanjem manjinskog udjela donosi neke kljuƒçne odluke. Konkretno, sprijeƒçiti veƒáinskog vlasnika da (eventualno) proda ili ustupi profitabilni projekt treƒáoj strani bez obzira na neslaganje ostalih suvlasnika.                             Naravno da moze. Uz dobrog odvjetnika i bez varijanti "nama registraciju radi knjigovodja", a znamo i sami prepisati od susjeda koji je regsitrirao d.. za sve i svasta (a ima i export-import).                             Apsolutno je moguƒáe i "elegantno" poslo≈æiti stvari u trgovaƒçkom dru≈°tvu kako je volja vlasnicima poslovnih udjela.                             Dakle, treba Vam pomoƒá vje≈°tog pravnika iz podruƒçja trgovaƒçkog prava da Vam slo≈æi "papire".                             Dragi MASTER, a da malo prestane≈° sa "pravno irelevantnim" komentarima, koji su zabavni samo tebi!                             Morao bi znati da solemnizirati ugovor znaƒçi potvrditi neki ugovor koji je napisan, pa prema tome da bi se dru≈°tveni ugovor solemnizirao on prije toga mora biti napisan!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!                             Link to post                             a ja mislio da solemnizacija znaƒçi potvrda javnog bilje≈ænika da je ugovor usklaƒëen sa zakonom.                             to niti jedan odvjetnik ne mo≈æe jamƒçiti ili mo≈æe ili zna≈° nekoga odvjetnika da sastavlja dru≈°tvene ugovore i jamƒçi da ƒáe upravo odredbe toga ugovora za≈°tititi sudionike posla na naƒçin na koji oni to ≈æele?                             inaƒçe mo≈æe se ugovor sastaviti i u obliku javno bilje≈æniƒçkog akta. tarifa je dvostruka, ali tada u sastavljanju isprave sudjeluje i javni bilje≈ænik                             Link to post                             Obzirom da ka≈æete da je investitor zainteresiran za "kupnju" 51 % udjela u tvrtki, pretpostavljam da se radi o trg.dru≈°tvu koje veƒá postoji. Dakle prvo vam predstoji sklapanje ugovora o prijenosu poslovnih udjela, koji se mora ili solemnizirati ili sastaviti u obliku javnobilje≈æniƒçkog akta. Drugo izmjena osnivaƒçkog akta - izjave ili dru≈°tvenog ugovora, u kojem se mogu regulirati odnosi meƒëu ƒçlanovima dru≈°tva kako vam odgovara tj. da odredite naƒçine kada i kako taj veƒáinski vlasnik mo≈æe dalje prenositi svoj poslovni udio (vidi ƒçl. 413., 416.,420. ZTD). Izmjenjeni dru≈°tveni ugovor mo≈æete sasstaviti kod odvjetnika i potom podnjeti na solemnizaciju javnom bilje≈æniku ili direktno kod bilje≈ænika koji ƒáe vam sastaviti isti ugovor sastaviti u obliku jb akta.

Wanting to reveal the truth about his origin, suspected that the puzzle hides the secretary of the secret, he will go in search of this being, which has the status of a deity with the Linita people, because according to their belief, he is a governor of the supreme god of Kinel, who has assigned Aragon to people, and I'm immortal. translation: The poetry you will understand: "ODA years" poetry is an extremely important part of literature, although very little attention is given to it in Croatia. Maybe because she is incomprehensible and difficult for the reader, so she often bypasses her on shelves in bookstores and libraries. Maybe because there is no adequate promotion that supports all the forms of songwriting, and maybe just because people do not read enough. Whatever it is, we will quote what the author of the poems "ODA" said about her poetry: "Every poet hopes that his poem will be received as she was released in her breath and read not only to the eyes of the reader who were being his faithful audience, but also in the eyes of those who say they do not understand poetry. In the eyes of those who have forgotten that the parts of one's soul are hidden in these verses, who teaches, loves, and hopes. By learning about ourselves, we create experiences in which many are so easily recognized. And one poet can put it in verse, and every man easily understands. My songs have painted various moments, and I am sometimes sadder, and sometimes happier recorded the most powerful and I believe that if you open your heart, you will recognize yourself in them. ‚Äù Lea Brezar. With the support of a double debt, publisher who published the first book by author Lee Brezar last year, the Red Planet picture book, at this year's Interliber, will be presented by her collection of poems "ODA" whose promotion will be on Sunday, 15.11. 2015 at 3pm. The promotion of the collection will be led by Aleksandra Belkovic, teacher of the Waldorf School in Zagreb.

translation: 10 years Gacko Together in 500 broadcast 1/1 Otoƒçac - 10 years, 10 years is a significant period in every man's life, it's a good piece of life, and when it comes to 10 years of something else, like one radio show, then that's it the anniversary worth all attention. In addition to adding that it is a show on a small radio, such as Croatian Radio Otoƒçac, then it is even more impressive news. So yesterday, 10 years of broadcasting "Gackom Together", the shows started in 2008 and aired on every Sunday, was hung up yesterday. It was and is the contact show, with a live program, and the topics, the topics were different, just the kind of life imposed on them, above all current. And listened. And various guest structures, from ministers, their deputies or assistants, director of state administrations or agencies, mayors, mayors and mayors, sports, cultural, humanitarian employees, participated in the show, it is difficult to list everyone who participated. text: POƒåEO FESTIVAL                             Vodeƒáa imena svjetske glazbene scene na Exitu 2010.                             U ƒçetvrtak naveƒçer na Petrovaradinskoj tvrƒëavi pokraj Novog Sada nastupom skupine "Ringi≈°pil" poƒçeo je najveƒái glazbeni festival jugoistoƒçne Europe "Exit 2010"                             ƒåetverodnevna glazbena manifestacija trajat ƒáe do nedjelje, 11. srpnja i na njoj ƒáe nastupiti oko 600 izvoƒëaƒça na 25 festivalskih bina. Vodeƒáa imena ovogodi≈°njeg EXIT-a su, kako prenose mediji u Vojvodini, britanski elektro dvojac "The Chemical Brothers", jedan od najtra≈æenijih bendova na ovim prostorima "Faith No More", ≈æeljno oƒçekivani "Placebo", popularna hip hop pjevaƒçica Missy Elliot, ƒçuvena drum'n'bass skupina "Pendulum live", itd.                             Na "dance" areni publiku oƒçekuju DJ David Guetta, Laidback Luke, A-Trak, Dirty South, Black Rose, dok za one koji vole tvrƒëi zvuk, na "Eksploziv" bini nastupit ƒáe Behemoth, Suicidal Tendencies, The Exploited, Ex Deo, Decapitated, Inspector Cluso...                             Kao i prija≈°njih godina, najvi≈°e posjetitelja oƒçekuje se iz Velike Britanije, oko 10.000, isto toliko dolazi iz regije, a veliki interes ove godine za novosadski festival vlada u Nizozemskoj i skandinavskim zemljama, istiƒçu organizatori. Oni ka≈æu da ove godine veliki broj ljudi dolazi iz Australije i s Novog Zelanda, kao i iz Ju≈æne Amerike - Brazila i Argentine. "I pored krize uspjeli smo mnogobrojnim pogodnosti privuƒái inozemne posjetitelje", kazala je predstavnica EXIT tima Marija Jociƒá.
translation: The festival of the leading names of the World Music Scene on Exit 2010 on Thursday night at the Petrovaradin Fortress near the new Sad performance of the Ringi≈°pil group began the largest music festival of Southeast Europe "Exit 2010" a four -day music event will run until Sunday, July 11 about 600 performers will perform at 25 festival stages. The festival will officially open the famous Bad Brain band at 9pm. This is followed by an electronic punk disc -band "LCD Soundsystem", and the main attraction of the evening singer Mika will appear on the scene at midnight. The leading names of this year's EXIT are, according to the media in Vojvodina, the British electric duo "The Chemical Brothers", one of the most sought after bands in this area "Faith No More", eagerly expected "Placebo", popular hip hop singer Missy Elliot, famous drum'n'bass group "Pendulum Live", etc. On "Dance" Arena is expected by DJ DAVID Guetta, Laidback Luke, A-TRAK, Dirty South, Black Rose, while for those who love the harder sound, on "explosive" stage Behemoth, suicidal tendencies, The Exploited, Ex Part will perform, Decapitated, Inspector Cluso ... As in previous years, most visitors are expected from the UK, about 10,000, the same comes from the region, and this year's great interest in the Novi Sad Festival this year Government in the Netherlands and Scandinavian countries, the organizers point out. They say that this year a large number of people are coming from Australia and from New Zealand, as well as from South America - Brazil and Argentina. "Despite the crisis, we were able to attract foreign visitors with numerous benefits," said the exit team of Marija Jocic.

text: O CMS-u / Tko je tko                             Stalno radno tijelo Skup≈°tine (SRTS) jedno je od tri statutarna tijela Centra za mirovne studije (uz Izvr≈°ni odbor i Skup≈°tinu). ƒålanovi organizacije, njih 5, anga≈æmanom u Stalnom radnom tijelu Skup≈°tine obavezuju se volonterski, voƒëeni principima nenasilja raditi na unapreƒëenju rada CMS-a. U mandatu ovog tijela je primanje neanonimnih ≈æalbi ili prigovora na odluke Izvr≈°nog odbora i rad Centra za mirovne studije te ≈æalbi u skladu s Protokolom za za≈°titu radnika od mobbinga.                             Centar za mirovne studije (CMS) izrastao je iz razliƒçitih oblika izravne izgradnje mira u zapadnoj Slavoniji (Volonterski projekt Pakrac, 1993. -1997.), gdje se 1996. godine prvi put i razgovaralo o osnivanju organizacije. Formalno je osnovan godinu kasnije, s namjerom promicanja vrijednosti nenasilja, dru≈°tvene pravde, po≈°tivanja ljudskih prava, tolerancije i prihvaƒáanja razliƒçitosti kroz participativne metode mirovnog obrazovanja, istra≈æivanja i javnog zagovaranja.
translation: About CMS / who is who is the permanent working body of the Assembly (SRTS) one of the three statutory bodies of the Center for Peace Studies (with the Executive Board and the Assembly). The members of the organization, 5 of them, engage in the constant working body of the Assembly, are obliged to work volunteer, guided by the principles of non-violence to work to improve the work of CMS. In the mandate of this body, there is a receipt of non -anonymous complaints or objections to the Decision of the Executive Board and the work of the Peace Studies Center and the appeal in accordance with the Protocol for the Protection of Workers from Mobbing. The Center for Peace Studies (CMS) grew from various forms of direct peace construction in Western Slavonia (Volunteer Project Project, 1993-1997), where in 1996 it was first discussed about the establishment of the organization. It was formally founded a year later, with the intention of promoting the value of non -violence, social justice, respect for human rights, tolerance and acceptance of diversity through participative methods of peace education, research and public advocacy.

The Center for Peace Studies (CMS) grew from various forms of direct peace construction in Western Slavonia (Volunteer Project Project, 1993-1997), where in 1996 it was first discussed about the establishment of the organization.It was formally founded a year later, with the intention of promoting the value of non -violence, social justice, respect for human rights, tolerance and acceptance of diversity through participative methods of peace education, research and public advocacy.

translation: Search Muh Content - Against Raising the price for electric energy Buz admin 16.02.2010. 00:00:00 (we are transmitting) a statement for the media to the expensive electricity pensioners would not be able to submit a Matica of the Retired Pensioners of Croatia, it is strongly opposed to the announcements of the price increase of electricity and warns that it would be an unbearable blow to the impoverished pension pockets. Considering that the price of gas is recently increased, a new increase in energy costs, in conditions when the pension growth is frozen, pensioners in Croatia could not bear. The media has been announced, and confirmed from the Croatian Electric Power Company to prepare a request to the Government for a new electricity price increase, with the start of applying from April 1 this year. It has not been confirmed by the increase in prices to seek, but according to unofficial information, it will be between seven and ten percent. The Matica warns that the average pension in the Republic of Croatia, paid in January this year, is only HRK 2,169.32. According to the Analysis of the Matica, close to 80 percent of the pensioners, 862,696 of them, receives a pension, which is on average only HRK 1,709. By applying the Special Tax on Salary and Pension Tax, such a pension level will remain until mid -2o11. when the next adjustment of pensions with the growth of salary and consumer prices is first expected. The consequences of the "Crisis Law" are therefore undergoing the poorest pensioners, not just those who receive pensions of more than HRK 3,000. The Matica of the Retirement of Croatia requires that in these conditions of frozen pension growth, there is no increase in vital prices for the retirement population, which includes the price of electricity. In Zagreb, February 13, 2010. President of the Croatian Retirement Matrix Josip Vincek V.R.
translation (annotation, run 2): Search content  MUH - Against the raising price for electric energy  Buz Admin 16.02.2010.00:00:00  (we are transmitting) a press release more expensive electricity pensioners would not be able to handle  The Croatian Retirement Matica sharply opposes the announcements of the price increase of electricity and warns that this would be an unbearable blow to the impoverished pension pockets.Considering that the price of gas is recently increased, a new increase in energy costs, in conditions when the pension growth is frozen, pensioners in Croatia could not bear.The media has been announced, and confirmed from the Croatian Electric Power Company to prepare a request to the Government for a new electricity price increase, with the start of applying from April 1 this year.It has not been confirmed by the increase in prices to seek, but according to unofficial information, it will be between seven and ten percent.The Matica warns that the average pension in the Republic of Croatia, paid in January this year, is only HRK 2,169.32.According to the Analysis of the Matica, close to 80 percent of the pensioners, 862,696 of them, receives a pension, which is on average only HRK 1,709.By applying the Special Tax on Salary and Pension Tax, such a pension level will remain until mid -2o11.when the next adjustment of pensions with the growth of salary and consumer prices is first expected.The consequences of the "Crisis Law" are therefore undergoing the poorest pensioners, not just those who receive pensions of more than HRK 3,000.The Matica of the Retirement of Croatia requires that in these conditions of frozen pension growth, there is no increase in vital prices for the retirement population, which includes the price of electricity.In Zagreb, February 13, 2010. President of the Croatian Retirement Matrix Josip Vincek V.R.

translation: Sveta Gera - the top of KT HPO 6.4., 1178 m view on the interactive mountaineering map of Croatia, Holy Gera is the highest peak of ≈Ωumberak and northwestern Croatia. Although the Croatian name is for that top of St. Elijah, the name is almost forgotten and is more commonly used by the old Slovenian name of St. Gera. The Slovenians also call the top of Trdin's top according to their writer Janez Trdini. The line of the state border with Slovenia leads the driveway along the ridge itself. On the Croatian side is the Greek Catholic Chapel of St. Elijah in which a simple mountaineering shelter is arranged, and about ten meters from it, on the Slovenian side, canned remains of the chapel of St. Jere. The top is dominated by an 80 m high telecommunications tower on the Slovenian side, and on the Croatian side is a barracks that will be remodeled into the mountaineering home after the army departure. The highest point is marked with a high concrete geodetic pillar from which there is an extraordinary vista on all sides (the rise to the pillar requires a fairly climbing skill). Info vista from the chapel has 2 'to a lookout from where there is an excellent view of Slovenia, all the way to the Alps Coordinates N 45 ¬∞ 45' 35.2 'E 15 ¬∞ 19' 5.7 '' The metal stamp of the top is attached to the base of the geodetic pillar at the highest point of the top Approaches Sosice - Saint Gera (via Boic) 2.15 h of the Sosice - Saint Gera (via lawn) 2.30 h sculici (pl. Home "Boris Farkas") - Holy Gera 2 h is common in Holy Gero to go from So≈°ice, from where there are two variants of the way (through Boic and through lawn). The variant over the boic is slightly shorter, and they connect to Boljari. The approach from the village of Sekulic, where pl. The home of Boris Farkas is something shorter, and the climb is lighter so much that the marking is partly leading on the road. Map of the Mountaineering Road ≈Ωumberak, Karlovac bypass, 40 peaks for 40 years PD Kamenjak, Croatian pl. houses (hiking shelter in the chapel) Croatian Mountaineering Federation

text: Postoji osnovana sumnja da je 29-godi≈°njak oko 14,30 sati 26. rujna 2007., protivno odredbama ƒçl. 51. st. 1. i ƒçl. 199. st. 1. Zakona o sigurnosti prometa na cestama, upravljao osobnim vozilom marke BMW austrijskih registracijskih oznaka kolnikom ulice Obala Mar≈°ala Tita u Vrsaru. Osnovano se sumnja da je zbog neprilagoƒëene brzine kretanja i naƒçina vo≈ænje te utjecaja alkohola (koncentracija od 2,20 g/kg apsolutnog alkohola u krvi) izazvao prometnu nesreƒáu, odnosno da je vozilom pre≈°ao na suprotnu kolniƒçku traku namijenjenu za promet vozila iz suprotnog smjera gdje je prednjim dijelom svog vozila udario u prednju stranu mopeda marke Tomos, kojim je iz suprotnog smjera upravljao hrvatski dr≈æavljanin P. ≈†. (1959.). Zbog zadobivenih ozljeda P. ≈†. je na mjestu dogaƒëaja preminuo. U istra≈ænom zahtjevu predlo≈æeno je da se protiv osumnjiƒçenika odredi pritvor temeljem ƒçl. 102. st. 1. t. 2. i 3. Zakona o kaznenom postupku.
translation: There is a reasonable suspicion that the 29-year-old was around 2:30 pm on September 26, 2007, contrary to the provisions of Art. 51 (1) and Art. 199 (1) of the Road Traffic Safety Act, driving a BMW personal vehicle vehicle with Austrian license plates on Marshal Tito Coast in Vrsar. It is suspected that due to improper speed of movement and driving and alcohol, (a concentration of 2,20 g/kg of blood absolute alcohol), he caused a car accident, that is, a vehicle switched to the opposite pavement tape intended for vehicle traffic from the opposite direction where where the front of his vehicle struck the front of the Tomos moped brand, which was driven from the opposite direction by a Croatian citizen of P. ≈†. (1959). Due to the injuries sustained by P. ≈†. had died at the scene. In the investigating request, it was proposed that the suspect was set up on the basis of Art. 102 (1) t. 2 and 3 of the Criminal Procedure Act.

text: Predla≈æe se dono≈°enje Preporuke HZJZ-a za rad amatera                             19.05.2020                             HRSK                             Dana 15. svibnja 2020. Hrvatski sabor kulture uputio je prijedlog Ministarstvu kulture RH da inicira potrebu hitnog dono≈°enja Preporuke HZJZ-a za sprjeƒçavanje bolesti COVID-19 namijenjene radu udruga kulturno-umjetniƒçkog amaterizma RH jer se postojeƒáa Preporuka za odr≈æavanje proba profesionalnih umjetnika i djelatnika u kulturi od 10. svibnja 2020. razliƒçito tumaƒçi od strane sto≈æera civilne za≈°tite u jedinicama lokalne i regionalne samouprave te na nacionalnom nivou ≈°to uzrokuje probleme i pravnu nesigurnost ovom sektoru, ali je i potencijalna prijetnja zdravlju samih nositelja djelatnosti.                             Razliƒçitom tumaƒçenju spomenute Preporuke doprinosi specifiƒçna terminologija kulturno-umjetniƒçkog amaterizma koja nije poznata ≈°iroj javnosti veƒá samo usko struƒçnoj. Spomenuti prijedlog HSK-a uputio je i HZJZ-a u cilju da njegovo brojno ƒçlanstvo i ostale udruge kulturno-umjetniƒçkog amaterizma nastave s odgovarajuƒáim i odgovornim radom u svojim sredinama.
translation: It is proposed to adopt the CIJZ recommendation for amateur work on 19.05.2020 on 15 May 2020. Croatian Parliament of Culture sent a proposal to the Ministry of Culture of the Republic of Croatia to initiate the need for urgent adoption of the COVI-19 COVID-19 Disease Disease Recommendation Association of Cultural and Article Amateurism of the Republic of Croatia because the existing recommendation for the maintenance of professional artists and cultural employees of May 10, 2020, is differently interpreted by civil protection headquarters in local and regional self -government units and at national level, which causes problems and legal uncertainty to this sector, but a potential threat to the health of the holders of the activity themselves. Different interpretation of the aforementioned recommendation contributes to specific terminology of cultural and artistic amateurism, which is not known to the general public but only closely professional. The aforementioned proposal of the HSK was also sent by the CIHZ to the aim that his numerous membership and other associations of cultural and artistic amateurism teaching appropriate and responsible work in his environments.
translation (annotation, run 2): It is suggested to adopt the CIJZ recommendation for amateur work  19.05.2020  HRSK  On May 15, 2020, the Croatian Parliament of Culture made a proposal to the Ministry of Culture of the Republic of Croatia to initiate the need for urgent adoption of the COVID-11 Covid-19 Disease Recommendation to the work of the Association of Cultural and Artistic amateurism of the Republic of Croatia because the existing recommendation for the maintenance of professional artists and employees in the employeesCulture of May 10, 2020, interprets differently by civil protection headquarters in local and regional self -government units and at national level, causing problems and legal insecurity to this sector, but is also a potential threat to the health of the activities of the activity themselves.  Different interpretation of the aforementioned recommendation contributes to specific terminology of cultural and artistic amateurism, which is not known to the general public but only closely professional.The aforementioned proposal of the HSK was also sent by the CIHZ to the aim that his numerous membership and other associations of cultural and artistic amateurism teaching appropriate and responsible work in his environments.

text: Na usmenom ispitu dolazi student i nosi 1000 EUR za mito. Profesor si ka≈æe: - "Ma neƒáu ga pitat ne≈°to te≈°ko", pa ga pita tko je bacio bombu na Hiro≈°imu. - "Amerikanci", reƒçe student i profesor ga pusti. Dolazi drugi i nosi 500 EUR. Profesor ga pita tko je bacio bombu na Hiro≈°imu. Ovaj reƒçe Amerikanci. Po≈°to je dao malo manje mita, profesor pita dalje koliko ih je poginulo. - "Oko 70 000 do 80 000." I njega profesor pusti. Dolazi ≈°treber koji ne nosi ni≈°ta. Profesor gnjevan ga pita tko je bacio bombu na Hiro≈°imu, ovaj reƒçe Amerikanci. - "Koliko ih je poginulo?" - "Oko 70 000 do 80 000." - "Nabrojite imena poginulih, kolega."                             Najnoviji vic
translation: A student comes to the oral exam and carries 1000 euro for bribes. The professor says, "" I won't ask him something hard, "so he asks him who threw a bomb on Hiroshima. "" Americans, "said the student, and the professor let him go. The second comes and wears 500 eur. The professor asks him who threw a bomb on Hiroshima. This one said the Americans. Since he gave a little less myth, the professor asks further how much they were killed. - "About 70,000 to 80 000" And the professor let him go. A nickel that carries nothing comes. The professor angrily asks him who threw a bomb on Hiroshima, this one said the Americans. - "How many have been killed?" - "About 70,000 to 80 000" - "List the names of the dead, a colleague." The latest joke

text: ≈†to smo saznali o karizmatiƒçnoj glumici kojoj je kultni redatelj Paolo Magelli povjerio ulogu Ofelije?                             Talentirana glumica Anƒëela Ramljak razgovarala je s na≈°om Mirjanom Brabec                             Stigla je na biciklu, u crvenom kaputu i s plavom beretkom, visoka, dugonoga, tanka, prekrasnog porculanskog tena, oƒçiju plavih kao nebo tog toplog poslijepodneva potkraj veljaƒçe, kad smo se na≈°le na suncem obasjanoj terasi mirnog dvori≈°nog kafiƒáa u Ilici. Anƒëela je nova Ofelija, uz Hamleta Franu Ma≈°koviƒáa u kultnoj Shakespeareovoj tragediji, koju ƒáe ovog ljeta na Lovrijencu, na jubilarnim 70. Dubrovaƒçkim igrama re≈æirati uvijek provokativni Paolo Magelli.                             ƒåesto si na biciklu?                             ‚Äì Uvijek, oduvijek. I u ≈°kolu sam svaki dan i≈°la biciklom s Bukovca kroz Maksimir, ne cestom. Mo≈æda sam upravo zbog toga toliko vezana uz ≈°umu i prirodu. Lijepo mi je gledati kako se godi≈°nja doba smjenjuju, volim promatrati ≈°afrane u ≈°umi, gole grane, snijeg...                             Jesi li se razveselila Ofeliji? Kako si doznala da si u Magellijevoj postavi?                             ‚Äì Jako se tome veselim. Nazvao me Sa≈°a Bo≈æiƒá, direktor Drame na Dubrovaƒçkim igrama, i rekao: ‚ÄúGdje si, draga? Ja sam u Berlinu, ali morao sam ti javiti ‚Äì ovog ljeta igra≈° Ofeliju u Dubrovniku, a re≈æira Paolo Magelli‚Äù. ‚ÄúWow‚Äù, kriknula sam, ba≈° se prolomilo. Jako volim i cijenim Paola i dramaturginju ≈Ωeljku Udoviƒçiƒá. Silno se veselim ≈°to ƒáu ponovno s njima raditi i utjeloviti Ofeliju. Raduje me ≈°to je ekipa divna i ≈°to ƒáu igrati na Lovrijencu, gdje jo≈° nisam igrala. Uz to, rijeƒç je o jubilarnim sedamdesetim Igrama. Ima jo≈° vremena, ali lijepo je kad se mo≈æe≈° unaprijed veseliti projektu koji ƒáe≈° raditi i pomalo se u glavi za to pripremam. Ne volim unaprijed pripremati ulogu, imati sve zadano, volim kad je prvo ‚Äúomiri≈°em‚Äù i malo pomalo otkrivam, a onda se sve nekako slo≈æi kad poƒçnem raditi s redateljem, dramaturgom, partnerom, kad se naƒëem u odreƒëenom prostoru...                             Novi Hamlet, Frano Ma≈°koviƒá, u jednom je intervjuu rekao kako ‚ÄúHamlet 21. stoljeƒáa mora biti ƒçovjek s problemom, a tek onda najpoznatiji Shakespeareov kraljeviƒá‚Äù, da se ‚ÄúHamletovsko pitanje danas ne odnosi na ≈æivot i smrt, nego na bivanje u osobnosti, moralu, odanosti, ljudskom integritetu i istini.‚Äù Kakvo je tvoje viƒëenje Ofelije?                             ‚Äì Kao ≈°to sam rekla, ne ≈æelim jo≈° o tome razmi≈°ljati i unaprijed stvarati svoju viziju, bez redatelja, partnera, autorske ekipe. ≈Ωelim da moja Ofelija nastane iz procesa rada na predstavi, kada zajedno iznesemo ideje na stol i poƒçnemo ih u hodu uobliƒçavati. Kako se i sama trenutaƒçno nalazim u ≈æivotnom razdoblju iz kojeg ƒáu itekako moƒái crpiti inspiraciju za Ofi ‚Äì veƒá sam dobila taj nadimak ‚Äì vjerujem da ƒáe proces biti pr≈°teƒáa eksplozija kreativnosti i strasti, kao ≈°to to uostalom uvijek biva s Paolom i ≈Ωe≈æi (Udoviƒçiƒá op.a.), lomiteljima kli≈°eja, majstorima netipiƒçnog i nekonvencionalnog i≈°ƒçitavanja teksta.                             A kakve nam je jo≈° nekonvencionalne i netipiƒçne stvari o svojoj novoj ulozi otkrila Anƒëela, otkrijte u na≈°em tiskanom izdanju za mjesec travanj na kioscima!
translation: What did we learn about the charismatic actress to whom the cult director Paolo Magelli entrusted the role of offspring? Talented actress Anƒëela Ramljak talked to our Mirjana Brabec on a bicycle, in a red coat and a blue beret, tall, long, thin, beautiful porcelain complexion, eyes blue like the sky of that warm afternoon at the end of Feb a quiet backyard cafe in Ilica. Angela is the new offelia, with Hamlet Fran Maskovic in the cult Shakespeare's tragedy, which will be directed by the always provocative Paolo Magelli at the Jubilee 70th Games of Dubrovnik this summer. Are you often on a bike? - Always, always. And I went to school every day by bicycle from Bukovac through Maksimir, not by road. Maybe that's why I'm so attached to forest and nature. It's nice to watch the seasons change, I like to watch saffron in the woods, naked branches, snow ... Did you cheer off the offelia? How did you find out you were in Magelli's lineup? - I'm really looking forward to it. Sasa Bozic called me, director of the drama at the Dubrovnik Games, and said, ‚ÄúWhere are you, dear? I am in Berlin, but I had to let you know - you play offija in Dubrovnik this summer and directs Paolo Magelli. " "Wow," I cried, it just broke. I really love and appreciate Paolo and playwright Zeljko Udovicic. I am very much looking forward to working with them again and embody Ophelia. I am glad that the team is wonderful and that I will play at Lovlac, where I have not yet played. In addition, it's a jubilee seventy games. There is still time, but it's nice when you can look forward to the project you will do in advance and I prepare a little in your head. I do not like to prepare the role in advance, to have everything default, I love when I "smell it" and discover a little bit, and then it all somehow agreed when I start working with a director, a playwright, a partner, when I find myself in a particular space ... New Hamlet, Frano Maskovic, in an interview, said that "the 21st century Hamlet must be a man with a problem, and only then the most famous Shakespeare Kraljevic", that "Hamlet's question is not related to life and death today, but to be in personality, morality, loyalty , human integrity and truth. ‚Äù What is your view of offspring? - As I said, I don't want to think about it yet and create my vision in advance, without director, partner, author teams. I want my offelia to emerge from the work process on the play, when together we bring ideas to the table and start to form them on the walk. As I am currently in the period of life, from which I will be able to draw inspiration for the OFA - I have already got that nickname - I believe that the process will be a pesting explosion of creativity and passion, as it always is with Paolo and Ze≈æa (Udoviƒçiƒá Op. a.), clich√© breaks, masters of atypical and unconventional reading of the text. And what more unconventional and atypical things we have revealed to us about her new role, discover in our print edition for the month of April on newsstands!

The new Hamlet, Frano Maskovic, said in an interview that "the 21st century Hamlet must be a man with a problem, and only then the most famous Shakespeare's Kraljevic", that "Hamlet's question is not related to life and death today, but to be in personality,morality, loyalty, human integrity and truth. ‚ÄùWhat is your view of offspring?  - As I said, I don't want to think about it yet and create my vision in advance, without director, partner, author teams.I want my offelia to emerge from the work process on the play, when together we bring ideas to the table and start to form them on the walk.As I am currently in the period of life, from which I will be able to draw inspiration for the OFA - I have already got that nickname - I believe that the process will be a pesting explosion of creativity and passion, as it always is with Paolo and Ze≈æa (Udoviƒçiƒá Op.a.), clich√© breaks, masters of atypical and unconventional reading of the text.  And what more unconventional and atypical things we have revealed to us about her new role, discover in our print edition for the month of April on newsstands!

text: Zamjenici gradonaƒçelnika                             Gradonaƒçelnik ima jednog zamjenika koji se bira na neposrednim izborima zajedno s gradonaƒçelnikom i koji obna≈°a du≈ænost gradonaƒçelnika ako je mandat gradonaƒçelnika prestao nakon isteka dvije godine mandata te ako je gradonaƒçelnik za vrijeme trajanja mandata zbog du≈æe odsutnosti ili drugih razloga sprijeƒçen u obavljanju svoje du≈ænosti.                             Osim navedenog, Gradonaƒçelnik, temeljem steƒçenih prava talijanske nacionalne manjine na zastupljenost predstavnika u izvr≈°nom tijelu Grada Pule, ima i jednog zamjenika gradonaƒçelnika iz reda talijanske nacionalne manjine koji se bira neposredno na izborima, istovremeno, na isti naƒçin i u istom postupku kao i gradonaƒçelnik. Pravo birati zamjenika gradonaƒçelnika iz reda talijanske nacionalne manjine imaju samo biraƒçi pripadnici talijanske nacionalne manjine.                             Gradonaƒçelnik i zamjenici gradonaƒçelnika du≈ænost obavljaju, u pravilu, profesionalno.                             Postavke privatnosti                             √ó
translation: The mayor's deputy mayor has one deputy who is elected in the immediate election with the mayor and who serves as mayor if the mayor's term of office has ceased after the expiration of two years of term and if the mayor is prevented by his duties during his term of absence or other reasons. In addition to the above, on the basis of the acquired rights of the Italian national minority, the representative of the representatives in the executive body of the City of Pula also has one deputy mayor from the Italian national minority, which is elected directly in the elections, at the same time, in the same way and in the same procedure as the mayor. The right to choose the Deputy Mayor of the Italian national minority, only voters have members of the Italian national minority. The mayor and deputies of the mayor perform the duty, as a rule, professionally. Privacy Settings √ó

text: Foto: PR Photos                             Frontmen grupe Guns N' Roses je na koncertu u Dublinu dobio lekciju iz bontona. Da ka≈°njenje nije lijepo pokazali su mu ogorƒçeni fanovi koji su, nakon gotovo dva sata ƒçekanja na poƒçetak koncerta, Gunse izgaƒëali bocama.                             Usred pjesme "Welcome to the Jungle" Axl Rose je upozorio publiku prestane s gaƒëanjem i zaprijetio da ƒáe, ako doleti jo≈° jedna boca, zavr≈°iti koncert.                             - ≈Ωelimo ostati i svirati, ali ako se ne ≈æelite zabaviti, dajte nam do znanja - rekao je Axl. Odgovor je ponovno stigao u obliku boce pa je pjevaƒç odveo bend u backstage.                             Nakon odlaska grupe, publici se obratio predstavnik organizatora, poku≈°avajuƒái smiriti situaciju - Nastojimo nagovoriti Axla da se vrati i zato vas molimo da se suzdr≈æite od bacanja predmeta. Obeƒáavamo vam odliƒçan show, no trebate se smiriti - rekao je.                             Ljudi oti≈°li, koncert se nastavio                             Gunsi su bili spremni i prekinuti koncert, ali organizatori su ih ipak uspjeli sprijeƒçiti. Dok se bend, nakon stanke od sat vremena, vratio na pozornicu, veƒáina posjetitelja veƒá je oti≈°la iz dvorane.                             Gunsi su ovime nastavili niz problema koji su zapoƒçeli na koncertima u Readingu i Leedsu. I ne samo tamo. Osim svojom glazbom, koja je mje≈°avina rocka, bluesa, punka i heavy metala, Guns N' Roses oduvijek plijene pozornost medija i javnosti tuƒçnjavama, skandalima i nevoljama na koncertima.                             Na europskoj turneji promoviraju svoj posljednji album "Chinese Democracy", na koji su njihovi vjerni obo≈æavatelji ƒçekali vi≈°e od deset godina. U zagrebaƒçkoj Areni ƒáe Axl i ekipa nastupiti 24. rujna.
translation: Photo: PO Photos frontman Guns n 'Roses received a lesson from Ebius at a concert in Dublin. That the delay was not nice was shown by outraged fans, who, after almost two hours of waiting for the start of the concert, had a gunse with bottles. In the middle of the song "Welcome to the Jungle" Axl Rose, he warned the audience stopped shooting and threatened that if another bottle would come, he would finish the concert. "We want to stay and play, but if you don't want to have fun, let us know," Axl said. The answer came again in the form of a bottle, so the singer took the band to Backstage. After the group's departure, the organizer's representative addressed the audience, trying to calm the situation - we try to persuade Axla to return and therefore please refrain from throwing the object. We promise you a great show, but you need to calm down, ‚Äùhe said. People left, the concert continued the Guns were ready to interrupt the concert, but the organizers still managed to prevent them. While the band returned to the stage after a break from an hour, most visitors had already left the hall. The Guns have thus continued a number of problems that started at concerts in Reading and Leeds. And not just there. In addition to its music, which is a mixture of rock, blues, punk and heavy metal, Guns n 'Roses has always been overwhelmed by the attention of the media and the public of fights, scandals and troubles at concerts. On a European tour, they promote their latest album "Chinese Democracy", to which their loyal fans have been waiting for more than ten years. Axl and the team will perform at the Arena in Zagreb on September 24th.

text: Plakati i naslovnice Darka Vukoviƒáa prvi put u Zagrebu                             Istaknuti dizajner svoje radove, plakate i naslovnice knjiga premijerno izla≈æe i u Zagrebu, u prostorima HMI. Izlo≈æba jednoga od najzapa≈æenijih mlaƒëih grafiƒçkih dizajnera u Srbiji ƒáe tijekom veljaƒçe/o≈æujka biti dostupna javnosti                             U Hrvatskoj matici iseljenika u Zagrebu, 28. sijeƒçnja, otvorena je izlo≈æba Darka Vukoviƒáa Plakati neplakati. Istaknuti dizajner po prvi put svoje radove, plakate i naslovnice knjiga izla≈æe i u Zagrebu, u prostorima HMI. Izlo≈æba ƒáe tijekom veljaƒçe/o≈æujka biti dostupna javnosti.                             Novosaƒëanin Darko Vukoviƒá (1971.) diplomirao je i magistrirao na Katedri za grafiƒçke komunikacije iz predmeta plakat na Akademiji umetnosti u Novom Sadu, na kojoj, od 1997., taj predmet, kao izvanredni profesor, i predaje. Godine 2011., kao gostujuƒái profesor, poƒçinje suradnju s Umjetniƒçkom akademijom u Osijeku. Do sada je realizirao vi≈°e od ≈°ezdeset kazali≈°nih plakata, suraƒëujuƒái, prije svega, s Pozori≈°tem mladih iz Novog Sada, Narodnim pozori≈°tem iz Subotice, Hrvatskim narodnim kazali≈°tem u Osijeku, Hrvatskim narodnim kazali≈°tem u Splitu i Kazali≈°tem mladih iz Splita.                             Na otvaranju izlo≈æbe u Matici prisutnima se, meƒëu kojima su, uz ljubitelje umjetnosti i goste, bili Katarina Hiniƒá uime Dr≈æavnog ureda za Hrvate izvan RH i Mi≈°o Munivrana, tajnik saborskog odbora za Hrvate izvan RH, obratio Tomislav ≈Ωigmanov, ravnatelj Zavoda za kulturu vojvoƒëanskih Hrvata, a o valorizaciji Vukoviƒáeva djela i umjetniƒçkih dosega govorila je povjesniƒçarka umjetnosti Barbara Vujanoviƒá.                             Izlo≈æbu je otvorio ravnatelj HMI Marin Knezoviƒá. Obraƒáajuƒái se prisutnima kazao je kako je ova izlo≈æba plakata Darka Vukoviƒáa vrlo bitna. Ona ukazuje na dio kulture Hrvata u Vojvodini koji se ne skriva od matice glavnih kulturnih tokova. ≈†tovi≈°e, autor je daleko od svake zatvorenosti i ograniƒçenosti, sklon je dosjetci pa i provokaciji, no one nisu sama sebi svrha veƒá dio jedne promi≈°ljene poruke i estetskog koncepta. Ova izlo≈æba bitna je, ne samo kao prikaz umjetniƒçkog djelovanja jednog autora, nego i kao smjernica moguƒáeg djelovanja, jedne hrabrije i otvorenije politike prema kulturi Hrvata izvan Hrvatske. Izlo≈æbu je moderirala Marija Heƒáimoviƒá, voditeljica za hrvatske manjine HMI.                             Vukoviƒá va≈æi za jednog od najzapa≈æenijih mlaƒëih grafiƒçkih dizajnera u Srbiji, a njegovo se ime posebno vezuje za plakatni dizajn, ‚Äûnajumjetniƒçkiju‚Äù od svih dizajnerskih formi. Dobitnik je vi≈°e priznanja i nagrada: Prva nagrada UPIDIV-a na zavr≈°noj izlo≈æbi studenata Departmana likovnih umjetnosti Akademije umjetnosti iz oblasti grafiƒçkog dizajna (1996.); Prva nagrada na natjeƒçaju za vizualni identitet ‚ÄûForme 15‚Ä≤‚Ä≤ (1998.); Nagrada na IX. izlo≈æbi kazali≈°nog plakata u okviru Sterijinog pozorja u konkurenciji plakata projekta (1998.); Specijalna nagrada Narodnog kazali≈°ta iz U≈æica za plakat predstave ‚ÄûPer Gint‚Äù (2000.); Prva i treƒáa nagrada na X. izlo≈æbi kazali≈°nog plakata u okviru Sterijinog pozorja u kategoriji plakata projekta, odnosno realiziranog plakata (2001.); Prva nagrada na natjeƒçaju Narodnog kazali≈°ta u Subotici za plakate predstava ‚ÄûEuropejci‚Äù i ‚ÄûTotek‚Äù (2001.); Prva nagrada na XI. izlo≈æbi kazali≈°nih plakata u okviru Sterijinog pozorja u konkurenciji realiziranih plakata (2004.); Prva nagrada na natjeƒçaju za vizualni identitet ‚ÄûNovosadskog Salona‚Äù (2007.). (d≈°≈°)
translation: For the first time in Zagreb, the cover of Darko Vukovic, a prominent designer of his works, posters and cover covers, premiere in Zagreb, in Zagreb, in the premises of HMI. The exhibition of one of the most notable younger graphic designers in Serbia will be available to the public in the Croatian Matica of the Emigrants in Zagreb during February/March, on January 28, the exhibition of Darko Vukovic is open to crying. For the first time, a prominent designer is exhibiting his works, posters and covers of books in Zagreb, in the premises of HMI. The exhibition will be available to the public during February/March. Novi Sadjanin Darko Vukovic (1971) graduated and received his master's degree from the Chair of Graphic Communication in the Poster at the Academy of Arts in Novi Sad, on which, since 1997, the subject, as an associate professor, and surrender. In 2011, as a visiting professor, he began collaboration with the Academy of Arts in Osijek. So far, he has realized more than sixty theater posters, cooperating, above all, with the theater of young people from Novi Sad, the National Theater from Subotica, the Croatian National Theater in Osijek, the Croatian National Theater in Split and the Youth Theater from Split. At the opening of the exhibition in Matica, attended by Katarina Hinic, in addition to art lovers, on behalf of the State Office for Croats outside the Republic of Croatia and Miso Munivrana, the Secretary of the Parliamentary Committee for Croats outside the Republic of Croatia, was addressed by Tomislav ≈Ωigmanov, Director of the Institute for Culture of Vojvodina Croats , and the valorisation of Vukovic's works and artistic achievements was spoken by art historian Barbara Vujanovic. The exhibition was opened by HMI Director Marin Knezovic. Speaking to the attendees, he said that this exhibition of posters Darko Vukovic is very important. It points to part of the culture of Croats in Vojvodina, who is not hiding from the nut of the main cultural streams. Moreover, the author is far from any imprisonment and limitations, he is prone to files and even provocation, but they are not the purpose of himself but part of a thoughtful message and aesthetic concept. This exhibition is important, not only as an account of the artistic action of one author, but also as a guideline of possible action, a bolder and more open policy towards the culture of Croats outside Croatia. The exhibition was moderated by Marija Heƒáimoviƒá, Head of Croatian Minorities of HMI. Vukovic applies to one of the most notable younger graphic designers in Serbia, and his name is especially attached to the crying design, "most exchanged" than all designer forms. He is the recipient of several awards and prizes: the first prize of the absorbent at the final exhibition of students of the Department of Fine Arts of the Academy of Arts in the field of graphic design (1996); The first prize in the competition for the visual identity of "Form 15 ‚Ä≤ ‚Ä≤ (1998); Award at IX. exhibitions of theater poster within Steria's respect in the project posters (1998); Special Award of the National Theater from Uzice for the poster of the play "Per Gint" (2000); The first and third prize at the X exhibition of theater poster within Steria's attraction in the project posters, ie the realized poster (2001); The first prize at the National Theater Competition in Subotica for posters "Europeans" and "Totek" (2001); The first prize on XI. exhibitions of theater posters within Steria's respect in the competition of realized posters (2004); The first prize in the competition for the visual identity of the "Novi Sad Salon" (2007). (D≈†≈†)
