text: PRAVILNIK O IZLETIMA                             PRAVILNIK                             o pripremanju, organiziranju i voƒëenju izleta, tura i pohoda                             Ovim Pravilnikom odreƒëena su pravila pripreme, organizacije i voƒëenja izleta, tura i pohoda, kao i sve druge obaveze svih sudionika izleta, tura i pohoda.                             Znaƒçenje pojma "izlet" u daljnjem tekstu obuhvaƒáa planinarske izlete, ture i pohode. Druge planinarske akcije koje se izvode u planini, kao ≈°to su logorovanja,istra≈æivanja, ekspedicije, ≈°kole, seminari, sastanci, zborovi i dr., ne smatraju se izletima u smislu ovoga pravilnika te se organiziraju i provode sukladno posebnim aktima i odlukama.                             - ƒçl. 2 -                             Voditelji izleta obavezni su izlet organizirati sukladno pravilima HPS Zagreb, pridr≈æavati se planinarske etike i drugih sigurnosnih uvjeta.                             - ƒçl. 3 -                             Voditelj izleta imenovan je u godi≈°njem planu izleta uz moguƒánost zamjene u izuzetnim okolnostima, a odluku o tome donosi predsjednik Dru≈°tva.                             - ƒçl. 4 -                             Voditelj izleta du≈æan je planirani izlet najaviti najmanje 15 dana prije izleta na dru≈°tvenom sastanku i oglasnoj ploƒçi dru≈°tva. Objava izleta mora obavezno sadr≈æavati opis puta i destinacije te podatke o tehniƒçkoj i fiziƒçkoj zahtjevnosti izleta, du≈æini hodanja izra≈æenoj u satima i o potrebnoj opremi i tehniƒçkim pomagalima.                             - ƒçl. 5 -                             Tro≈°kovi prijevoza planiraju se prema tro≈°kovima za 80% popunjenih mjesta u autobusu uveƒáanih za 5%, a voditelj odluƒçuje o odgodi izleta 6 dana prije polaska na izlet ako nema dovoljan broj uplaƒáenih prijava ili najkasnije dan prije izleta uslijed vremenskih i sliƒçnih nepogoda. U tom sluƒçaju voditelj je du≈æan pravovremeno obavijestiti sve prijavljene za izlet, za ≈°to se mu prizna povrat tro≈°kova sukladno ƒçlanku 7. ovog pravilnika.                             - ƒçl. 7 -                             Voditelji su osloboƒëeni plaƒáanja tro≈°kova izleta (tro≈°kova prijevoza i tro≈°kova noƒáenja). Voditeljima izleta se isplaƒáuju i tro≈°kovi organizacije izleta (kao raƒçuni za telefon, mobitel, po≈°tarinu i sl.). Navedene tro≈°kove voditelj pravda i dokazuje kod blagajnika Dru≈°tva.                             - ƒçl. 8 -                             U izletima mogu sudjelovati iskljuƒçivo ƒçlanovi planinarskih udruga.                             - ƒçl. 9 -                             - ƒçl. 10 -                             - ƒçl. 11 -                             Po zavr≈°etku izleta voditelj je du≈æan pismeno u roku od 3 dana izvr≈°iti obraƒçun tro≈°kova izleta i proslijediti isti blagajniku na provedbu u financijskim dokumentima.
translation: The Ordinance on Excursions The Ordinance on the preparation, organization and running of excursions, tours and campaigns with this Ordinance were determined by the rules of preparation, organization and running of excursions, tours and hikes, as well as all other obligations of all participants of the trips, tour and hikes. The meaning of the term "excursion" hereby includes mountaineering excursions, tours and visits. Other mountaineering actions performed in the mountain, such as camps, research, expeditions, schools, seminars, meetings, choirs, etc., are not considered excursions within the meaning of this Ordinance and are organized and implemented in accordance with special acts and decisions. - Art. 2 - Excursion leaders are obliged to organize a trip in accordance with the rules of HPS Zagreb, complying with mountaineering ethics and other security conditions. - Art. 3 - The trip leader was appointed an annual excursion plan with the possibility of replacement in exceptional circumstances, and the decision on this is made by the President of the Society. - Art. 4 - The excursion leader is obliged to announce the planned excursion at least 15 days before the excursion at the social meeting and the advertisement board of the company. The announcement of the trip must contain a description of the path and destination and information on the technical and physical complexity of the excursion, the length of walking expressed in hours and on the necessary equipment and technical aids. - Art. 5 - Transport costs are planned according to the costs of 80% of the seats filled on the bus by 5%, and the presenter decides to postpone the excursion 6 days before departure on the excursion if there is no sufficient number of applications paid or no later than the day before the excursion due to the time and similar disasters. In this case, the manager is obliged to inform all registered trips in a timely manner, for which he is recognized by the return of costs in accordance with Article 7 of this Ordinance. - Art. 7 - The leaders are exempt from paying out the cost of excursion (transportation costs and overnight costs). Excursion leaders are also paid the cost of organizing a trip (as a phone account, cell phone, postage, etc.). The above costs are the leader of justice and proves to the Treasurer of the Company. - Art. 8 - Exclusively members of mountaineering associations can participate in excursions. - Art. 9 - - Art. 10 - - Art. 11 - Upon completion of the excursion, the leader is obliged to make a calculation of the excursion cost within 3 days and forward the same treasurer to the implementation in financial documents.
translation (annotation, run 2): Rulebook on excursions  Ordinance  On the preparation, organization and running of excursions, tours and hikes  With this Ordinance, the rules of the preparation, organization and management of excursions, tours and hikes, as well as all other obligations of all participants of the trip, tour and hikes, were determined.  The meaning of the term "excursion" hereby includes mountaineering excursions, tours and visits.Other mountaineering actions performed in the mountain, such as camps, research, expeditions, schools, seminars, meetings, choirs, etc., are not considered excursions within the meaning of this Ordinance and are organized and implemented in accordance with special acts and decisions.  - Art.2 - -  Excursionists are obliged to organize an excursion in accordance with the rules of HPS Zagreb, complying with mountaineering ethics and other security conditions.  - Art.3 - -  The excursion manager was appointed in the annual excursion plan, with the possibility of replacing exceptional circumstances, and the decision of this is made by the President of the Society.  - Art.4 -  The excursion leader is obliged to announce the planned excursion at least 15 days before the excursion at the social meeting and the advertisement board of the company.The announcement of the trip must contain a description of the path and destination and information on the technical and physical complexity of the excursion, the length of walking expressed in hours and on the necessary equipment and technical aids.  - Art.5 -  Transport costs are planned according to the costs of 80% of the seats filled on the bus by 5%, and the presenter decides on the output of the excursion 6 days before departure on the excursion if there is no sufficient number of applications paid or no later than the day before the excursion due to the weather and similar disasters.In this case, the manager is obliged to inform all registered trips in a timely manner, for which he is recognized by the return of costs in accordance with Article 7 of this Ordinance.  - Art.7 -  The leaders are exempt from paying out the cost of excursion (transportation costs and overnight costs).Excursion leaders are also paid the cost of organizing a trip (as a phone account, cell phone, postage, etc.).The above costs are the leader of justice and proves to the Treasurer of the Company.  - Art.8 -  Only members of mountaineering associations can participate in excursions.  - Art.9 -  - Art.10 -  - Art.11 -  Upon completion of the excursion, the leader is obliged to make a calculation of the excursion costs within 3 days and forward the same to the cashier on the implementation in financial documents.

translation: Preparation cut beef and vegetables into cubes. Put the beef on heated oil and simmer over low heat until all the water from the meat has evaporated. Add the onions and peppers. Stir for a few minutes until the onions soften. Add sweet peppers, cumin, chili and pellets. Mix everything well. Add water, but only as much as you need to cover the ingredients, and let it cook for about 30 minutes. Add potatoes, sugar, salt and pepper. Cook for another 30 minutes to an hour, or until the meat and potatoes soften.

text: Pripremam se za skora≈°nje natjecanje iz kemije , koju sam dosad shvaƒáao potpuno ,dok se nisu pojavile polarne i nepolarne molekule. Mo≈æete li mi objasniti kako da odredim polarnost molekula? translation: I am preparing for the recent chemistry competition, which I have understood so far, until polar and non -in -law molecules have appeared. Can you explain to me how to determine the polarity of the molecule? I know the question is not quality but I just understand almost nothing. Thank you in advance. The fact that polarity is often written here, as well as the methods of recognizing polar from non -generous molecules. In short, the molecule is polar if its dipole moment is different from zero. The dipole moment of molecules is equal to the sum of the dipole moments of individual connections in that molecule. The connections are more polar (ie, the dipole moments are greater), which are connected by atoms of different electronegativity. For symmetrical molecules that have polar connections (tetrachloromety, carbon dioxide) dipole moments are canceled and molecules are undoubtedly. Optimum bi bilo uvoƒëenje plivajuƒáih tro≈°arina, po uzoru na neke druge zemlje, no time bi si dr≈æava izbila solidan prihod u turistiƒçkoj sezoni pa je pitanje ≈æeli li iƒái na taj potez u ovom trenutku.                             Dr≈æava je veƒá intervenirala u cijene goriva, ukinuv≈°i obvezu primje≈°avanja biokomponente (0,50kn/l), smanjene su tro≈°arine za 0,20 kn/litri, a zbog ni≈æe cijene manje ije i iznos obraƒçunatog PDV-a. translation: The tagova Tportal's source, from which they regularly receive accurate forecasts and information about fuel prices, claims that from next week the prices of all diesel fuels will go up for as many as 90 lipa per liter, while the gasoline will jump by about 70 lipa per liter. In other words, a full tank of a 50 liter diesel, which now costs about 650 kuna, will go to about 700 kuna. No better gas owners will go, because the average tank, which now costs 700 kuna, will go to 750 kuna or just less than a round one hundred euros. Economy Minister Davor Filipovic, the other day, stated that the state was following prices and that he would react as needed, and today Prime Minister Plenkovic, who said he could intervene in margins and excise duties, and that he would discuss this today. Optimum would be the introduction of swimming excise duties, modeled on some other countries, but in doing so, the state would break out of solid revenue in the tourist season, so the question is whether it wants to go to that move at the moment. The state has already intervened in fuel prices, abolishing the obligation to consume biocomposes (0.50kn/L), excise duties by 0.20 kn/liter have been reduced, and due to the lower price of less and the amount of the calculated VAT. The carriers suggested to reduce or temporarily suspend the minimum amount of excise duties at EU level, which was placed at 330 euros at 1,000 l, per EU guidelines.

text: Juƒçer smo u na≈°oj ≈°koli ugostili JUMICAR ekipu koja je za uƒçenike drugih razreda odr≈æala edukaciju u sklopu "Programa prometne kulture za najmlaƒëe". Edukacija se sastojala od teorijskog i praktiƒçnog dijela. U teorijskom dijelu uƒçenici su uƒçili kako se pravilno pona≈°ati u prometu, koja su prometna pravila, a ponovili su i telefonske brojeve koje mogu nazvati u hitnim sluƒçajevima. Praktiƒçni dio odvijao se na poligonu postavljenom na ≈°kolskom igrali≈°tu gdje su uƒçenici samostalno upravljali mini automobilima pod budnim okom edukatora i djelatnika Policijske postaje Ozalj.                             U edukaciji su sudjelovali i ƒçlanovi DVD-a Jurovski Brod, ƒçlanovi Gradskog dru≈°tva Crvenog kri≈æa Ozalj i ekipa Hrvatskog centra za razminiranje. Tako su uƒçenici mogli saznati vi≈°e i o zanimanju policajca, za≈°titi od po≈æara, osnovama prve pomoƒái i za≈°titi od mina. Na edukaciji su sudjelovali i uƒçenici O≈† Netretiƒá. Polaznicima je tako na lak i zabavan naƒçin omoguƒáeno stjecanje va≈ænih znanja za sigurno sudjelovanje u prometu te su upuƒáeni na pravilne reakcije u kriznim situacijama.                             Polaznike su obi≈°le i zamjenica ≈æupana dr. sc. Vesna Hajsan Dolinar, vi≈°a struƒçna suradnica za ≈°kolstvo i mlade gƒëa Irena Bo≈æiƒçeviƒá te naƒçelnik Opƒáine ≈Ωakanje gosp. Danijel Jurka≈°.
translation: Yesterday we hosted a Jumicar team at our school, which held an education for students of other classes as part of the "Transport Culture Program for the youngest". Education consisted of a theoretical and practical part. In the theoretical part, students learned how to properly behave in traffic, what traffic rules, and they repeated telephone numbers that they could call in emergencies. The practical part took place on a polygon set on the school playground where students independently managed mini cars under the watchful eye of educators and employees of Ozalj Police Station. Members of the Jurovski Brod DVD, members of the Ozalj Red Cross City Society and the Croatian Mine Center for Deminating, also participated in the education. So students could find out more about the profession of a police officer, fire protection, first aid basics and mines protection. The students of the Netretiƒá Elementary School also participated in the education. The students are thus easy and entertaining enabled to gain important knowledge for safe participation in traffic and have been sent to proper reactions in crisis situations. Deputy Mayor Dr. Sc. Vesna Hajsan Dolinar, Senior Expert Associate for Education and Youth, Ms. Irena Bozicevic and Mayor of Zakanje Mr. Daniel Jurkash.

text: Zarada                             Neki uƒçeni Kinez bio je pozvan na sveuƒçili≈°te u Berlinu. Njegov njemaƒçki kolega doƒçekao ga je u zraƒçnoj luci. Nakon pozdrava, obojica se upute na autobusnu postaju. Tu je veƒá stajao autobus spreman na polazak. Njemaƒçki profesor povuƒçe kolegu Kineza za ruku viƒçuƒái: ‚ÄúLijepo vas molim da malo po≈æurite!‚Äù Potrƒçali su i u posljednji ƒças u≈°li u autobus. Vrata su se zatvorila i autobus je krenuo. Nijemac je duboko odahnuo i pogledao na sat. ‚ÄúBogu hvala, u≈°tedjeli smo deset minuta.‚Äù Kinez ga je znati≈æeljno pogledao i smije≈°eƒái se upitao: ‚ÄúA ≈°to ƒáemo uƒçiniti s tih deset minuta?‚Äù                             Nije toliko va≈æno da budemo zaokupljeni poslom, koliko je va≈æan sam razlog zaokupljenosti.
translation: The earnings of a learned Chinese were invited to the University of Berlin. His German colleague greeted him at the airport. After greeting, they both go to the bus station. There was already a bus ready to leave. A German professor pulls a colleague of the Chinese by the hand, shouting, "Please, please hurry up a little!" They ran and got on the bus at the last minute. The door closed and the bus started. The German breathed deeply and looked at the watch. "Thank God, we saved ten minutes." The Chinese looked at him curiously and smiled at him, "What do we do with those ten minutes?" It is not so important that we are preoccupied with the job, how important the very reason for preoccupation is.

It is not so important that we are preoccupied with the job, how important the very reason for preoccupation is.

text: Projekt belgijske nacionalne televizije i u Hrvatskoj                             Tra≈æe se "blizanci"                             Iz belgijske nezavisne produkcijske kuƒáe Woestijnvis (www.woestijnvis), koja radi dokumentarni projekt za belgijsku dr≈æavnu televiziju (www.VRT.be), zamoljeni smo za pomoƒá i posredovanje.                             Ukratko, radi se o kratkim dokumentarnim filmovima koji bi poku≈°ali odgovoriti na pitanje - Kakav bi bio moj ≈æivot da se nisam rodio u Belgiji, nego u nekom drugom dijelu svijeta?                             Za potrebe snimanja odabrana su 22 stanovnika Belgije (15 mu≈°karaca i 7 ≈æena), kojima se sada tra≈æe "blizanci" u razliƒçitim zemljama svijeta, a koji bi odgovorili na nekoliko pitanja o svojoj kulturi, navikama, iskustvima i naƒçinu ≈æivota u svojoj zemlji. Tako bi se, primjerice, napravili paralelni portreti ljudi roƒëenih istog dana, mjeseca i godine u drugim dijelovima svijeta - vatrogasca iz New Yorka, igraƒça kriketa iz Pakistana, bankara iz Koreje, trgovca iz Dubaia i sliƒçno.                             Jedna od zemalja u kojima se tra≈æe osobe voljne sudjelovati u projektu je i Hrvatska, jer smatraju da su na≈°a povijest i kultura vrlo zanimljivi.                             Najveƒái problem je pronaƒái osobe koje su roƒëene istoga dana, istoga mjeseca i godine kao veƒá izabrani Belgijci.                             Dakle, ako ste roƒëeni na jedan od ovih datuma ili pak poznajete bilo koga tko to jest (mama, baka, teta, stric, ujak, djed, prijatelj...), javite se.                             Belgijci ƒáe vam biti vrlo zahvalni. Naravno, prevoditelj je osiguran.                             Mo≈æete kontaktirati i na≈°e uredni≈°tvo, a direktna adresa u Belgiji je Tess Uytterhoeven, tel.: 0032 2 303 35 85 ili e-mail: twins@docfish.be i tess.uytterhoeven@woestijnvis.be.
translation: The Belgian National Television project is being sought in Croatia with "twins" from Belgian Independent Production House Woestijnvis (www.woestijnvis), which is doing a documentary project for Belgian State Television (www.vrt.be), we are asked to help and mediate. In short, these are short documentaries that would try to answer the question - what would my life be if I had not been born in Belgium than in another part of the world? For the purpose of recording, 22 inhabitants of Belgium (15 men and 7 women) were selected, who are now seeking "twins" in different countries of the world, who would answer a few questions about their culture, habits, experiences and lifestyle in their country. So, for example, they would make parallel portraits of people born on the same day, months and years in other parts of the world - a firefighter from New York, a Kriznik player from Pakistan, a banker from Korea, a dealer from Dubai and the like. One of the countries in which persons are being willing to participate in the project is Croatia, because they believe that our history and culture are very interesting. The biggest problem is to find people born on the same day, the same month and year as already elected Belgians. So, if you were born on one of these dates or you know anyone who is (Mom, Grandma, Aunt, Uncle, Uncle, Santa, Friend ...), call. Belgians will be very grateful to you. Of course, the translator is insured. You can also contact our editorial board as well, and the direct address in Belgium is TESS UYTTERHOEVEN, tel.: 0032 2 303 35 85 or e-mail: twins@docfish.be and tess.uytterhoeven@woestijnvis.be.

translation: Paleo and gluten free plums with a late summer photo: Shutterstock the more plums you add cakes, the more liquid will be. If you add more than 5 plums, the cake will be a much moist healthy cow to become this delicious plum cake paleo without gluten and without refined sugar. The dough is soft and juicy, and plums are attractive and sweet. Preparation: Mix all dough dough ingredients in a medium -sized mixing bowl. Stir the dough until the ingredients are evenly combined. Grease a cake pan lined with baking paper with one teaspoon of coconut oil. Then place the plum halves on the bottom of the cake pan. Sprinkle the plums with one tablespoon of maple syrup and a pinch of sea salt. Pour the cake dough over the plums and bake the cake at 180 degrees for 65 minutes or until golden brown. Comments 0

translation: HTC One Max officially introduced - prepare big paws not that it comes to us as a surprise, but it still makes us happy. HTC has officially removed the rather translucent veil of mystery from its first phablet called HTC One Max. We no longer have to speculate and guess anything. Everything is known. HTC One Max is the third member of this year's HTC One family, and the biggest. With a 5.9 -inch diagonal screen, it is somewhere between the Samsung Galaxy Note 3 and the Sonye Xperie z ultra. The screen is a super LCD3 and has a full HD, the wickedness that gives about 374 PPI in that diagonal, so enough to enjoy surfing the web, multimedia and branch. It is moving with a quad-core Snapdragon 600 tact of 1.7 GHz, just like HTC One, and 2 GB of RAM annexes that everything is smooth. There will be models with 16GB and 32GB of internal storage. Although it very much wants to resemble HTC One with its design, it is more of a reminder of the enlarged HTC One Mini. There are a lot of differences again. The first and basic is a fingerprint sensor on the back, and the second is the rear cover that is removed and opening the way to the slots with a micro SIM card as well as a microSD card, which can be expanded by an internal memory by an additional 64GB. There, the same is the same 4 MP UltraPixel camera, known from HTC One. There is no more beats audio logo on the back, so it is not possible to conclude that these technologies are not integrated. The front are the same those boomsound speakers, one above and the other below the screen where two are again two instead of three Android keys with a HTC logo. For the sake of better ergonomics, the Power button moved from the top of the device to the right brid under the volume control button, while the IR Blaster remained above for the functionality of the universal remote control. Otherwise, Android 4.3 and somewhat refreshed HTC Sense 5.5. Gabariti is a large, and detailed measures are: 164.5 x 82.5 x 10.29 mm and 217 g. He arrives on the market in the UK tomorrow tomorrow, and then in the rest of the world, and I guess we have no official information yet. How much HTC One Max can help HTC to start ascending again, it's questionable. If it had a good price, there could be interest. Everything was known before, no novelty. Why are the letters with diacritical signs in the article? 0 Reply boar does not have an IPS screen, a weaker hardware than on the notes3, the dimensions and the mass should not even comment on.

text: Batine kao mjera ka≈ænjavanja u Vojnoj krajini                             Vojna kraji≈°ka vlast brinula se o javnom redu i miru, a zajedno s Crkvom i o moralu. Za pogrdne i sramne ƒçinove nije bio ka≈ænjen samo poƒçinitelj, veƒá i onaj koji ga u tome ƒçinu nije sprijeƒçio. Podƒçasnici su sve nadgledali: mu≈°karce, ≈æene i djecu. Kazne su javno ƒçitane i izvr≈°avane uz nazoƒçnost mje≈°tana, obiƒçno ispred zgrade kapetanije. Tu se nalazila stalno postavljena klupa za batinanje s okovima, ili se iznesla iz kapetanije prije izvr≈°enja kazne. Ka≈ænjavalo se batinama ljeskovim ≈°tapom (15 ‚Äì 25 batina po debelom mesu), a ako je do≈°lo do opetovanog prekr≈°aja, slijedio je zatvor. Batinao je za to odreƒëeni ƒçasnik a pri pukovnijskom sudu posebni batina≈° (Stockmeister).
translation: Batina as a measure of punishment in the Military Frontier Military Krajina government took care of public order and peace, and together with the Church and the Morality. The people, having a strict military administration in mind, lived according to military rules and principles of faith, so there were very few public sinner. If there were, the military authorities were strictly punished. It was punished for various actions: quarrels, gossip, interfering with someone else's married life, theft, forest damage, siding, avoiding mass and religious instruction, work on Sundays and holidays, reluctance and more. The military authorities were punished by beating, running through the wicked, prison, forced work, and for the most severe pre -existence and death. Curses and blasphemy were particularly forbidden and punished. Not only the perpetrator was punished for derogatory and shameful ranks, but also the one who did not prevent him in this act. The underpass was overseen by men, men, women and children. The penalties were publicly read and executed with the presence of the locals, usually in front of the captaincy building. There was a permanent bench for beating with shackles, or leaving the captaincy before the sentence executed. The beating of the hazel rod (15 - 25 beats per thick meat) was punished, and if a repeated offense occurred, prison followed. He was beaten for a certain officer and a special bat (Stockmeister) in the Regimental Court.

translation (annotation, run 2): I am not a person from the list, especially not a list of desires, not because I do not want anything, but in most cases where I want something to buy it.I decided to make this list for the reason that I can forget about a product, so I buy some similar ones, and there is no point in having two similar or products with the same effect.I look at this list more as a signpost, something not to stray and I wonder how much product I will take off the list in a year.  The star of this post is the Essence Nadlak from the Holo Graphics varnish collection with a holo effect.The base of this varnish is transparent, and there are many small particles that are pressed with all the colors.The varnish has a typical Essence wider brush that can be nicely applied to the nail and what I like is that it dries quickly.I wore it on various varnishes, and to see how beautiful it is, I will show you in several combinations, and its full beauty is obtained in the sun, that is, when it is a sunny day.  Today I planned to type another post, but in talking to my sister, I decided on a Wish list.It is not WL products that are quiet suffering, as well as products that are not available in our stores, but a small cosmetic list of products of products that would soon be wanted to obtain, which are used daily.My mom and sister are struggling to buy me for Christmas, and with the main gift they would take some little things from cosmetics, and yet I don't know what it is so I am surprised to like it.As I am a cosmetic freak, they do not dare to take something on their own, and they are not guys who would set aside several hundred kunas for one shadow palette.So I came up with the idea of making this slightly different cosmetic list :)  In March, I still stick to that I will only buy what I need.And it was like that.My new in this month may not seem small for the Goodie Baga Sponsor Avon Beauty Blog Day 2014, which were really wonderful and thank you on this occasion, and you can read here on the BBD here. text: Tutti noi ci troveremo lass√π, tutti.                             ≈†to tek reƒái za svetog Augustina: on i jest ≈æivio kao Hef pa se onda toga odrekao. Besmisleno... Ali ako veƒá jest kasno za Franu i Tina, nije za nas. Ne gubimo vrijeme...                             Upravo bih ovakva zamucivanja htio izbjeci. Dakle, jedno je kad Papa kurtoazno primi sal za koji se uspostavi da je u duginim bojama, a sasvim nesto drugo kad Papa na redovitoj opcoj audijenciji kaze bez ikakvih ograda nesto poput ovog gore.                             Naravno da neƒáe svi u raj (papa govori o Crkvi koja ide k Novom Jeruzalemu, Raju). Ti Toma sasvim sigurno neƒáe≈° u raj. Koliko si se nalagao o papi i ispljuvao Kristovu Zaruƒçnicu mo≈æe samo sluga Sotone.                             Ovo "tutti" je naravno mislio svi oni koji ce ici u raj. Recenicu zapravo potpuno prirodno treba citati: Svi [koji ne zavrse u paklu, nego u raju] ƒáemo se naƒái tamo gore, svi [koji ne zavrse u paklu, nego u raju].                             Dobro ste primjetili da i u doba novog milosrdja ima onih koji nece u raj. To su oni koji su zatvoreni za novosti koje donosi duh ili izvlace jednu ili dvije ili stotinu Papinih izjava i cina iz "konteksta".                             Toƒçno je da Papa nije rekao da ba≈° svi idu u raj. Marko je dobro primjetio za Tomu, ali ako bolje poslu≈°amo snimku, lijepo se ƒçuje ≈°to je papa stvarno rekao i koga je sve spomenuo: Tutti noi ci troveremo lass√π, tutti, meno Mons Lefebvre e Hitler (forse) e Toma Blizanac da Croazia. E‚Äô bello, d√† forza all‚Äôanima.                             Toma, uƒçiti talijanski, a ne ƒçitati sedevakantistiƒçke i sliƒçne stranice.                             Marko, Mario ili kako se vec sad zovete, mozda biste vi mogli otvoriti stranicu na kojoj biste nam davali ispravne interpretacije Papinih izjava. U medjuvremenu ne morate vise visiti ovdje.                             Takoƒëer da ne bi bilo zabune tj. da netko stvarno ne pomisli da je na≈° papa zatra≈æio ‚Äûblagoslov‚Äú od nekakvog ≈°izmatika. http://rorate-caeli.blogspot.com/2014/11/never-before-seen-francis-bows-his-head.html                             Naime razlog je sasvim drugi. Papa Franjo je probao u maniri izbacivaƒça iz disko kluba, ≈°to je veƒá sam priznao da je u mladosti bio, ƒçelom razbiti nos Bartolomeju. Sama izjava Bartomeleja o tome kako ga je taj papin ƒçin doslovno zateknuo, govori ovome u prilog. Na ≈æalost ili na sreƒáu, pozne godine na≈°eg pape, uƒçinile su svoje, te je papa dobrano proma≈°io. Na kraju je taj ƒçin ispao osim smije≈°an i vrlo neugodan za papu. Bartolomej se dobro sna≈°ao i izbjegao taj udarac, ali poljupcem u ƒçelo dao do znanja da se papa neƒáe izvuƒái i da ƒáe osveta uslijediti. Mislim da u predstojeƒáem vremenu svi moramo pojaƒçano moliti za papinu sigurnost , kao i ne zaletati se u preranim zakljuƒçcima i komentarima papinih gesti i govora.                             Predlazem meditaciju "Passive scandal" koju mozete naci na ovim stranicama: http://www.sensustraditionis.org/multimedia.html. Inace su sve meditacije jako dobre, ali ova je bas prigodna za temu iz posta.                             Otvorio sam neke govore. Glas mi je identiƒçan s onim jednog propovjednika iz youtube kanala "Video Sancto", ako ti je poznato.                             Bok Toma, mislim da je ovo ono sto trazis. Lijepi pozdrav. https://bergoglionate.wordpress.com/tag/bergoglionate/
translation: Tutti noi ci slam Lass√π, Tutti. What to say about St. Augustine: He lived as Hef and then renounced it. Meaningless ... but if it's too late for Fran and Tina, it's not for us. We don't waste our time ... I just would like to avoid this kind of turbidity. So, one thing is when the pope turns down the sal for which it is established in rainbow colors, and something else when the pope on a regular general audience says something like this above. Of course not everyone will go to heaven (the pope talks about the Church that goes to New Jerusalem, paradise). You certainly won't go to heaven. How much did you seek about the pope and spit out the fianc√©e of Christ only a servant of Satan. This "Tutti", of course, thought all those who would go to heaven. The sentence is actually completely natural to read: all [who do not end in hell, but in paradise] we will find ourselves up there, all [who do not end in hell but in paradise]. You have noticed well that even in the time of new mercy, there are those who will not go to heaven. These are those closed to the news that brings the spirit or draws one or two or two or a hundred of the Pope's statements and the act from the "context". It is true that the Pope did not say that everyone was going to heaven. Marko noticed well for that, but if we better listen to the recording, it is nice to hear that the Pope really said and who he mentioned: Tutti noi ci slam Lass√π, Tutti, Mons Mons Lefebvre e Hitler (Forsse) e Toma Gemini da Croazia. E 'Bello, d√† forza all'ani. Thomas, learn Italian, not read the sedevakantic and similar pages. Marko, Mario, or as you are already called now, maybe you could open a page where you would give us the correct interpretations of the Pope's statement. In the meantime, you don't have to hang here anymore. Also, it would not be confused, that is, if someone really did not think that our Pope had asked for a "blessing" from some kind of schismatics. http://rorate-caeli.blogspot.com/2014/11/never-before-seen-francis-bows-his-head.html, the reason is quite different. Pope Francis tried in the manner of an ejector from the disco club, which he himself admitted to being a young age, to break the nose of Bartolome. Bartomele's statement itself about how that Pope's act literally made it, says this in support. Unfortunately or fortunately, the late years of our Pope, did their own, and the Pope missed well. In the end, the act turned out except funny and very unpleasant to the pope. Bartolomej managed well and avoided that blow, but by kissing the forehead, let him know that the Pope would not get out and that revenge would follow. I think in the upcoming time we all have to pray for the pope's safety, as well as not to rush in the premature conclusions and comments of the Pope's gestures and speech. The proposal of "Passive Scandal" meditation you can find on these pages: http://www.sensustradijionius.org/multimedia.html. Otherwise, all meditations are very good, but this one is just like the topic from fasting. I opened some speeches. My voice is identical to that one preacher from the YouTube channel "Video Sancto", if you know. Hi Thomas, I think this is what you are looking for. A nice greeting. https://bergoglionate.wordpress.com/tag/bergoglionate/

translation: Walking through the forest in our hand, we took some land. Watched Smoje and smelled. When we smelled it, we felt the smell of humidity and rot. The soil was covered with autumn leaves. The color of the earth was brown. The country was hard. The soil was partially illuminated. Where the tree canopies are thick plants on the ground layer are rare. There are more of the sun in places where there are more sun, shrubs and herbaceous plants between the tree canopy. We saw a lot of mosses on the ground and with trunks that are gentle and soft to the touch. Many mosses still have last year's sporgons. The ferns have already developed young leaves. On the old leaves of the ferns we saw Soruse. Forests stopped blooming. We saw many ghosts on the ground because it is oak forest.

translation: In accordance with the above, we ask all students who have difficulty working in a virtual classroom to report to their classmates, subjects or professional services (lidija.has@gmail.com) who will help them deal with difficulty and adapt to a new way of working. In attachments at the end of the text, we send you video instructions for working in a virtual classroom again. Once again, we remind you that according to the Ministry's guidelines, students are obliged to perform tasks, follow the instructions and participate in the activities of teachers and professional associates. The online way of learning and teaching is as important as the previous way. In order for students to develop knowledge, skills and competencies within different teaching subjects, it is of utmost importance that they solve the default school tasks and follow the instructions of teachers and professional associates. Feedback and grades that students receive in virtual teaching will also be used when adopting concluding grades. According to the Ministry's instructions, if the student does not resolve the task within the given deadline, and did not report to the possible difficulties, a classmate, a teacher or professional associate, he is entered in the e-diary for the teaching subject for which the student did not submit a school task. In the event of an absence enrollment, the parent is obliged to justify it to the class teacher.

Once again, we remind you that according to the Ministry's guidelines, students are obliged to perform tasks, follow the instructions and participate in the activities of teachers and professional associates.The online way of learning and teaching is as important as the previous way.In order for students to develop knowledge, skills and competencies within different teaching subjects, it is of utmost importance that they solve the default school tasks and follow the instructions of teachers and professional associates.Feedback and grades that students receive in virtual teaching will also be used when adopting concluding grades.According to the Ministry's instructions, if the student does not resolve the task within the given deadline, and did not report to the possible difficulties, a classmate, a teacher or professional associate, he is entered in the e-diary for the teaching subject for which the student did not submit a school task.In the event of an absence enrollment, the parent is obliged to justify it to the class teacher.

translation: Summary of the presentation on the analysis of the results of the research of the charter market of Germany's introduction to the Introduction we warmly welcome you after another Yacht-Pool socializing. We thank for the interest and attendance of our presentation "Analysis of the Research Research Research for the German Market Market for 2005", in which we dedicated a significant place to the Croatian - Slovenian segment. We respond to your expressed interest in the summary of the presentation, as we promised. The presentation to remind those who already know and to present ourselves to those who do not know us enough. In 2002, in "Marinpol", our marketing program, we have globally determined the content of our wing: "Yacht-Pool More than Insurance". At that time, we found that our vision was to ensure a sense of satisfaction, carelessness and protection to owners and users of a vessel for sports and leisure and to establish a partner relationship with our clients with our clients. We have also designed that our mission is in a narrow coverage: promoting the activities of the Sports and Reneason Services Services Services in Croatia. In a wider coverage, we strive to add value to "our basic business through: introduction, expanding and providing pecialized knowledge in yachting, primarily in the field of business management and environment. In this sense, we address our products, above all, charter companies and agencies, yacht and fleet owners, shipping and motor services, ship bidders, leasing houses, marina and all other nautical chain links. The Yacht-Pool market approach strategy since then, to this day, we have organized more sets in the form of presentations, seminars and workshops, on a large number of intriguing nautical topics: from sea security, responsibility in the charter, to Rigging, Contemporary determinants of the quality and construction and servicing of ships. We regularly cooperate with numerous nautical magazines, and for members and partners of our association we also issue our own "Yacht-Pool Rev.". We have also held a very successful Yacht-Pool Friendship Day in Poreƒç for three years in a row. Here, we are constantly trying to mention such activities and contents that the mentioned slogan "more than insurance" has a real, useful, usable, but also comfortable content. Completing with the presentation of what we do, let's say a few words about us who do it. You can download a computational presentation and material from the seminar here: an analysis of the German charter market.

text: Vojna imovina dostupna svima                             FOTO: xandroid                             A                             +                             -                             Internetska stranica Vojna imovina (Military map) nastala je u sklopu projekta PINS: Public interest - not saleable (Javni interes - nije na prodaju), kojeg su tijekom 2013. i 2014. godine, uz financijsku podr≈°ku Europske unije, provodili Centar za mirovne studije kao nositelj projekta te partneri Transparency International Maƒëarska, Transparency International UK, Sveuƒçili≈°te u Zagrebu, Zelena Istra, Eko Zadar i Cenzura Plus.                             U sklopu projekta prouƒçavani su procesi konverzija vojnih nekretnina koji su zapoƒçeli samostalno≈°ƒáu Hrvatske, a posebno su odabrani primjeri konverzija u Puli ‚Äì kompleks Muzil, Zagrebu ‚Äì biv≈°a vojna bolnica Vla≈°ka, Zadar ‚Äì biv≈°a vojarna Stjepan Radiƒá i Visu ‚Äì vojarna Samogor. Rezultati ove ƒçetiri konverzije detaljno su opisani u publikaciji Kome propadaju biv≈°e vojne nekretnine? Iskustva prenamjene u Hrvatskoj koju mo≈æete pronaƒái u javnim knji≈ænicama u navedenim gradovima te u knji≈ænici Centra za mirovne studije u tiskanom izdanju, a dostupna je i za besplatni download.                             Stranicu je izradio Rationalinternational, a na njoj su vizualno objavljene i prikazane neke od vojnih nekretnina koje MORH ocjenjuje kao neperspektivne. "Pomoƒáu ovoga weba ≈æelimo nastaviti pratiti konverzije vojnih nekretnina i nakon zavr≈°etka projekta PINS. Zastavice na karti Hrvatske koju vidite na webu predstavljaju vojne nekretnine koje je Ministarstvo obrane RH ocijenio neperspektivnima. Neke od tih nekretnina su predane na kori≈°tenje DUUDI-ju (Dr≈æavni ured za upravljanje dr≈æavnom imovinom), neke su predane na upravljanje jedinici lokalne uprave ili samouprave, a neke su jo≈° uvijek pod upravom MORH-a i tek trebaju biti predane". S obzirom da za veƒáinu nekretnina nije poznata toƒçna lokacija, svi su pozvani koristiti stranicu i nadopunjavati ju informacijama, koordinatama i fotografijama odreƒëenih nekretnina.                             newsletter
translation: Military assets available to all Photo: Xandroid A + - Military Property Website (Military Map) was created as part of the PINS: Public Interest project - Not Saleable (Public Interest - not for sale), which in 2013 and 2014, along with The financial support of the European Union, implemented the Center for Peace Studies as a project holder and partners transparency International Hungary, Transparency International UK, University of Zagreb, Green Istria, Eko Zadar and Cenzura Plus. As part of the project, the processes of the conversion of military real estate, which began with the independence of Croatia, and especially selected examples of conversion in Pula - the Muzil complex, Zagreb - former Vlaska Military Hospital, Zadar - former barracks Stjepan Radic and Vis - Barracks Support. The results of these four conversions are described in detail in the publication to whom the former military real estate fails? Transmission experiences in Croatia, which you can find in public libraries in these cities and at the Library of the Center for Peace Studies in the printed edition, and is also available for free download. The page was made by rationalinternational, and it visually published and shown some of the military real estate that the MOD assessed as unpromising. "With this web, we want to continue to monitor the conversions of military real estate and after the end of the PINS Flag project on the map of Croatia you see on the web represent the military real estate that the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Croatia has evaluated unpromising. Some of these real estate have been handed over to the use government management), some have been handed over to the management of the local government or self-government unit, and some are still under the Management of the MOD and have yet to be handed over. " Given that most of the property is not known to be the exact location, they are all invited to use the page and supplement it with information, coordinates and photos of certain real estate. newsletter
translation (annotation, run 2): Military assets available to all  Photo: Xandroid  AND  +  -  The Military Map Website (MAP) was created as part of the PINS: Public Interest project - Not Saleable (Public Interest - not for sale), which was implemented by the Peace Studies Center during 2013 and 2014, with the financial support of the European Union, with the financial support of the European Union.As a project holder and partners transparency International Hungary, Transparency International UK, University of Zagreb, Green Istria, Eko Zadar and Cenzura Plus.  As part of the project, the processes of the conversion of military real estate, which began with the independence of Croatia, and especially selected examples of conversion in Pula - the Muzil complex, Zagreb - former Vlaska Military Hospital, Zadar - former barracks Stjepan Radic and Vis - Barracks Support.The results of these four conversions are described in detail in the publication to whom the former military real estate fails?Transmission experiences in Croatia, which you can find in public libraries in these cities and at the Library of the Center for Peace Studies in the printed edition, and is also available for free download.  The page was made by rationalinternational, and it visually published and shown some of the military real estate that the MOD assessed as unpromising."With this web, we want to continue to monitor the conversions of military real estate and after the end of the PINS Flag project on the map of Croatia you see on the web represent the military real estate that the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Croatia has evaluated unpromising. Some of these real estate have been handed over to the usegovernment management), some have been handed over to the management of the local government or self-government unit, and some are still under the Management of the MOD and have yet to be handed over. "Given that most of the property is not known to be the exact location, they are all invited to use the page and supplement it with information, coordinates and photos of certain real estate.  newsletter

translation: It's not enough to have a camera with a movie in your hand, walk nature and "trigger" when something is done to us special! When we develop a movie and make pictures, we notice that a seen motif shot maybe from a "frog" or "bird" perspective, and with our shift or a couple of steps to the right or left was the real and expected detail, but this was not realized at our time Pressure on the camera trigger! Dissatisfied with the photos done and we start looking for something better in our next visit to nature. But when a man is filming, he wants to "document" the moment of a scene seen, then he has to have a "built -in" feeling that his efforts become just a manual act of will and desire - but still more than that! This sense of man has or does not have, he can achieve or just watch over time, but he does not "see" what he should actually experience and see when meeting what attracted the attention of his eye and the camera lens. Another fact that is also not often crucial is the fact of the age of the author and the type of camera he uses! In our case, this is a young author, but about the author who really "looks" around him through the lens of his camera and has a feeling good to notice and feel something that is neither an ordinary "postcard" or a "naked" document, which only needed to register - already to his image "inhales the soul" and makes it the way he felt at the time of seeing. With the proper exposure of water that the ≈Ωubori in "fairy hair", in the "dream in the foam" and in the "≈Ωubor" we actually hear that ≈Ωubor, because the "ice magic" is not only a magic for the author but also the magic for us who observe this selected photo. White perce birds and in the snow captured the top of the dried leaf and the "ice decoration" and a so well -known detail called "Little Rhine" from Plitvice Lakes, are really a confirmation that the author has a already well -built "sense of subtle sense of what he saw and noticed. Confirmation of this is certainly a "icy saw" that - finding it - needed to register with the necessary dose of feelings and law of photographic crafts. Obviously, the young author struck exactly what he wanted, as in the recorded reflections he properly determined the limit between the light of cloud reflexes or the sky in the coast and the sloping branches of trees peeking out of the water. The "Magic Wood" in this reflex, as well as the "spider network", became what the author wanted to conjure us up, and with the "reflection of the face" and the motive ", find me", obviously showed his true reflection and obviously found himself in his search Road in photographic art as a personal commitment, inspiring himself, but also of us to whom he showed it all with his first exhibition. I believe that Nikola Pejkovic will quickly become a person whose recordings will decorate the halls of many exhibitions, and the well -deserved awards will be a certificate of what I personally managed to "read" from this photographic message "written" on the film emulsion and at the layers of his photographs.

translation: Red Valentino predicts a storm of prints for next summer Although we are already feeling the autumn, the fashion industry sends us a completely different energy transformed through the presentation of the 2015 last-summer collections. The sister line of the renowned Italian brand Valentino, "Red Valentino", has already announced the Lukbuk for the collection announcing the trends for next year. So you will testify to us so many inventive pieces that they contain inspiration from navy motives and school days. The retro moment is imbued through all the pieces, but in a modernist way that somehow connects to the new age. According to Valentino, it is never enough of the sailor railroads, points and flower prints. The collection is moving within the daily combinations made of retro -looking dresses and socks, there are short skirts, transparent shirts, motor jackets, coats and ankle -length trousers that do not go back to time. It is obvious that this collection will win the girls who prefer a feminine and romantic look that is unique from commercialism.

According to Valentino, it is never enough of the sailor railroads, points and flower prints.The collection is moving within the daily combinations made of retro -looking dresses and socks, there are short skirts, transparent shirts, motor jackets, coats and ankle -length trousers that do not go back to time.  It is obvious that this collection will win the girls who prefer a feminine and romantic look that is unique from commercialism.

translation: Getting to know new people can be a challenge, but also an exciting experience. In order to speed up the process of dating and befriend, psychologists have compiled a list of 5 questions that can reveal to you the most important personality features in front of you. That way you will immediately find out if you are compatible and whether there is a chance to start a solid friendship. 1. "How would you describe yourself?" This question may seem very simple, but the way you answer it reveals a lot about the person. She will have to describe herself, talking about herself, about her work, family, friends, and all the others that considers them important in life. You will find out her priorities. This question will reveal a person's past. What she considers success and the way she sets her goals in life is a key information for you. This achievement can be whatever, professional, academic, personality, sports ... 3. "Have you ever read a good book?" This question will separate people who read from those who do not read, and that tells a lot about a particular person. You will also find out what kind of books they want or do not want, and that will give you an idea for those things they like or dislike in real life. This issue has a lot of potential for detecting personality creativity. The answer will find out whether he or she has a creative and entertaining side. Notice how fast you need to answer, so you will know if you have been thinking about this topic or not. You will also find out what is doing now, and whether he is happy/happy or unhappy/unhappy in his field. 5. "What is your personal hero?" The worship of heroes is not uncommon at all. This question will reveal their values ‚Äã‚Äãand the way they want to become a better person themselves. Whether it's a family member, a sports star, a celebrity or author. This is a great opportunity to find out about the values ‚Äã‚Äãof the person you have now met.

translation: The photo of a child glued to a speeder is old and is not from the country Posting on the Facebook page of Prilep today manipulates the public with text and photography related to traffic safety. It is a text entitled "(PHOTO) A move that touched the traffic policemen: They stopped a car whose driver had ..." In the news that was shared, among other things, this is a great way to improve driving safety . Traffic police stopped a car during routine control and had something to see. Instrument panel was quite unusual. The speedometer was glued to a boy's photo. When asked by the driver why he did so, the answer was thrilled. -That's my son. Whenever I look at that photo I know I can't drive faster than 100 an hour, because of him I live, "said the driver who cheated on the police. This is a wonderful idea, and would prevent many unhappy cases. Share to spread it This idea that can save many lives we are reviewing has no context. Although the announcement itself can be interpreted that it is going to increase traffic safety, it is primarily a news whose construction and title are only made for more clicks ; Media in the country, and that was in 2018 on the website of Macedonia today, which today does not exist the same year on the hoe site, where it can be seen. The oldest post on the Internet that could be found was posted in 2016 by US Social Network Aggregator Reddit. Since April 2016, 9 more posts have been observed with identical photography. Since then, a repetition of this photo can be seen on many sites, blogs and networks around the world every calendar year, and you can see all the posts at this address of the photo search engine. According to the facts we have, it can be assessed that the announcement is without context. It cannot be confirmed that the event happened somewhere in Northern Macedonia, and given that it was published in Prilep today, it cannot be argued and that it is in the area of ‚Äã‚ÄãPrilep. And the announcement with the first photo, two traffic police officers with MoI markings, suggests that it happened somewhere in the country.

Instrument panel was quite unusual.The speedometer was glued to a boy's photo.When asked by the driver why he did so, the answer was thrilled.  -That's my son.Whenever I look at that photo I know that I can't drive faster than 100 an hour, because of him I live, "said the driver who cheated on the police.  This is a wonderful idea, and would prevent many unhappy cases.Share to spread this idea that can save many lives  The announcement we are reviewing has no context.Although the announcement itself can be interpreted that it is going to increase traffic safety, it is, above all, news whose construction and title are only made for more clicks, ie.Click-Bite information.  Our Internet search has shown that similar information has been posted with the same photo for several years, most often on private blogs, social networking profiles and some medium.It was only once posted on two medium sites in the country, which was in 2018 on the website of Macedonia today, which today does not exist the same year on the site of Motika, where it can be seen.  The oldest post on the Internet that could be found was posted in 2016 by US Social Network Aggregator Reddit.Since April 2016, 9 more posts have been observed with identical photography.  Since then, a repetition of this photo can be seen on many sites, blogs and networks around the world every calendar year, and you can see all the posts at this address of the photo search engine.  According to the facts we have, it can be assessed that the announcement is without context.It cannot be confirmed that the event happened somewhere in Northern Macedonia, and given that it was published in Prilep today, it cannot be argued and that it is in the area of Prilep.And the announcement with the first photo, two traffic police officers with MoI markings, suggests that it happened somewhere in the country.

translation: Minister Jarovska emphasized that for the first time the competition was adopted in social dialogue with local governments and the real sector and added that in the future, in the future, the enrollment policy in the secondary schools should be created in the future. She reminded that the camp "learns smart, works professionally" was going through 19 events in various municipalities and together with the chambers of commerce, local governments and schools determined what the necessary profiles to be opened in a particular school or that should be put on hold. . Tsarovska emphasized the benefits of vocational education: Fast and successful performance in the labor market of every student who finish secondary vocational education, a good basis for further higher education upgrades, guaranteed good earnings and financial independence of young people who can get jobs faster. And the companies get ready and immediately employable staff. He pointed to the scholarship policy, which, he said, brought the government at the penultimate government session. - The competition for enrolling students in public high schools for the academic year 2021/2022 in 109 high schools envisages a total of 30,053 free students in 913 classes. Of which 19,602 in vocational education in 604 parallels, 9,261 students in gymnasium education in 274 classes and 1,190 students in 35 classes for art education, sports academy, sports gymnasium and mathematical-informatical gym, said Jarovska. Prime Minister Zaev stressed that the campaign "Learn Smart, Working Professional" was successful and gave effect and expressed gratitude to the chambers of commerce, to all companies that supported it, to the Swiss Embassy, ‚Äã‚ÄãGermany, USAID, UNDP ... - MES analysis, in which 450 companies participated, showing that as many as 85 percent are ready to work with vocational high schools and receive students in practical classes, something that is very important for the creation of professional and quality staff, Zaev said. He added that the Government's commitment and dedication is to develop the strategic goals, including the development of the economy, increasing productive employment and raising the standard of living of citizens.

translation: Aguero sent a farewell message to City fans, will be unveiled tomorrow in the new Argentine club failed to crown him with a Champions League trophy in the last match of the 10-year-old epoch. Sergio Aguero played the last match in Manchester City last night. The legendary Argentine striker has spent 10 years among the citizens, and the sending failed to win the Champions League title. City lost in the UEFA elite Chelsea final 1-0. Aguero is due to be presented in the new club tomorrow, which is Barcelon, with which he signed a two -year contract. To leave City, Aguero sent a farewell message to all the fans of the English club. "I am proud of this team and that I have been wearing the colors of Manchester City for so many years. It is the club that will be in my heart forever," Aguero said. In the past decade, Aguero has played a total of 390 matches for City, scoring a phenomenal 260 goals. A total of 15 trophies, five of which are in the Premier League. The fans will forever remember his goal against the CPD in the last minute of the last round, when City won 4: 3 and thus reached the first of the five titles that followed in the coming seasons.

translation: Falcades without shame! Namely, this extremely unbiased article invokes some "statistics", but does not say precisely what data it is and where they are obtained. But therefore, at the very beginning of the text, it makes a spinning construction and claims: "... Yesterday's protest organized by opposition structures is nothing more but an attempt by the family tragedies of people who died in traffic, SDSM to provide an advantage in the pre -election race. ", although it was announced that the peaceful protest was organized by the civic initiative" Koce, bring back to us the streets "to revolt for the large number of victims of the streets of Skopje. On the Ilindenska Boulevard, where a 13-year-old boy was killed ten days ago, citizens protested with lie down bicycles, and Mayor Koce Trajanovski pointed to him as "most responsible for pedestrians and cyclists are increasingly suffering in traffic accidents". However, in this dedicated text, victims of pedestrian crossings on the streets of Skopje are marginalized, almost invisible. In it without a shame, the mayor boasts of "expanding key roads and building multi -storey garages", while responsibility for the tragedies of pedestrian crossings is collectivized. And, in that rescue mission, "virtual" traffic experts are called to help, who should convince viewers that due to "improved traffic infrastructure": "The number of casualties is falling ...!" "The victims were falling"! Despite the imaginary image created by this material, the latest analysis of the National Road Traffic Safety Council (RCRTS) shows that the number of pedestrians in Skopje has increased compared to last year. Referring to data from RCRTS, Meta agency reported these days that: "In absolute numbers, there were 20 dead for the first six months of 2015, unlike last year, when there were 15. Most of the dead were pedestrians. In the first eight Months, including July and August, out of 27 killed in Skopje, as many as 15 are pedestrians. " The move, on the other hand, to defend something that simply cannot be defended, and eventually concludes that: it is completely unprofessional, unethical and looks tasteless, unworthy, desperate!

translation: With increasing radio traffic density and the use of increasing frequencies as information carriers, some basic problems for AM and FM transmission are becoming more pronounced. Above all, the demodulation of the am signals is getting worse with the weakening of the holder. Not to mention cases when it is completely lost (Feding). When it comes to FM, the demodulated signal becomes very distorted, when we have two signals with a similar amplitude and the same or similar frequency. Many of these unwanted phenomena can be avoided by using a closed amplitude loop (Amplite -Lock Loop - All).
translation (annotation, run 2): With increasing radio traffic density and the use of increasing frequencies as information carriers, some basic problems for AM and FM transmission are becoming more pronounced.Above all, the demodulation of the am signals is getting worse with the weakening of the holder.Not to mention cases when it is completely lost (federation).When it comes to FM, the demodulated signal becomes very distorted, when we have two signals with a similar amplitude and the same or similar frequency.Many of these unwanted phenomena can be avoided by using a closed amplitude loop (Amplite -Lock Loop - All).

translation: Privacy Statement Daily News respects the privacy of users of its informational posts and services, as well as the privacy of visitors to the website www.dnevninovosti.mk. The collection, storage, use and cancellation of personal data takes place in accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection (Official Gazette No. 7/2005). All personal data obtained in electronic or other form in the editorial office of www.dnevninovosti.mk, as well as the data that the person entered in the templates and forms of the website www.dnevninovosti.mk, are considered to be obtained with consent face. Daily news is not responsible for the consequences, material or other damage that may occur in the person and other natural or legal entity if the person gives/inserts inaccurate or incomplete data. Personal data has been obtained only and exclusively for the smooth security and submission of informational posts and services to the respondent/user's daily news or the visitor to the website www.dnevninovosti.mk. Daily news keeps the respondent/user personal data only while the obligation is due to which the data has been obtained. When the contracting or other type of relationship between daily news and the person respondent/user stops, all personal data is permanently removed from the collection of personal information of daily news, within 90 days. Daily news obliges the processing of personal data not to believe, nor to deviate to third parties. The personal data of the users of information posts and services of daily news and visitors to the website www.dnevninovosti.mk, are not available for third parties, except in cases where it is otherwise prescribed by law. The personal data of the users of information posts and services to daily news and visitors to the website www.dnevninovosti.mk will not be used, nor will they be given for advertisers, marketing and similar business uses.

translation: Antonia Lokvenec and Angela Gjorgieva are two beautiful girls, especially active on the social network Instagram. What is common to both ladies, except for their natural beauty, care for their appearance and self -confidence is their friendship with Philips Lumea. In order to see their impressions and efficiency of the device, we asked them a few questions about their routines and methods of removing unwanted fibers from the body, PL (before the Lumea era :)), but also for the results after only 3 Treatments. Antonia: For the first time a few months ago, I was on social media, when the device first caught my attention. And I met him physically and live when my best friend bought her and began bragging. Angela: Through the sites on which girls shared experiences. Just from afar. But now I am glad that today I am one of them. The one that speaks and shares the positive experience of using Lumea. Antonia: Great excitement, but frankly and a little mistrust that this apparatus can provide me with such results. Angela: Beautiful in appearance, small and compact, and can solve the everyday problems of a woman or girl. Antonia: How much I want every day to be summer. Angela: Great, ideal device for smooth skin at home. Antonia: I pay particular attention to caring for myself and my body. Both in everyday life, but also because of the profession, it is important for me to always look great in front of the camera. Well, as the most practical method (like most of us, right) I used a razor. What the most bothered me is that the hairs grow again in just 2-3 days. Angela: Wax waxing, where unlike Lumea, the pain is unmatched, and the free term that suits you is sometimes a luxury. 5. Which zone do you treat? Angela: In all areas where Lumea is used. Hands, legs, bikini zone, armpits, tilters ... I use it maximally. 6. How many treatments did you notice results? Antonia: On each area different, some after the first, but the most after the second treatment. Angela: After the second treatment the fibers began to be pronounced, and with each new treatment, the results were more visible. 7. Does it hurt? Antonia: I sincerely have a high threshold of pain tolerance, but Lumea has never been a problem for me. Treatments are completely painless, compared to all other ways of removing unwanted fibers. Angela: I wouldn't call it pain, it's a minimal tingling and a feeling of warmth, only in certain places. 8. In which zone did you notice the most results? Antonia: stomach and legs. Angela: The underarms. What was once daily shaving is now reduced to painless treatments with excellent results. Antonia: Investing in Lumea is one of the smartest decisions you can make. I promise you that the investment is small compared to the lasting results. Angela: I warmly recommend it. Take advantage of the current benefits and get it now, and get ready now to enjoy the smooth skin in the summer.

translation: We need to be proud of scars because they are proof that we have gone through and thanks to them we have formed in the people we are today. Some people decide to beautify them with tattoos ... Many of us have scars on our body and it's not something we should be ashamed of, but we're just not always in the mood to answer questions like "where your scar" , so tattoos are the perfect way to cover the scars. Whether it becomes a scar from caesarean section, from cancer surgery, fracture or whatever, they can turn into real art.

Whether it becomes a scar from caesarean section, from cancer surgery, fracture or whatever, they can turn into real art.

translation: The widespread distribution of the relief and frequent application of this procedure at home and small workshops leads us to a situation where we need to weld two or more components into one whole. Of course, good welding cannot be achieved without a quality welding electrode. But what electrode to choose, how, to find out if the seller has sold the electrode we need, as if one of the neighbors gave us a package of electrodes, we will know if we can use it with our welding device? The following text will answer these questions, ie what types of electrodes exist, their application, characteristics and manner of marking. In EMITER no. 3/10 The relation of welding was explained, and in this inscription we will explain the main features and marking of the electrodes. Namely, each electrode consists of the core of the electrode and the coating of the electrode. The role of the core of the electrode is to allow the establishment and maintenance of the electric arc between the metal and the electrode and to provide additional material to the welded connection. From here comes the first condition for electrode selection, ie. The core of the electrode should have a composition that has characteristics (mechanical and chemical) equal or better than the basic material (welded parts).
translation (annotation, run 2): The widespread distribution of the relief and frequent application of this procedure at home and small workshops leads us to a situation where we need to weld two or more components into one whole.Of course, good welding cannot be achieved without a quality welding electrode.But what electrode to choose, how, to find out if the seller has sold the electrode we need, as if one of the neighbors gave us a package of electrodes, we will know if we can use it with our welding device?The following text will answer these questions, ie what types of electrodes exist, their application, characteristics and manner of marking.  In EMITER no.3/10 The relation of welding was explained, and in this inscription we will explain the main features and marking of the electrodes.Namely, each electrode consists of the core of the electrode and the coating of the electrode.The role of the core of the electrode is to allow the establishment and maintenance of the electric arc between the metal and the electrode and to provide additional material to the welded connection.From here comes the first condition for electrode selection, ie.The core of the electrode should have a composition that has characteristics (mechanical and chemical) equal or better than the basic material (welded parts).

translation: Melting ice is a special 21st century phenomenon, and examples of frozen-disappearing areas are very common. Scientists report that melting ice affects the environment, so they have reported that melting ice can also show a buried radiation. The international team has so far studied 17 icebergs around the world, including those in the Arctic, Antarctica, Iceland, the Alps, the Caucasus and British Columbia. There are traces of natural radiation, but scientists have been looking for examples of radiation caused by man. "These are some of the largest levels of radiation outside the nuclear zone," said Carolyn Classon of Pomouth University. Radiation, caused by the human hand, such as those in the 1986 nuclear disaster in Fukushima, is leaving for the atmosphere. There is a series of radioactive elements, such as radioactive cesium, which people get sick and even die. Then Chernobyl radioactive clouds traveled across Europe, regardless of borders. Wearing the rain, the particles also reached the UK. With freezing of the rain, frost occurs, in which the particles remain trapped. "Radioactive particles are very lightweight so the atmosphere can be transported to some distant destinations. The rain evaporates, but the snow remains frozen for decades, and in the melting," Clasonova said. In Sweden in 2017, radiation was found 10 times the normal level. Reminer radiation is not only seen after nuclear disasters but also after the use of nuclear weapons. Radioactive elements have different life centuries. The plutonium-241 can "live" for 14 years, while the synthetic chemical element of America 241 has a life expectancy of 423 years. The ice can stay very long and spread when melting.

translation: Main Menu Search Hacklab Report Second, 09/01/2009 - 00:41 - Igor Here's to HABBB. The reported amount is a monthly contribution, and assumes a committee for at least 12 months. Opening the first technological autonomous zone, which will be used to promote the use and development of emancipating technologies such as free software, public, open and accessible internet and alternative and social media. Such technologically autonomous zones, briefly known as Hacklab or Medialab, promote the active participation of citizens and encourage the creative use of technology in response to alienation and passive consumption that is most commonly identified with computer technology. The hacklab should change that. It will enable participants to use their knowledge in a cozy atmosphere, with free access to fast and unlimited internet and the chance of gaining new knowledge of work inspiring in smaller groups of people with the same or similar interests in the field of information and communication technology. The laboratory itself owns the Library of Free Software Macedonia and the opportunity to read many interesting technical and social books, magazines and magazines. Activities include events open to the public that will be held 2 times a week, share knowledge every Saturday for 5 hours and share a cinema every Tuesday for 2 hours. The rest of the time will be dedicated to holding web programming courses, microcontroller programming, using social networks and semantic web instructions for web 2.0 use, laboratory membership projects, such as applications, microcontrollers and various installations, and even robots. The laboratory requires 2 rooms, one to maintain sharing knowledge and the other to share a cinema. Renovation and equipping of premises with inventory and computer equipment.

translation: Sexually Transmitted Diseases Authors: 978-608-210-306-8 of Issuance: Sexually Transmitted Diseases is a book by the editors King H. Holmes, Frederick Sparling, Walter E. Stam, Peter Paj, Judith N. Wasserheit, Lawrence Corey, Miron S. Cohen and Heather Watts. This is the fourth edition published by The McGraw-Hill Inc. in 2008. Progress in epidemiology, pathogenesis, diagnosis, treatment and prevention of sexually transmitted infections is considered from various perspectives in this textbook. The pace of changes in the field of STI/HIV is extremely, and perhaps unique. That rapid development is the reason for the necessary changes and the overall "weight" of the evidence presented in this issue. The book contains sixteen parts: 1. History, socio -economic impact and epidemiology of sexually transmitted diseases; 2. Social and psychological dimensions of sexuality; 3. profiles of vulnerable population; 4. Host's immunity and molecular pathogenesis in sexually transmitted diseases; 5. Sexually transmitted viral pathogens; 6. sexually transmitted bacterial pathogens; 7. Sexually transmitted protos, fungi and ectoparasites; 8. Review of STDs; 9. Treatment of STD syndromes in women; 10. Treatment of STD syndromes in men; 11. Treatment of dermatological and extragenital manifestations of STDs and HIV infection; 12. Clinical treatment of HIV infection; 13. STI/HIV in reproductive health and in pediatrics; 14. Prevention and control of STIs and HIV infection; 15. Special aspects of Prevention and Control of STI/HIV in developing countries and 16. Special medical, legal and social issues.

translation: The footnote lived, you live and live, if not in memories and songs, then surely in the footnote. The last heirs of a kind of political new conversation in which a state could get a name coin South+Slavia, maybe not strange, are Macedonia and Kosovo*. Macedonia in the world is still officially called the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, FYROM. The footnote in the name exists in various documents of Euro -Atlantic integration: they say that Greece, unlike Turkey - does not recognize it under the "shortened" name. If there were Macedonian brothers a sense of humor as in history, they would patent that name and would never give up on it. What is more beautiful than that of the homeland and the mother, the native land to be called "ex ..."? The trouble is that in the competition for the Yugoslav footage heritage the other day another competitor, Kosovo*appeared. Vojislav Kostunica believes that this means recognition by the Serbian government that there is a state with asterisk, Kosovo*on the territory of Serbia. The US ambassador to Pristina argues that the footnote of the name Kosovo* in regional initiatives is insignificant, as true sovereignty is not achieved by symbols, but only by achieving it. translation: There are about 4,000 chemicals in the cigarette smoke! Read more facts about cigarettes! From the EDO July 6, 2021, 14:00 1.1k Views 0 Votes 1. There are over 1.3 billion smokers in the world according to the World Health Organization. 2. Smoking is the cause of the death of 8 million people a year. This means that death -related death occurs every 5 seconds in the world. 3. Average smoking cuts 13 years of a person's life. 4. Apart from the danger of lung cancer, other dangers of smoking are blood cancer, prostate, stomach, kidneys and other diseases. 5. Smoking increases the risk of heart attack to 400%. 6. 10 million cigarettes are bought in the world every minute. 7. The cigarette cigarette has 8-9 milligrams of nicotine in it. 8. There are about 4,000 chemicals in the cigarette smoke. 9. According to the WHO, half of the smokers die as a result of smoking cigarettes. 10. Statistics show that 5.6 million children currently living in the United States will die of smoking -related diseases.

translation: Share at: Winner of EU Literature Award in 2015 "Pictures of M." Pictures of M. " Describes the search for her own place in the world of young Marisia as she faces her mother's incurable illness. And as it often happens, the home is not the place, but the people who make up it. After her parents' death, she returns to Slovakia, where she lives with her partner and works as a nurse. The descriptions of her everyday life are penetrated by memories of mother death, constituting her boring existence with the extreme of certain situations. Family relationships are the main theme of the novel - old and new, closely related and distant - as well as their meaning and nonsense. "Pictures of M.'s life" It gives a fascinating representation of contemporary life in Vienna and Bratislava, which turns into a universal symbol of contemporary urban European life and the challenges they impose on young people. Svetlana Shuhova
