translation: But he offered a picture of a fighting and honest athlete who did not deserve oblivion. And whatever he was playing, he gave everything he had. But he always treated the opponent with great respect. For him it was a win. The biggest champion is the one who overcomes his own passions. He did not push through the media, he did not impose himself and did not talk about his merits. He just wanted to work. To teach. He wanted to show us that we came to beauty in the world, not for the ugly. Dedicated to God, family, friends. With love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, faithfulness, meekness and self -control. Our sporting and human idol. Pece, our giant, gorostas among the stats, gorostas and as a man. Pece, you will always be our number one! Petar Milosevski was born on December 6, 1973 in Bitola. In September 1990 he debuted for FC Pelister, in the second league match of the SFRY (in Bitola, a 5-1 victory against Radnicki from Belgrade) on March 25, 1998 debuted for the Macedonian national team (Victory against Bulgaria 1-0 in friendly match in Skopje). He wore the Macedonian national team for 11 years, played 59 matches. Since 2012 he has served as director of the national teams of Macedonia. In Election FM, 1998 he was named the best footballer abroad. During his career he has played over 500 matches for all teams and national teams.
translation (annotation, run 2): But he offered a picture of a fighting and honest athlete who did not deserve oblivion.  And whatever he was playing, he gave everything he had.  But he always treated the opponent with great respect.  For him it was a win.  The biggest champion is the one who overcomes his own passions.He did not push through the media, he did not impose himself and did not talk about his merits.  He just wanted to work.To teach.  He wanted to show us that we came to beauty in the world, not for the ugly.  Dedicated to God, family, friends.  With love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, faithfulness, meekness and self -control.  Our sporting and human idol.  Pece, our giant, gorostas among the stats, gorostas and as a man.  Pece, you will always be our number one!  Petar Milosevski was born on December 6, 1973 in Bitola.  In September 1990 he debuted for FC Pelister, in the second league match of the SFRY (in Bitola, a 5-1 victory against Radnicki from Belgrade)  On March 25, 1998, he debuted for the Macedonian national team (Victory against Bulgaria 1-0 in a friendly match in Skopje).He wore the Macedonian national team for 11 years, played 59 matches.  Since 2012 he has served as director of the national teams of Macedonia.  In Election FM, 1998 he was named the best footballer abroad.During his career he has played over 500 matches for all teams and national teams.

translation: Word of Spiritual Struggle (27.06.2012) Fasting, vigil and prayer themselves do not bring the desired fruits, because they are not the purpose of our lives; They are means of achieving the goal. Decorate your candles with virtues. Fight to reject passions. Clean your heart from every dirt and keep it purely to come and move to you the Lord; to fill you with the Holy Spirit with His Divine Gifts. My loved ones, all of your work and worries to be directed there. To be your unstoppable purpose and aspiration. Towards being targeted your prayer. Look for the Lord daily; But inside, in your heart, not somewhere outside of it. And when you find it, become fear and trembling like the cherubim and seraphs, because your heart has become God's throne. But to find the Lord, calm down completely, for the Lord is disgusted by the proud, and loves and visits those with a humble heart. That is why she says, "But who I will look at? To the one who is in a humble spirit and who trembles my words." Fight in the spiritual struggle and God will make you strong. In the fight we find our weaknesses, disadvantages and mistakes. The struggle is a mirror of our spiritual state. Who did not fight himself did not meet himself. Be careful even on small mistakes. If you fall into sin by carelessness, you do not lose hope, but quickly become and pray to the Lord, who has the power to raise you. Excessive sadness hides pride in itself. It and hopelessness are harmful and dangerous, and are often exaggerated by the devil to end the progress of the fight. We have weakness, passions and flaws, deeply rooted. All this cannot be overcome by knee, with the help of weakness and great sadness, but with patience and endurance, courage, labor and vigilance. The road that leads to perfection is long. Pray God to make you strong. With patience to surpass your falls, and as soon as you get up quickly, rush and not stand like children where you have fallen, crying and linding without comfort. Watch and pray not to fall into evil. Do not despair if you often fall into old sins. Many of them are strong by nature and habit. However, over time and with diligence, they are defeated. Let us throw nothing in hopelessness.

translation: To prepare and sign a declaration that will strongly condemn the violence among the young press conference, SDMM Darko Davitkovski, President Skopje, 12.03.2012 Dear, every political offspring in Macedonia should contribute to stabilization of the situation. Since we cannot and do not want to stand aside and see how the government fails through state institutions to act properly, quickly clear up the current and prevent the event of new incidents with inter -ethnic dimension among young people, SDMM today comes out with a concrete initiative. We propose, immediately, the offspring of all political parties to sit down and jointly draft and sign a declaration that will strongly condemn the violence among young people. It is our responsibility to send a clear, strong and common message that for us as political offspring top priority is coexistence, tolerance, mutual understanding and respect, regardless of gender, religious, ethnic and political affiliation. At such crisis, we have an obligation to show that we can overcome party and ideological differences, get out of the narrow party interests, because of the future of the state and generations to come. Therefore, on this occasion, I inform the public that I will submit the draft text for the declaration to the presidents of all political offspring and propose to them on Friday in the Hall of the City Hall in Skopje to meet the final text of the Declaration and to sign it.
translation (annotation, run 2): To prepare and sign a declaration that will strongly condemn the violence among young people  Press conference, SDMM Darko Davitkovski, President Skopje, 12.03.2012  Ladies and Gentlemen,  Every political offspring in Macedonia should contribute to stabilizing the situation.  Since we cannot and do not want to stand aside and see how the government fails through state institutions to act properly, quickly clear up the current and prevent the event of new incidents with inter -ethnic dimension among young people, SDMM today comes out with a concrete initiative.  We propose, immediately, the offspring of all political parties to sit down and jointly draft and sign a declaration that will strongly condemn the violence among young people.  It is our responsibility to send a clear, strong and common message that for us as political offspring top priority is coexistence, tolerance, mutual understanding and respect, regardless of gender, religious, ethnic and political affiliation.  At such crisis, we have an obligation to show that we can overcome party and ideological differences, get out of the narrow party interests, because of the future of the state and generations to come.  Therefore, on this occasion, I inform the public that I will submit the draft text for the declaration to the presidents of all political offspring and propose to them on Friday in the Hall of the City Hall in Skopje to meet the final text of the Declaration and to sign it.

translation: SDSM Veles: Gentlemen from VMRO -DPMNE, how do you think to solve problems in education? Reaction to the press conference of VMRO DPMNE, held on 24.09.2013. translation (annotation, run 2): SDSM Veles: Gentlemen from VMRO -DPMNE, how do you think to solve problems in education? translation: The type and quality of the groceries we eat is very important to magnify immunity. In periods of colds and influenza it is recommended to intake of food rich in antioxidants such as fresh fruits and vegetables. Anti-inflammatory properties have groceries such as dark green vegetables, berries, salmon, tomato, and vitamin C-rich foods such as pomegranates, lemons, oranges, tangerines, parsley, peppers, cabbage, leeks and the like. Studies have shown that zinc, which is found in pumpkin seeds, spinach, oysters, nuts and legumes, can shorten the duration of the cold for several days. Probiotics - The guards of the body of the microbes that live in our digestive system help us to digest food, but also participate in the regulation of our metabolism, the feeling of hunger and weight, and have an impact on immunity. Strong immunity is the result of a healthy digestive tract, and in its flawless work the probiotics containing good bacteria that effectively relieve inflammation and prevent infections. Practice, sleep and ventilate for immunity important is important for body care and regular exercise. But do not sacrifice sleep because quality sleep is crucial in the fight against colds and flu. In a period of viruses, be sure to ventilate the premises where you sleep.

Anti-inflammatory properties have groceries such as dark green vegetables, berries, salmon, tomato, and vitamin C-rich foods such as pomegranates, lemons, oranges, tangerines, parsley, peppers, cabbage, leeks and the like.  Studies have shown that zinc, which is found in pumpkin seeds, spinach, oysters, nuts and legumes, can shorten the duration of the cold for several days.  Probiotics - guards of the body  The germs living in our digestive system help us to digest food, but also participate in the regulation of our metabolism, the feeling of hunger and weight, and have an impact on immunity.  Strong immunity is the result of a healthy digestive tract, and in its flawless work the probiotics containing good bacteria that effectively relieve inflammation and prevent infections.  Practice, sleep and ventilate  Taking care of the body and regular exercise is important for immunity.But do not sacrifice sleep because quality sleep is crucial in the fight against colds and flu.In a period of viruses, be sure to ventilate the premises where you sleep.

translation: Formed Formed Civic Coalition Statement for Media Stevo Pendarovski, Pillar Partnerships for Democratic Macedonia Skopje, 08.05.2015. Today we want to announce a charter for the citizens for Macedonia. It is a document that we are publicly offered today to inspect all those who are interested, to all citizens and citizens, all political parties, NGOs, citizens' associations, groups, experts, individuals, religious and ethnic associations. Virtually every person living in our country, if he wants, if he thinks it is now to join, to do so because our goal with this document is to support the concept of civil Macedonia and to unite in the party party Coalition, a generous party coalition that will deliver its demands on May 17th when the large general protest in front of the Government of the Republic of Macedonia is scheduled. Those who want to do can do so by signing that document. Those who want to do so in a different way, to support this initiative can do so. In any case, the most important thing for us is as a wider circle of people, outside the opposition coalition that organizes these formally these protests, and to say that they are against the way the current police party leadership is heading the Republic of Macedonia. translation: From a fool to dictator Gruevski was a reformer when he came to power and then became a dictator? What is the rhetoric that, I see, also in some of the foreign media reports? When did it become a dictator, and when was a reformer? The shortsight, opportunism, corruption and collaboration of part of the opposition and the civil sector, as well as the silence and approval of the international community, are the reason for Gruevski to be seen as a reformer who has grown into a dictator. Wrong, very wrong. Gruevski was certainly not in a position to be a dictator when he was leaning for Ljubco Georgievski when he was his finance minister. There was nothing reformed in the criminal sale of the OKTA refinery, which collected only 32 million euros, and it is believed that even half of that money went to private pockets. The sale of Makedonska Banka, among the first audio records we found out, has no reformer but criminal elements. The national payment card is another corrupt scandal "before" he becomes a dictator. Gruevski's "project" also criticized Mihajlo Manevski, who later became the first executioner of the Macedonian judiciary and his faithful obedient, deservedly called the Minister of Injustice. There was nothing reformed in his advancement to the leadership position in VMRO-DPMNE that Ljubco Georgievski donated to him in 2003. According to party sources, Gruevski considered him a fool that Ljubco could easily control. It is a blurry, gangster story that culminates in the spring months at the Panorama Hotel. Then, Gruevski's government defended the pipes in the belts of his supporters, as opposed to supporters of his creator Ljubco. Ljube was against him, and "artist" Tony relaxed. He could not be a dictator then, but certainly considered him a fool. And they were wrong. He had a clear goal, and his political-criminal constitution never promised anything good. radio.spodeli.org

translation: Demand for housing decreased, real estate agencies from the Group of Real Estate Agencies at the Economic Chamber of Macedonia say that there are more unsold apartments in the country and that more citizens are interested in buying smaller housing. "They are buying modest, smaller stones to be able to start with something," said Group President Liljana Kovacheva, who adds that the fall in prices has been caused by the increased supply of apartments and to some extent reduced demand. The group also demands that a special law on real estate mediation that would propose part of the turnover to go through authorized companies, licensing agents, and construction companies to have trained sales employees. - All members of the European Union have such laws. The adoption of such a law will improve the climate in our country, and the citizens will know that they are cooperating with professionals, says Kovacheva. Category news
translation (annotation, run 2): Decreased demand for housing, real estate agencies indicate  The Group of Real Estate Agencies at the Economic Chamber of Macedonia says that there are currently more unsold apartments in the country and that more citizens are interested in buying smaller housing.  "They are buying modest, smaller stones to be able to start with something," said Group President Liljana Kovacheva, who adds that the fall in prices has been caused by the increased supply of apartments and to some extent reduced demand.  The group also demands that a special law on real estate mediation that would propose part of the turnover to go through authorized companies, licensing agents, and construction companies to have trained sales employees.  - All members of the European Union have such laws.The adoption of such a law will improve the climate in our country, and the citizens will know that they are cooperating with professionals, says Kovacheva.  Category news

translation: From edo July 13, 2021, 11:00 699 Views 0 Votes England manager Gareth Southgate is expected to become a knight after taking the England national team to the Euro 2020 final. Great tournament and it happened on this European. In the final against Italy, over 70,000 Englishmen celebrated their Wembley players. Last week it was announced that Southgate would become a knight if England defeated Italy. But despite the defeat, coach Southgate is likely to win the knightly title as he took England to the final for the first time since 1966.
translation (annotation, run 2): From edo July 13, 2021, 11:00 699 Views 0 votes  England manager Gareth Southgate is expected to become a knight after taking the England national team to the Euro 2020 final.  The Englishman has been waiting for their football team for 55 years to play in the final of a great tournament and that happened at this European.In the final against Italy, over 70,000 Englishmen celebrated their Wembley players.  Last week it was announced that Southgate would become a knight if England defeated Italy.But despite the defeat, coach Southgate is likely to win the knightly title as he took England to the final for the first time since 1966.

translation: The indictment for "Talir 2" approved The Criminal Court today approved the indictment act on the "Talir 2" case, which refers to the illegal construction of the VMRO-DPMNE party headquarters and submitted it to the parties. After the evaluated indictment, a case is set up that according to ACMIS - the system will be distributed for further action will be scheduled for a main hearing, the court said. - The indictment evaluation Council acting on the act with NSKs 15/18 of 22.11.2018 by the Prosecutor's Office labeled "Talir 2", on 10 and 11. 07. 2019 held a public hearing in the presence of the parties. After appreciating the facts and evidence presented at the indictment assessment session, the Council adopted a decision that approved the act in full, made it in writing and exposed to the parties, the Criminal Court said in a statement today. A proceedings are already underway on the "Talir" case for illegal funding of the VMRO-DPMNE party. According to the SPO indictment, the defendants in Talir illegally received at least 4.6m euros for the party, and then organized that money to be paid for the party's bank account by payers on behalf of various people.

Russia acts as a colonial bully London, May 2 (MIA) - Russia towards its Neighbor Georgia acts as a "colonial bully", writes The Independent in its editorial commentary on the latest crisis around the Caucasian state, MIA's correspondent in London said. The newspaper says that such behavior by Moscow, which claims to look like that of the former Soviet Union, is a consequence of Western behavior, which the "Independent" accuses of blocking Georgia's approximation to NATO, which was done at the latest summit. to the Alliance. "Russia knows well that Western countries will not run to help Georgians in their clashes with their big and powerful neighbor, so they behave, so the London newspaper said. The tightness between Russia and Georgia has been going on since the so -called "Roses Revolution" in 2003, when authorities in Tbilisi instead of the close alliance with Moscow decided to turn to the West for the first time. "That crisis situation is getting dramatics these days, around the areas of Abkhazia and South Ossetia, announcing secession from Georgia, for which they are widely supported and encouraged by Russia," the Independent said. According to this London -based newspaper, Moscow's diplomatic defeat over Kosovo's independence has resented Russia, which is now seeking to prove that what applies to Kosovo can be applied to these two Georgian areas in which most people speak Russian. Georgia therefore refused to join the European consensus on Kosovo and to meet the independence of the new Balkan state and offered a federal landscaping of the country, with a significant increase in Abkhazia's rights. Such an offer was rejected by local authorities in Suhumi, insisting on complete independence, although they are said to be more feared that they could be annexed by Russia. The Georgian crisis, today in London, should meet and discuss US Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov. Come on, the world will start to clog ... Hehehe !!! I will donate weakness to the brave pride, the enemies.The spears, the tyrants.The fire, the flared glamor, the chain, of the unmarried, of the silent longing, the trapped rumble, the stormed storm, the stunning rainbow, the shaky phanuria, of the tormented, the tormented ...On the forbidden lurbs, the spoiled cross, the broken mercy, the sacrifice.... purple, the virgins blood mild, the leeches whiteness, the pigeons.The "Tik-Tak" clock, the stone beat, the uncle old and the blind umbrella, the defeated bohemian scream, of a crushed poet.... glitter, on the marked shame, on, with the finger shown, the crumbling of the frost, the cracks.... tactics, of the soldiers.The poison, the omenous blossom, the unmistakable rapture, of the unraysonate.the passion, the unconscious.the dance of the unplanned.The flowers, the deceased.... The Annunciation, the freshly conceived wasteland, the breadth, the remote depth, the fallen height, the flying distance, the notch.... Performer, the uneven peace, the subjects of care, the sinners ... Honey, the gift.Let the night with lanterns sorry the lovers.And to whom should I leave the sadness of this will?For a man, he is okay ... (this quince, dungeon-Prespa saying that means- this life/reality, false life)

translation: Mercedes created the future bus bus was impressive, without a driver, and on the road there were traffic lights, pedestrian crossings, road stations, tunnels ... The bus abounds in modern technologies, such as various wireless connections, radar, cameras. Future Bus is based on the current 12-meter Citaro model moving on a six-cylinder engine of 229 horsepower, and this is the only conventional thing that is retained in it. Namely, last year, the Mercedes semi-automatic bus passed an almost 20-kilometer section of the Shipol Airport in Amsterdam to the nearby town of Harlem. The company bets that such buses that drive will become a necessity in the future, so they expect increased demand for the Future Bus. With the use of a technological platform that Mercedes calls CityPilot, the bus is converted into a vehicle capable of moving independently. The system is cost 10 cameras, four radar and two stereo cameras that allow the bus to perceive the environment in three dimensions. Because of all this, the bus automatically maneuvers millimeter precisely around the rim stones, recognizes the stations and stops on them, opens and closes the doors for passengers, "reading" all traffic signs and traffic lights. It makes this more comfortable than a human driver, while saving on fuel. Passengers can use wireless networks, and wireless chargers for mobile phones, and follow entertaining shows on the screens located inside the bus.

translation: The purpose of adopting the Draft Law on Construction Products to transpose the new Regulation 305/2011 and with the new texts of Annex III and Annex V of the European Union Regulation in the field of construction products in the legislation of the Republic of Macedonia. The existence of unequal treatment of the EU Construction Market in EU countries, as well as the need to introduce equal treatment of the statement of properties and principle of the system for evaluating and confirming the consistency of the properties of building products, were the main reasons for the adoption of the new regulation. The rules in this regulation directly affect the conditions for construction products. These conditions are gradually reflected in national product standards, national technical approvals and technical specifications related to construction products. These rules apply not only to the safety of buildings and construction work, but also to health, endurance, energy and environmental protection. The proposed legal solution will contribute to simplifying administrative procedures, shortening the time required to obtain bodies and are in the function of increased efficiency to control and suppress all technicians and trade barriers in this area. The draft law will regulate the assessment systems and confirmation of the consistency of the properties of construction products, the actions that are carried out by the manufacturers of construction products, as well as the assessment and confirmation documents. The consistency of the properties of construction products, in this way, introduces equal treatment of the conditions for marketing or making available on the market for construction products by establishing harmonized rules for the functionality of construction products regarding their basic characteristics and for the use of " Are "marking these products. The draft law will regulate requests for named bodies, appointment procedure, obligations of named bodies, obligations and requests for naming technical assessment bodies, working conditions and acting body for implementing this law and other issues important for Releasing the market for construction products and the non -compliance. The draft law also regulates the supervision of law enforcement, market supervision, control and inspection in the field of construction products.

translation: What are the effects of olive oil on our health? Only one teaspoon of olive oil can help you live longer, experts say. Olive oil, which is a key component of the Mediterranean diet, is known as one of the healthiest foods. Now, Dr. Sarah Brever and diets expert Juliet Kelov, in her latest book "Eat Better Live Longer", claim that the oil can extend your life. They argue that olive oil contains antioxidants that can help prevent or slow the growth of cancer, as well as that they can reduce the risk of heart attack and stroke - two conditions responsible for the most deaths in the world. And as it reduces the risk of high cholesterol, blood pressure and age -related diseases, olive oil also improves cognitive functions. One teaspoon of olive oil contains about 100 calories, according to Brever and Kelov, so it should be consumed in moderation. According to them, one teaspoon is best. Olive oil also contains a high percentage of monounsaturated fats (monounsaturated acids), which help lower cholesterol and eliminate the risk of stroke and heart attack. Olive oil abounds in vitamin E, which is responsible for beautiful skin as well as strengthening the immune system. Get rid of varicose veins with tomatoes Spring daytime temperatures have filled the practices of family doctors The most common causes of infertility in women Four signs showing that you are under emotional stress

translation: The poor unpaid programmers for a better perception are a sector in which the apprentices are paid for $ 50 an hour, fresh graduates receive $ 100,000 bonuses to sign an employment contract, and the average employee earns twice as much as the US average. In this situation, 60% of the surveyed technology sector (out of a total of 6,000 respondents) said they felt insufficiently paid. Such a mood is despite the average starting salary of a "programmer" in the United States at $ 110,000 a year, making them the top 5% of the country's best -paid professions. One of the explanations for this mass disappointment in the midst of such a well -paid sector is that most of these employees live in the Silicon Valley or San Francisco, one of the most expensive areas of the United States. Another explanation is based on the transparency of wages in the industry. Accordingly, although you earn $ 150,000 a year, you are not right when someone is $ 300 or $ 400,000 at a not much higher level. Among the conclusions of the research are that: - The top five companies in which most employees consider to be insufficiently paid before 1998. - Netflix has the largest number of employees who said they were considered enough, 81%. - Facebook has the highest percentage of employees who think they are overly paid, almost 14%.

In this situation, 60% of the surveyed technology sector (out of a total of 6,000 respondents) said they felt insufficiently paid.  Such a mood is despite the average starting salary of a "programmer" in the United States at $ 110,000 a year, making them the top 5% of the country's best -paid professions.  One of the explanations for this mass disappointment in the midst of such a well -paid sector is that most of these employees live in the Silicon Valley or San Francisco, one of the most expensive areas of the United States.  Another explanation is based on the transparency of salaries in the industry.Accordingly, although you earn $ 150,000 a year, you are not right when someone is $ 300 or $ 400,000 at a not much higher level.  Among the conclusions of the research are that:  - The top five companies in which the largest number of employees consider to be insufficiently paid are founded before 1998.  - Netflix has the largest number of employees who said they were considered to be paid enough, 81%.  - Facebook has the highest percentage of employees who think they are overly paid, almost 14%.

translation: 75/1994-0-0 75/1994-0-0 1. The initiative to evaluate the constitutionality of a) Articles 277, 278, 394, 395 and 396 of the Law on Obligations and b) regulate tension interest rates on January 1, 1988, adopted by the Supreme Court of the Republic of Macedonia on October 12, 1989. 2. The Constitutional Court of the Republic of Macedonia Dusko Cangov from Skopje was initiated with a request for evaluation of the constitutionality of the acts marked under a) and b) in point 1 of this Decision, because the provisions of the law were mismatched; They did not foresee the material damage of the creditor to comply with the inflation flows in the economy and prescribed when the conforming method should not be applied when calculating the dazzling interest, which was not in accordance with the Constitution of the Republic of Macedonia. 3. In accordance with Article 110 of the Constitution, the Constitutional Court of the Republic of Macedonia decides on the consent of the laws with the Constitution and the consent of other regulations with the Constitution and the laws. Given that the initiative requires evaluating the mutual consent of the provisions of Articles 277 and 278 of the marked law in accordance with the above provision of the Ustas, the Court assessed that the request comes out of the domain of this court's jurisdiction. Also, regarding the allegations in the initiative that the formulation of Articles 394, 395 and 396 of the law did not care for the country's inflationary situation, the Court ruled that it was not opportunier to engage in such a assessment because it was a matter of the legislature of a country at the given moment. As for the question, whether the provision of Article 394 of the Law, which obliges the debtor when his obligation paraments a certain amount of money, to pay the number of cash units in which the obligation states, it was to provide an additional provision by which the number The monetary units would be determined or harmonized with inflation, the court ruled that the initiative does not require the constitutionality of the law because it contains a provision that does not agree with the Constitution, but because , for which according to Article 110 of the Constitution of the Republic of Macedonia, the initiative rejected it as incompetent for decision -making. 4. In connection with the assessment of the constitutionality of the conclusions of the Supreme Court of the Republic of Macedonia, the Court has ruled that they are a kind of internal act - Guidelines according to which the courts should be adhered. New rights and obligations, but only refer how the lower courts should act, in order to provide the judicial practice, ie that they are in the function of securing unity in the application of laws. 5. On the basis of the stated, the court ruled as in point 1 of this decision. 6. This decision was adopted by the Court by the President of the Court Dr. Jovan Proevski and Judges Bahri Isjami, Dr. Nikola Krleski, Olga Lazova, Dr. Stojman Mihajlovski, Dr. Milan Nedkov, Besim Selimi, D- Josif Talevski and Dr. Todor Junov.U.no.75/94

translation: Public procurement announcement No. 11226/2020 A more detailed description of the subject of the public procurement contract: Developing complete project documentation for a design project, a basic project with all stages, projects for dislocation of existing underground installations and geomechanical investigative works for facility UP N9, Senjak 4 in Stip, with P+3 with social housing. Project documentation should be based on the extract of the DUP, the project program signed by the client, the elaborate for the numerical data, the elaborate on geomechanical investigations, the law on spatial and urban planning and its bylaws, the law on building and its bylaws, the law, the law, the law. For housing, the Rulebook on Standards and Norms for Designing Buildings, the Rulebook on Energy Characteristics of Buildings, the Rulebook on Project Contents, Project Marking, Project Certificate legislation related to the subject of procurement. The enforcement agent should also develop a program for geomechanical investigative work with elaborate and audit of the elaborate from an authorized organization. Procurement also includes the provision of approvals from competent institutions for underground installation projects and submitting the necessary documentation to a subject that performs scientific research - a scientific institute specializing in the field of buildings from seismic impacts on providing a positive opinion on the projected degree of mechanical resistance , stability and seismic protection of the building. Rational modern and sound solutions should be applied when preparing the project documentation.

translation: Thursday, January 21, 2010 18:21 Oliver Arsovski 0 Comments A place where we will really feel nature, where we will find tranquility and peace, a place where we can really enjoy the beautiful sights it offers. It is precisely the place are the beautiful grandmother's waterfalls, which we believe few of us know and exist. After the survey questioned: Did you know that there are waterfalls in Kratovo?, Few Kratovo responded affirmatively, while most answers were negative, ie most of the Kratovo population was not informed about the waterfalls, which by the way are not far away in the mountains, but Only 5-10 minutes walking from your home. Inspired by their beauty, the Aberzija team set out to explore them and present them to the Kratovo public. Of the most waterfalls we discovered on the territory of our municipality, in the first issue we will present the beauties of the Babarina River waterfalls. If there were organized access to them, but also their promotion, we believe they would be a real attraction for domestic and foreign tourists and would become an attractive place to visit.

translation: The color of the bedroom causes thickness? That the color of the room affects the obesity has revealed scientists from London. This disappointing conclusion will not appeal to people who want white. If your bedroom is too lit, with white sids and furniture in the same color, you can face a sleep cycle disruption that leads to weight gain. According to a study by English scientists investigating this topic, women who are overnight in white are overweight and a tendency for night snacks. Researchers attribute this trend to biorhythm disorder due to poor lighting. White shows and the abundance of artificial light can change mood, physical strength and even the process of digestion in humans. Also, lovers of white beds are often on a diet and have food addiction. So, if you recognize yourself in this article, it's time to choose another color for your bedroom sides.

translation: Tagged with the new indiegogo campaign is really interesting because for donated $ 125, donors will get their own brick in the museum, with 3 lines each of them with 20 characters. For $ 250, donors will receive twice as much brick with 5 rows of text, and you can put the company logo on the same brick. The campaign and a set of 4x4 bricks that would cover a 40x40cm area together. The biggest donor is a prize of $ 1 million, ie the entire wall bronze statue or anything. If $ 125 is too much the project you can help with "buying" a T -shirt for $ 24. The first donors will get the best places on the walls, and as time goes on, positions will be available in more clear places. The project has already collected enough supporters- as many as 1,836 people wanting to see their message on the wall, but more importantly they want to see the museum. Over $ 300,000 has been raised and 41 days left before the closing of the crawling campaign. The funds from this campaign are intended for the reconstruction of the museum's roof.

translation: High Frame Rate 01.12.2013 HFR 3D "Hobbit: Unexpected Travel" was shown in 2012 in most China around the world in a cinema format known as the HFR 3D (High Frame Rate 3D). In December 2013, Hobbit comes to us: Smug's devastation ", the second part of the Hobbit trilogy, which will be shown in the Cineplexx cinema in the HFR 3D and in digital format that will allow viewers to enjoy these different options. As the cinema has already discovered, the HFR 3D is a technological step forward in the cinema experience. The innovative format offers 48 images per second (FPS), which is more than standard, but which the human eye can register. It is twice the standard format with 24 images per second used when filming most of the films you have the opportunity to watch in theaters. We hope you enjoy the HFR 3D format, which you can watch for the first time in Macedonia, only in the Cineplexx cinema. HFR 3D the most common questions and answers What is HFR 3D? The number of images (frame) that the projector displays in one second. The current standard is 24 pictures per second. The HFR 3D is a 48 -second format, which is twice as much recorded and displayed images. HFR technology works according to a completely new camera handling procedure. Because of this movements in the film look more realistic. The sensational cinema experience is guaranteed in 3D films, as the background is brilliantly embroidery, and thus the 3D effect is further increased. Is HFR only available in 3D format? Yes. The HFR version of the movie "Hobbit: Smug's Wilderness" is only available as a 3D format. Do I have a choice? Yes. The film will be released and shown in different formats. Cineplexx in Skopje will also be available in digital format. Are special 3D glasses needed? The glasses you get in the cinema for 3D projections are also used for HFR 3D projections. Company follows no

translation: You often wear headphones on your ears? - You should read this by doctors revealing the incredible consequences of frequent headset wearing. The new episode of the show "Doctors" talked about blacks. It is nothing new, nor alarming, but in this case it is black in a place where they would never think they would appear. That is, doctors suggest that it is quite normal and there is a great opportunity to appear blacks in the ears, as the outer part of the ears that is visible has many sebaceous glands, as we have on the nose or chin. Of course, the likelihood of blacks on your nose or chin is greater, but there is a great opportunity that they can attack your ears as well. In particular, this can happen if you often wear headphones in your ears or if you do not maintain them regularly. In addition, doctors say that if you notice this, you must not solve the case yourself, but to go to a dermatologist. Otherwise, those blacks could also clog the ear canal. How to avoid such a scenario? First of all, regularly clean your ears. Earsteps won't help you, as it only pushes the dirt more. Also, regularly clean your headphones and reduce their use.

translation: Want to be happier? Reduce the chaos in your life, whether you have problems at work, in relationship or friendships, or have too many commitments, stress occupies much of your life. Although we can hope for the best, that it will simply disappear from our lives, we still have to do something. These are small habits that we can incorporate into our daily lives, which will help us get rid of chaos and stress in our lives. Make a schedule you don't have to sit down and make big schedules, but simply think about how long each of the tasks and responsibilities you have during the day. That way, you will help yourself be more organized, but also more aware of how much time you need for different things, whether you want or do not want to do them. Get rid of the chaos in your home Instead of collecting things you will never need, take a day to get rid of old items, clothes and other things you don't need. That way, you will create more space, and you will have the opportunity to organize that part of the home that creates nervousness. Do not rush too much do not think that things are going overnight. Go step by step for every job you plan to do and don't get too burdened if things don't go as you imagined. Let them go on their course and relax. Make a plan when to see with friends no matter how busy you are, find time for your friends. Do not replace the real connection with social networks with the justification that you are too busy with different responsibilities. Cook together, go to the cinema, go for exercise, meet for a drink. Listen and allow them to do the same. Spend time in nature much of the nervousness and headaches occur as we spend too much time inside, indoors stuck with technology. Go for a walk during the break, find time to sit on a bench in the park after work. It does not have to be complex and long, it is enough to break out the mind in nature. Do not forget the dream do not delay going to sleep. Dedicate a great deal of effort to go to bed at a time that you answer and sleep for 8 hours at night. Do not find reasons to delay the dream and stay late. Develop a relaxation routine Take time or school to create a habit that helps you relax. It can be a book, film, series. Find something that will help you recharge your batteries and prepare you for tomorrow's stressful day. Similar content

translation: 5. "The Elder and the Sea" - The Old Man and the Sea) The book "The Elder and the Sea" is largely credited with the Nobel Prize for Literature that Hemingway received in 1954. It's a seemingly simple story about an old fisherman trying to catch a big Marlin fish. However, this work proves the fact that Hemingway is an expert on pure and clear writing, without unnecessary words. Although realistic, the story introduces readers into a situation that they will never meet in real life. The "quiet American" is a direct criticism of the nonsense of war. Green received inspiration from the period he spent in French Indochina as a military correspondent. The book clearly shows that Green wrote about a place and problem that had a significant impact on it. This work is a kind of spy novel with a very great depth. 7. "Pearl" - The Pearl Classic "Pearl" is an adaptation of a Mexican folk story for a young man who finds a big and beautiful pearl and hopes to sell him for a good price to pay the doctor and to help his sick child. However, the pearl extracts the most glorious and most important side of the people who come in contact with it. It's a short but inspiring reading. "Slaughterhouse Pet" may seem to you as one of the longer novels on this list, but thanks to aliens, time travel, World War II history and personal anecdotes, you will not even notice that so much time has been since reading the most famous work of Vonnegate. The book is based on the time the writer has spent as a soldier in Dresden during World War II and contains so many different elements that it cannot strictly determine its belonging to a genre. Perhaps the most appropriate name for this work is a historical science fiction, but you will have to read it yourself to decide. Go to the next page and find out what the last classics you need to read ...

translation: MOI appeals to citizens The Ministry of Interior announces that in accordance with the provisions of Article 86 of the Law on Weapons ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Macedonia" No. 7/05, 47/06, 42/07, 86/08, 72/10, 158 /11, 119/13, 164/13, 152/15, 193/15 and 55/16), the deadline for replacement of permits and weapons carrying, powers of weapons and permits issued in accordance with the law For the procurement, possession and carrying of weapons ("Official Gazette of SRM" No. 25/72, 30/72, 18/76, 26/76, 15/83, 51/88 and "Official Gazette of the Republic of Macedonia" No. 26/ 93 and 49/2003), expires on 12.04.2017. Until the deadline, citizens and legal entities with weapons with old permits are obliged to apply for their replacement. The request should be submitted to the Ministry of Interior, the Civil Affairs Department, the Department of Weapons, Explosive and Dangerous Materials, Security Agencies and Detective Activity, Department of Weapons, Explosive and Dangerous Services According to a place of residence of the natural person, ie seat to the legal entity.

translation: Abuse of multiple click titles is unprofessionalism date and time of publication: 30.10.2019, 16:42 pm Date of Review: 31.10.2019 Review: Fatlume Dervishi In the celebration of the month of fight against breast cancer, in an organized activity, Mayor In Tetovo, Teuta Arifi, he was present in the role of a panelist. It is known to the public that Arifi has personally cope with the disease a few years ago, undergoing treatment. During that time it was partially withdrawn from politics, and later, after full recovery, returned actively. At the event she tells her story and the author of the text quotes: Ten years ago I managed to do two surgeries, in fact, while I was pregnant, after those two operations to give birth to a child, then go to therapy, to lose my hair to again Grow, and then win twice in the elections in the municipality of Tetovo, and, in the end, to deal with the problems that are not simple, writes in the text we are considering, without putting quotes to determine the part of the quote. In fact, these are the introductory words of the text and only according to the meaning or somewhere near the end of the text, you realize that it is a quote. But as can be seen clearly, Arifi does not talk about the political aspect of winning the local election race. The text does not have the appropriate structure of one news in terms of how the title of the text is placed, and according to other elements. The title outside the context is quickly understood that the title is not related to the rest of the text and, although it promises the reader a certain clarification on another topic, completely puts it out of the context. Obviously, the author estimated that such a title could cause greater interest and attract more clicks than a title that would clarify that Arifi speaks from a politician's position of his battle with breast cancer, not mayor's position, about the mechanisms of winning political battle in both terms. Manipulation techniques ignore basic data just to achieve its goal and attract attention, but without merit. This makes the text unprofessional. Objectively, the author had to follow Arifi's statement in the context and thus present it in the title. Or, this title would only be appropriate if the author were analyzing Arifi's position on mobilization and the way she won the two terms as a mayor, without incorporating the fight with breast cancer, because these two things are not connected at all. For readers, such a title would attract everyone's attention because it was built for that purpose. But when the text fails to deliver what is promised, that article must be taken with a lot of reserves and with a critical eye. The reader should know that without a clear structure with the main "source" in the news, with sources and facts, the news is incomplete and unprofessional. Share this:

In fact, these are the introductory words of the text and only according to the meaning or somewhere near the end of the text, you realize that it is a quote.But as can be seen clearly, Arifi does not talk about the political aspect of winning the local election race.The text does not have the appropriate structure of one news in terms of how the title of the text is placed, and according to other elements.  The title outside the context  It is quickly understood that the title is not related to the rest of the text and, although it promises the reader a certain clarification on another topic, completely puts it out of the context.  Obviously, the author estimated that such a title could cause greater interest and attract more clicks than a title that would clarify that Arifi speaks from a politician's position of his battle with breast cancer, not mayor's position, about the mechanisms of winning politicalbattle in both terms.  Manipulation techniques  The author ignores the basic data only to achieve his goal and draw attention, but without merit.This makes the text unprofessional.Objectively, the author had to follow Arifi's statement in the context and thus present it in the title.  Or, this title would only be appropriate if the author were analyzing Arifi's position on mobilization and the way she won the two terms as a mayor, without incorporating the fight with breast cancer, because these twothings are not connected at all.  For readers  Such a title would attract everyone's attention because it was built for that purpose.But when the text fails to deliver what is promised, that article must be taken with a lot of reserves and with a critical eye.The reader should know that without a clear structure with the main "source" in the news, with sources and facts, the news is incomplete and unprofessional. translation: Promoting economic relations on Macedonia - Croatia 14 Jul2009 This was concluded at last night's meeting of Croatian Prime Minister Jadranka Kosor with Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, who is on an official visit to Croatia, Kosor's office said. In an open and friendly conversation, it has been reiterated that Croatia and Macedonia have developed bilateral relations, which want to develop further in economic terms, Kosor and Ivanov said in a statement that the economies of the two countries are well -linked and that in Croatia and Macedonia has traditionally been of great interest to the products of the other country. The Croatian Prime Minister expressed support for Macedonia on the road to the European Union (EU), noting that the congestion in the Croatian negotiation process with the Union has a negative effect on other Southeast European countries.
translation (annotation, run 2): Promoting the economic relations on Macedonia - Croatia  14 Jul2009  This was concluded at last night's meeting of Croatian Prime Minister Jadranka Kosor with Macedonian President Gjorge Ivanov, who is on an official visit to Croatia, Kosor's office said.  In an open and friendly conversation, it has been confirmed that Croatia and Macedonia have developed bilateral relations, which want to develop further in economic terms, the statement said.  Kosor and Ivanov stressed that the economies of the two countries are well connected and that in Croatia and Macedonia there is traditionally great interest in the products of the other country.  The Croatian Prime Minister expressed support for Macedonia on the road to the European Union (EU), noting that the congestion in the Croatian negotiation process with the Union has a negative effect on other Southeast European countries.

translation: Which zodiac signs will hit the pink full moon The full moon in Arpil is one of the most evolving of the year. In 2018 the pink moon falls to 29 and 30 to 16 degrees in Scorpio. The full moon time does not prompt change, and when it is in the sign of transforming scorpion, then we do not inspire to make radical changes in our lives. The full moon in April is often referred to as the pink moon, because it is considered a carrier of female happiness and the one that raises spring happiness. Scorpio is death, rebirth and unconditional love. The surface is egoistic, but it is actually full of love. Scorpio energy can make significant changes where they are needed. Therefore, this moment with the full moon can be a powerful moment in the lives of individuals. In those moments, be aware of what you feel and thoughts. This will be a deep review, so you will need to withdraw a little and protect yourself from the world. Now you have a great chance to remove what you have prevented from being who you really are. The full moon in Scorpio will hit the most born in Sagittarius, Gemini, Aquarius, Scorpio and Leo.

translation: Application of the Day - Wazere will reveal top locations Wazere is a new iOS application that will best serve tourists and those who want to visit an interesting location. The best way to find out about a particular place is to see the experiences of people who have already been there, so as soon as you get closer you can see all the posted pictures of Wazere. Also, you will be able to participate in setting pictures for a particular location, for example for your favorite beach, nightclub, quality restaurant and any entertainment facility and place. Wazere is a really fun application and you can immediately download it for iOS from the App Store.

translation: Promotion of "Wave" by Doles Atanasova-Lori will be addressed by Jane Shalovski and Biljana Stojanovska, reviewer of the book, and the verses will be read by Anna Golejska Dzikova, Snezana Stojcevska, Andrei al-Assadi. The promotion music is by Goran Atanasov, and the video is the work of Gala Atanasova. Dolores Atanasova-Lori (DA Lori) was born on 26.10.1974 in Germany. He spends his early childhood in Germany and then moves with his family to Ohrid, where he spends the rest of his childhood and high school days, until he leaves for English and literature studies in 1993. DA Lori today works as a professor of English in Skopje. DA Lori's poetry is also published in the monograph of "Astal Projections", as well as in the oldest Macedonian magazine for literature, culture and art, "Modernity". She has won the International Antevo Word Award, which was first awarded in 2017 as part of the Italian poetry event "Angelo La Vecija". So far her poetry has been translated into German, English, Serbian and Spanish. The author of the cover design is Iliana Petrusevska. The book is part of Galikul's annual program and is supported by the Ministry of Culture in the publishing program and manifestations for 2020.
translation (annotation, run 2): Promotion of "Will Catch Wave" by Doles Atanasova-Lori  The promotion will be spoken by Jane Shalovski and Biljana Stojanovska, reviewer of the book, and the verses will be read by Anna Golejska Dzikova, Snezana Stojcevska, Andrei al-Assadi and Josip Kocev.The promotion music is by Goran Atanasov, and the video is the work of Gala Atanasova.  Dolores Atanasova-Lori (DA Lori) was born on 26.10.1974 in Germany.He spends his early childhood in Germany and then moves with his family to Ohrid, where he spends the rest of his childhood and high school days, until he leaves for English and literature studies in 1993.DALori today works as a professor of English in Skopje.DA Lori's poetry is also published in the monograph of "Astal Projections", as well as in the oldest Macedonian magazine for literature, culture and art, "Modernity".She has won the International Antevo Word Award, which was first awarded in 2017 as part of the Italian poetry event "Angelo La Vecija".So far her poetry has been translated into German, English, Serbian and Spanish.  The author of the cover design is Iliana Petrusevska.The book is part of Galikul's annual program and is supported by the Ministry of Culture in the publishing program and manifestations for 2020.

translation: Decision on the purchase of own shares of Komercijalna Banka Thursday, 17 April 2003 1. The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje at its regular session held on 16.04.2003, confirmed the proposed decision of the Bank's Board of Directors for the use and deployment of the profit. period of 01.01-31.12.2002 and also accepted the proposed dividend calendar. 2. The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje, at its session held on 16.04.2003, decided to approve the purchase of own shares. The basic provisions of the decision are: -The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje approves a purchase of up to 5,000 own ordinary shares in total nominal value of 25,000,000.00 denars; -The bank will carry out the purchase of own shares from the part of the profit for 2002 deployed for redemption of own shares in the amount of 10,000,000.00 denars; -The not the value of the own shares that the bank can redeem is 1.24% of the nominal value of the bank's share capital; -The bake of own actions will be carried out by 16.04.2004 at the latest; -The highest price for buying own shares is set at 2,000.00 denars for an ordinary share, and the highest price is set at 5,000.00 denars for an ordinary share.
translation (annotation, run 2): Decision on redemption of own shares of Komercijalna Banka  Thursday, 17 April 2003  1. The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje at its regular session held on 16.04.2003, confirmed the proposed decision of the Bank's Management Board for the use and deployment of the profit for a period of 01.01-31.12.2002 and also accepted the proposed dividendcalendar.2. The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje, at its session held on 16.04.2003, decided to approve the purchase of own shares.The basic provisions of the decision are: -The Assembly of Komercijalna Banka AD Skopje approves a purchase of up to 5,000 own ordinary shares in total nominal value of 25,000,000.00 denars;-The bank will carry out the purchase of own shares from the part of the profit for 2002 deployed for redemption of own shares in the amount of 10,000,000.00 denars;-The not the value of the own shares that the bank can redeem is 1.24% of the nominal value of the bank's share capital;-The process of own actions will be carried out by 16.04.2004 at the latest;-The highest price for buying own shares is set at 2,000.00 denars for an ordinary share, and the highest price is set at 5,000.00 denars for an ordinary share.

translation: Saint Saint Spiridon the miracle -worker Holy Spiridon is useful and necessary from a very poor but multi -family family of Cyprus. He married in his early youth and God himself blessed him with many children. After the death of his wife, he surrendered to the service of God. For the sake of his own mildly, he was elected epison in the city of Trimifun. And as a way, he did not say the way of living, laboring all the person alone, and by working and working. With God, he was given many wonders: He went on to the crime, he had shaken the one, he had crucified as many MRT, he had a king of king, and he had a king of king, He was in the future and in the secret of the heart of the heart, He used to do so true, etc. His holy and welcome relics were kept in Cyprus to the infestation of the Arabs in the seventh century, when they were transferred to Constantinople, from where they were transferred to the Balkan countries before the fall of the city, and in the end, about 1460 transferred to the Corfu by the monk Caloheretis. The inhabitants of this island are considered by St. Spiridon for his heavenly patron and representative before God, because of the many miracles this great Father has performed for them.

translation: Cook the potatoes, peel and cut into thin rings. Boil the purified hake for 15 minutes in salted water over moderate heat. The cooked bones are cleaned and undressed, then cut into smaller pieces. Add the chopped garlic, parsley, rosemary, salt, pepper and mix the resulting mass. Add oil to the baking pan, then in layers of potatoes, spicy hake and potatoes, until the ingredients run out. Sprinkle each layer of potatoes with a little milk. The back layer should be potato, which is poured again with oil, then bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes at 180 ÃäC.

text: Commodore C64                             Commodore USA je zaƒçel s prodajo svojega najnovej≈°ega raƒçunalnika z oznako C64.                             Ne, brez skrbi! Niste se vrnili v avgust 1982, ko se je rodil slavni predhodnik dana≈°njega modela. Dana≈°nje podjetje Commodore, ki nima praktiƒçno niƒç skupnega z nekdaj slavnim podjetjem (razen odkupljenih pravic za uporabo imena), je predstavilo nov C64, ki je na videz res skoraj identiƒçen ikoni iz osemdesetih let prej≈°njega stoletja, a se v drobovju nahaja klasiƒçen PC.                             Gre za torej nekak≈°en Keyboard PC, raƒçunalnik v tipkovnici, ki temelji na procesorju Intel Atom 525, nabori Nvidia Ion2, 4 GB RAM, 1 TB diskovja, DVD ali Blu-ray zapisovalnikom,, dvema izhodoma DVI in izhodom HDMI, ≈°estimi vhodi USB, vmesniki Wi-Fi in bluetooth ter bralci ≈°estih tipov kartic. Svetlobno leto daleƒç od prvotnega C64, ki je imel procesor MOS 6150, 64 KB RAM in 20 KB ROM, namesto diska pa drag kasetofon ali pa ≈°e dra≈æjo disketno enoto.                             Nekaj pridiha preteklosti pa novi C64 vendarle ponuja. Uporabniki se lahko ob zagonu namesto operacijskega sistema (Windows, Linux) odloƒçijo, da za≈æenejo neposredno emulator starega C64 in na njem preizkusijo svoje znanje Basica ali pa raƒçunalni≈°kih iger iz ƒçasov, ko se je osebno raƒçunalni≈°tvo ≈°ele zaƒçelo. Tak raƒçunalnik, ki verno opona≈°a vzornika, celo z nenavadno postavljenimi funkcijskimi tipkami vred, je ≈æe mogoƒçe naroƒçiti za 595 do 895 dolarjev, odvisno od konfiguracije.                             Commodore pa je hkrati obudil ≈°e nekaj slavnih imen. Raƒçunalnika VIC Pro in VIC Slim prav tako vraƒçata spomin na slavni VIC-20, vendar gre tokrat za oblikovno drugaƒçne raƒçunalnike Keyboard PC, s podobnimi lastnostmi kot zgoraj omenjeni C64. V naƒçrtih pa imajo tudi tri nove Amige, ki pa bodo v drobovju tokrat vendarle vsebovale PC arhitekturo.
translation: The Commodore C64 Commodore USA started selling its latest C64 computer. No, no worries! You did not return to August 1982, when the famous predecessor of today's model was born. Today's commodore company, which has virtually nothing in common with the formerly famous company (except for the purchased rights for use of the name), has introduced a new C64, which is seemingly almost identical to the icon from the 1980s, but is a classic PC in the gut. It is therefore a kind of keyboard PC, a computer in a keyboard based on Intel Atom 525 processor, Nvidia Ion2, 4GB RAM, 1 TB disk, DVD or Blu Wi-Fi and Bluetooth interfaces and six card types. Light year far from the original C64, which had the MOS 6150, 64 KB RAM and 20 KB ROM, and instead of the disc, expensive cassetophone or an even more expensive floppy unit. However, some C64 flair is offered by the new C64. Users can decide when starting a operating system (Windows, Linux) to start an old C64 direct emulator and test their bass skills or computer games from times when personal computer science has just begun. Such a computer that faithfully imitates the role model, even with unusually positioned function keys, can already be ordered for $ 595 to $ 895, depending on the configuration. At the same time, Commodore has revived some famous names. The Vic Pro and Vic Slim computer also return the memory of the famous VIC-20, but this time it is a different Keyboard PC computers, with similar features to the C64 mentioned above. The plans also have three new amigs, which will still contain PC architecture in the offices.

It is therefore a kind of keyboard PC, a computer in a keyboard based on Intel Atom 525 processor, Nvidia Ion2, 4GB RAM, 1 TB disk, DVD or BluWi-Fi and Bluetooth interfaces and six card types.Light year far from the original C64, which had the MOS 6150, 64 KB RAM and 20 KB ROM, and instead of the disc, expensive cassetophone or an even more expensive floppy unit.  However, some C64 flair is offered by the new C64.Users can decide when starting a operating system (Windows, Linux) to start an old C64 direct emulator and test their bass skills or computer games from times when personal computer science has just begun.Such a computer that faithfully imitates the role model, even with unusually positioned function keys, can already be ordered for $ 595 to $ 895, depending on the configuration.  At the same time, Commodore has revived some famous names.The Vic Pro and Vic Slim computer also return the memory of the famous VIC-20, but this time it is a different Keyboard PC computers, with similar features to the C64 mentioned above.The plans also have three new amigs, which will still contain PC architecture in the offices.

text: JEDRO: Verjetnost obstoja terjatve se presoja po materialnopravnih kriterijih (npr. zakon, pogodba itd.) in na verjetnost terjatve ne morejo vplivati ev. procesni ugovori glede obstoja procesnih predpostavk, npr. ugovor prepozno vlo≈æene to≈æbe (prekluzija).                             OBRAZLO≈ΩITEV: Z izpodbijanim sklepom je sodi≈°ƒçe ugovor to≈æenih strank zavrnilo. Proti tak≈°nemu sklepu se je prito≈æila to≈æena stranka iz vseh prito≈æbenih razlogov. Zatrjuje, da niso bili podani pogoji za zaƒçasno odredbo, prizna, da je to≈æeƒça stranka pridobila pravico do sklenitve pogodbe, ker je pravoƒçasno sprejela ponudbo. To≈æba pa je bila vlo≈æena po izteku 60 dnevnega roka. Gre za prekluzivni rok, ki je iztekel 21.4.2008, to≈æba pa je bila vlo≈æena dne 29.4.2008. S prekluzijo je prenehala terjatev. Ni podana nevarnost za realizacijo terjatve, saj kakr≈°nakoli prodaja podle≈æe pravilom Zakona o kmetijskih zemlji≈°ƒçih, zato ni mo≈æna prodaja pod roko. Predlaga ugoditev prito≈æbi. To≈æeƒça stranka v odgovoru na prito≈æbo predlaga potrditev sklepa. Prito≈æba ni utemeljena. Sodi≈°ƒçe je pravilno in zanesljivo ugotovilo vse pogoje za izdano zaƒçasno odredbo po ƒçl. 272 Zakona o izvr≈°bi in zavarovanju. Obstoj verjetnosti terjatve (dol≈ænost skleniti kupoprodajno pogodbo zaradi varstva predkupne pravice) ni zanikala niti to≈æena stranka, saj ni prerekala ugotovitve, da je bila ponudba za nakup zemlji≈°ƒça podana pravoƒçasno. Seveda pa ni mogoƒçe me≈°ati materialnih in procesnih predpostavk, kot je pravilno ugotovilo sodi≈°ƒçe prve stopnje. Glede zatrjevane prepozno vlo≈æene to≈æbe, se to≈æena stranka moti, ko zatrjuje datum vlo≈æitve 29.4.2008, saj je bila to≈æba priporoƒçeno oddana na po≈°to dne 28.4.2008. O pravoƒçasnosti to≈æbe sodi≈°ƒçe ≈°e ni odloƒçilo, vendar eventualna prekluzija ne vpliva na verjetnost obstoja terjatve, saj ima to≈æeƒça stranka pravico do zavarovanja zahtevka, dokler sodi≈°ƒçe ne odloƒçi v glavni stvari o vseh procesnih in materialnih vpra≈°anjih. Ugotovljeno pa je bilo zanesljivo, da je terjatev nastala s pravoƒçasno ponudbo. Sodi≈°ƒçe je pravilno ugotovilo kar dva alternativna pogoja za izdajo zaƒçasne odredbe. Pravilno je ugotovljena nevarnost, da bo uveljavitev terjatve onemogoƒçena, saj sta to≈æenca kljub predkupni pravici sklenila pogodbo z M. in V. Z. Pravilna je tudi ocena sodi≈°ƒça, da to≈æeƒça stranka v primeru odsvojitve dobrovernemu nasledniku ne bi mogla uveljavljati uspe≈°no nobenega zahtevka. Sodi≈°ƒçe je ugotovilo ≈°e nadaljnji alternativni pogoj za zaƒçasno odredbo, da to≈æena stranka z njo ne bo utrpela nobenih neugodnih posledic, na drugi strani pa to≈æeƒça stranka ob eventualni prodaji nepremiƒçnine ne bi mogla uveljavljati zahtevkov proti dobrovernemu pridobitelju. Sicer pa to≈æena stranka indirektno v prito≈æbi priznava odsotnost neugodnih posledic, ko trdi, da prodaja pod roko itak ni mo≈æna. Glede na zavrnitev prito≈æbe, prito≈ænik sam trpi prito≈æbene stro≈°ke; stro≈°ki za odgovor na prito≈æbo pa niso potrebni prito≈æbeni stro≈°ki, saj odgovor ni pripomogel k bolj≈°i razjasnitvi zadeve na prito≈æbeni stopnji.                             rss
translation: Core: The likelihood of the existence of a claim is assessed by substantive criteria (eg law, contract, etc.) and the likelihood of a claim cannot be influenced by EV. Process objections regarding the existence of procedural assumptions, e.g. an objection of a late lawsuit (reinforced). Referral: By a challenged decision, the court rejected the defendant's objection. The defendant appealed against such a decision for all appeals. He claims that the conditions for a temporary injunction were not given, and acknowledges that the applicant had acquired the right to conclude the contract because it accepted the offer in a timely manner. However, the lawsuit was filed after the expiry of the 60 -day deadline. It is an extensive deadline that expired on 21.4.2008, and the lawsuit was filed on 29.4.2008. A claim ceased to be with the intention. There is no danger to the realization of the claim, since any sale subjects to the rules of the Agricultural Land Act, so it is not possible to sell under hand. Proposes to grant the appeal. The applicant proposes to confirm the decision in response to the complaint. The appeal is not justified. The court correctly and reliably identified all the conditions for a temporary order issued under Art. 272 of the Enforcement and Insurance Act. The existence of the probability of the claim (the duty to conclude a contract of sale for the protection of the pre -emptive right) did not deny the defendant either, since it did not dispute the finding that the offer for the purchase of the land was made in due time. Of course, it is not possible to mix material and procedural assumptions, as the court of first instance correctly found. Regarding the claimed lawsuit, the defendant is wrong when it claims the filing date 29.4.2008, as the lawsuit was recommended for post on 28.4.2008. The court has not yet ruled on the timeliness of the lawsuit, but the possible reinforcement does not affect the likelihood of the existence of the claim, since the applicant has the right to secure the claim until the court decides in the main things on all procedural and material issues. However, it was found to be reliable that the claim was made with a timely offer. The court correctly identified as many as two alternative conditions for the issuance of temporary injunctions. The risk of claiming the claim will be disabled correctly, since the defendants, despite the pre -emptive right, concluded a contract with M. and V. Z. It is also correct to assess the court that the applicant would not be able to claim any claim in the event of a bona -proof successor. The court also found a further alternative condition for a temporary order that the defendant would not suffer any adverse consequences with it, and on the other hand, the applicant would not be able to claim claims against the bonaery with the eventual sale of the property. In addition, the defendant indirectly acknowledges the absence of adverse consequences when it claims that it is not possible to sell. In view of the rejection of the appeal, the complainant himself suffers from appeals; However, the cost of answering the appeal does not require appeal, as the answer did not help to better clarify the case at the appeal. RSS

Vrhovno sodi≈°ƒçe lahko tako na predlog stranke kot tudi pristojnega sodi≈°ƒça doloƒçi drugo stvarno pristojno sodi≈°ƒçe, da postopa v zadevi, ƒçe je oƒçitno, da se bo tako la≈æje opravil postopek, ali ƒçe so za to drugi tehtni razlogi.(1)Med druge tehtne razloge v smislu navedenega zakonskega doloƒçila, spada tudi zahteva po objektivni nepristranskosti pristojnega sodi≈°ƒça. V predlogih predstavljene okoli≈°ƒçine nastanka od≈°kodninskega primera lahko povzroƒçijo dvom v objektivno nepristranskost predlagajoƒçega sodi≈°ƒça in je zato Vrhovno sodi≈°ƒçe doloƒçilo pristojnost drugega stvarno pristojnega sodi≈°ƒça. ---.--- Op. ≈°t. (1): 67. ƒçlen Zakona o pravdnem postopku (v nadaljevanju ZPP).
translation: Core: In proposals presented circumstances of the occurrence of compensation case, they may doubt the objective impartiality of the proposal court. Reference: 1. The competent court and the plaintiff proposed a delegation of jurisdiction because the judge of the competent court was involved in the damage event (to which the claim) was involved. Judge A. A., according to the plaintiff, allegedly caused damage to the damage. 2. The proposals are justified. 3. The Supreme Court may, at the proposal of the party and the competent court, determine the other competent court to act in the case, if it is obvious that it will be easier to carry out the proceedings, or if there are other weighty reasons. (1) among others We have a compelling reasons within the meaning of the statutory provision, as well as the request for the objective impartiality of the competent court. In the proposals presented the circumstances of the occurrence of compensation case, they may have doubts about the objective impartiality of the proposal court and therefore determined the jurisdiction of another real competent court. ------ Op. no. (1): Article 67 of the Civil Procedure Act (hereinafter ZPP).

text: Po lepi modri Donavi z Ladjo. ƒåari starih evropskih prestolnic - Dunaj, Bratislava in Budimpe≈°ta.                             1. DAN: LJUBLJANA - DUNAJ - BRATISLAVA Odhod avtobusa s parkiri≈°ƒça na Dolgem mostu ob 5. uri. Po prihodu v avstrijsko prestolnico si bomo Dunaj panoramsko ogledali. Videli bomo znamenite palaƒçe ob Ringu, se sprehodili po nekdanjem cesarskem dvorcu Hofburgu in skozi staro mestno jedro do znamenite stolnice sv. ≈†tefana. V kavarni Sacher si bomo lahko odpoƒçili ob tortici in obƒçutili pravo dunajsko gemuetlichkeit. ƒåe bo dovolj ƒçasa, bomo obiskali ≈°e slikovito ekolo≈°ko Hundertwasserjevo ulico. Popoldan se bomo vkrcali na reƒçno ladjo/katamaran in odpluli po lepi modri Donavi do Bratislave. Kratek sprehod in nastanitev v hotelu. Veƒçerja in noƒçitev.                             2. DAN: BRATISLAVA - BUDIMPE≈†TA Po zajtrku se bomo povzpeli na Bratislavski grajski griƒç. Obiskali bomo Slavin, spomenik padlih, si ogledali Michalov stolp in se sprehodili po Michalski in Venturski ulici. Ustavili se bomo pred Mozartovo palaƒço, kjer je slavni skladatelj kot otrok blestel z enim od svojih prvih koncertov. Videli bomo tudi sede≈æ Academie Istropolitane ter palaƒço rodbine Kegleviƒç, pri katerih je bil pogosto v gosteh sam Beethoven. Vstopili bomo tudi v veliƒçastno Martinovo katedralo in se od Bratislave poslovili pred zgradbo Redute. Sledila bo vo≈ænja v Budimpe≈°to. Po prihodu v mad≈æarsko prestolnico se bomo popeljali na kro≈æni ogled Budimpe≈°te, nato pa se vzpeli na Gerhardov hrib, kjer stojita Spomenik svobodi in pa trdnjava iz 19. stol. Citadela, s ƒçudovitim razgledom na mesto. Namestitev v hotelu. Po ≈æelji veƒçerja s pijaƒço v tipiƒçni mad≈æarski ƒçardi s folkloro in romsko glasbo. Noƒçitev.                             3. DAN: BUDIMPE≈†TA - TIHANY - LJUBLJANA Po zajtrku bomo raziskali zgodovinski Budim. Na Grajskem hribu stojita neorenesanƒçna grajska palaƒça in pravljiƒçna, neogotska Ribi≈°ka trdnjava s sedmimi stolpiƒçi kot simbolom sedmih mad≈æarskih plemen. Ogledali si bomo bogato Matijevo cerkev, nekaj prostega ƒçasa pa bo za sprehod po privlaƒçnem grajskem okro≈æju s slikovitimi hi≈°ami. V Pe≈°ti, ki se pona≈°a s ≈°tevilnimi mogoƒçnimi palaƒçami, muzeji, galerijami, slovitimi kavarnami, kopali≈°ƒçi in gledali≈°ƒçi, si bomo ogledali Trg herojev z visokim stebrom, na katerem stoji kip nadangela Gabrijela, prelepo Dr≈æavno opero, mogoƒçno neogotsko zgradbo Parlamenta ter baziliko sv. ≈†tefana. Poslovili se bomo od Budimpe≈°te in se za konec potovanja odpeljali ≈°e do Blatnega jezera, do polotoka Tihany, ki je najprivlaƒçnej≈°i kraj ob jezeru in zaradi svoje lepote pa tudi za≈°ƒçiteno podroƒçje. Po ogledu se bomo vrnili v Slovenijo.
translation: After a beautiful blue Danube with a boat. Charms of the old European capitals - Vienna, Bratislava and Budapest. Day 1: Ljubljana - Vienna - Bratislava Departure of the bus from the parking lot on the Long Bridge at 5am. After arriving in the Austrian capital, we will be panoramic to see Vienna. We will see the famous palaces along the ring, stroll through the former imperial mansion Hofburg and through the old town to the famous Cathedral of St. Stefan. We will be able to rest at the Sacher Caf√© and feel the real Viennese gemuetlichkeit. If there is enough time, we will visit the picturesque organic Hundertwasser Street. In the afternoon we will board a river ship/catamaran and sail through the beautiful blue Danube to Bratislava. A short walk and accommodation at the hotel. Dinner and overnight. Day 2: Bratislava - Budapest after breakfast we will climb the Bratislava Castle Hill. We will visit Slavin, a monument of the fallen, to see the Michal Tower and to stroll along Michala and Ventur Street. We will stop in front of the Mozart Palace, where the famous composer, as a child, shone with one of his first concerts. We will also see the headquarters of Academia Istropolitane and the Palace of the Keglevic family, where he was often away from Beethoven. We will also enter the magnificent Martin Cathedral and say goodbye to Bratislava in front of Redute. A ride to Budapest will follow. After arriving in the Hungarian capital, we will take a circular tour of Budapest, and then ascend to Gerhard Hill, where the monument of freedom and the 19th century fortress stands. Citadela, with a beautiful view of the city. Accommodation at the hotel. Optionally, dinner with a drink in a typical Hungarian chard with folklore and Roma music. Overnight. Day 3: Budapest - Tihany - Ljubljana after breakfast we will explore the historical Budims. On the castle hill there are a neo -Renaissance castle palace and a fairytale, neo -Gothic fishing fortress with seven towers as a symbol of seven Hungarian tribes. We will take a look at the rich church of Matthew, and some free time will be for a walk through the attractive castle district with picturesque houses. In a pedestrian, which boasts numerous mighty palaces, museums, galleries, famous cafes, baths and theaters, we will see a high -pillar heroes with a statue of Archangel Gabriel, a beautiful state opera, a mighty neo -Gothic building of Parliament and the Basilica of Sv. Stefan. We will say goodbye to Budapest and take the end of the trip to Lake Balato, to the Tihany Peninsula, which is the most attractive place by the lake and because of its beauty as well as a protected area. After the tour, we will return to Slovenia.
