text: Dvorec je morda naslednik enega od ≈°tevilnih v virih izpriƒçanih srednjeve≈°kih dvorov na ≈°ir≈°em obmoƒçju Vipave. Prviƒç je bil omenjen leta 1630 v popisu zapu≈°ƒçine Baltazarja pl. Raumsch√ºssla, gospoda na Belneku pri Moravƒçah na Gorenjskem in v Vrhpolju pri Vipavi. Zaradi lege ob vodi je dobil nem≈°ko ime Sch√∂nau, ki pomeni Lepi log. Popis njegove zapu≈°ƒçine ka≈æe, da je imela rodovina Raumsch√ºssl ≈æe leta 1571 posest v bli≈æini Vrhpolja, v vasi Dolenje na Vipavskem. Domnevno je Vrhpolje, tako kot Belnek, v lasti rodovine Raumsch√ºssl ostal ≈°e vse do druge polovice 17. stoletja. Sredi 18. stoletja sta bila dvorec in gospostvo Vrhpolje v lasti rodovine Auersperg. Z dovoljenjem Jo≈æefa Marije grofa Auersperga je bila posest leta 1770 prepisana na Franca Jo≈æefa Martinica. Po njegovi smrti sta se njegova sinova in dediƒça Jo≈æef in Alojz leta 1792 sporazumela, da jo bo prevzel starej≈°i Jo≈æef in Alojzu izplaƒçal 2.150 goldinarjev. Po Jo≈æefovi smrti leta 1823 jo je podedovala njegova hƒçi Marija, leta 1843 pa je postala lastnica posesti njena mati Marija, ki se je kot vdova ponovno poroƒçila in dobila priimek Repiƒç. Po njeni smrti je leta 1846 posest pripadala njenima mladoletnima sinovoma Francu in Jo≈æefu Repiƒçu. Ko je leta 1884 umrl Jo≈æef Repiƒç, jo je podedoval njegov sin Jo≈æef. V 20. stoletju se je posest razdrobila, grajsko stavbo pa so si delili razliƒçni lastniki. Osrednji del dvorca je sedaj zapu≈°ƒçen in prazen, ju≈æni del stranskega trakta pa za stanovanjske namene uporablja dru≈æina Marc.
translation: The mansion may be the successor to one of the many sources of medieval courts in the wider Vipava area. It was first mentioned in 1630 in the census of Balthazar's leg. Raumsch√ºssla, the Lord at Belnek near Moravce in the Gorenjska region and in Vrhpolje near Vipava. Due to its location by the water, it got the German name Sch√∂nau, which means a beautiful log. The census of his legacy shows that the Ramsch√ºssl lineage had an estate near Vrhpolje in 1571 in the village of Dolenje, Vipava. Supposedly, Vrhpolje, like Belnek, owned the Raumsch√ºssl lineage, remained until the second half of the 17th century. In the mid -18th century, the mansion and domination of Vrhpolje were owned by the Auersperg lineage. With the permission of Joseph Maria Count Auersperg, the estate was transcribed to Franz Joseph Martinica in 1770. After his death, his sons and heirs Joseph and Alojz agreed in 1792 that he would be taken over by older Joseph and paid 2,150 goldinars by Alojz. After Joseph's death in 1823, she was inherited by his daughter Mary, and in 1843 the owner of the estate became her mother Mary, who re -married as a widow and got her surname Repic. After her death, in 1846 the estate belonged to her juvenile sons Franco and Jo≈æef Repiƒç. When Joseph Repic died in 1884, her son Joseph was inherited. In the 20th century, the estate was fragmented, and the castle building was shared by various owners. The central part of the mansion is now abandoned and empty, and the southern part of the side tract is used by the Marc family for residential purposes.

text: Barbie in Ken                             Barbie in Ken                             February 14, 2006 Ujusansa Surf Klub                             Nekaj koristnih informacij, ƒçe se ≈°e vedno igra≈° s punƒçkami.Mattel Inc, najveƒçja tovarna igraƒç na svetu bo predelala znanega spremljevalca lutke Barbie. Ken bo po novem imel surferski izgled z modrimi boardshortsi in t-shirt z napisom "Beach Fun". Ken se bo tako poskusil prikupiti nazaj k Barbi, ki ga je pustila zaradi Avstralca Blaina. text: Ribiƒç                             Nad mestom se dan budi, galebi kriƒçijo, v zlatih pramenih sonca morje se blesti. Po cesti valov v pristan drsi stara barka in ribiƒç na njej utrujen je in neprespan.                             Nekoƒç na pomolu tam je deklica stala, z oƒçmi kot globoko morje in smejala se. A nekega dne od≈°la s pristana je ladja, odplulo je z njo dekle in zanj vse upanje.                             Za ribiƒça od takrat so temna vsa obzorja, le beli galebi k njemu kdaj prilete. Na licih ostajajo sledi viharjev z morja, ≈°e vedno pa v njem ≈æivi spomin na dekle.
translation: The fisherman above the city is awakening, the seagulls scream, in the golden strands the sea the sea shines. On the road of the waves, the old barge slid into the landing and the fisherman is tired and sleepless. Once upon a time, the girl stood at the pier there, with her eyes like a deep sea and laughing. But one day, the ship went from the harbor, and the girl sailed with her and all hope for him. For the fisherman since then, all the horizons have been dark, only white seagulls ever come to him. There are traces of storms from the sea on the cheeks, and still lives a memory of a girl.
translation (annotation, run 2): Fisherman  Above the city, the day awakens, the seagulls scream, in the golden strands the sea shines.On the road of the waves, the old barge slid into the landing and the fisherman is tired and sleepless.  Once upon a time, the girl stood at the pier there, with her eyes like a deep sea and laughing.But one day, the ship went from the harbor, and the girl sailed with her and all hope for him.  For the fisherman since then, all the horizons have been dark, only white seagulls ever come to him.There are traces of storms from the sea on the cheeks, and still lives a memory of a girl.

text: Biarritz, junij 1997                             Biarritz, junij 1997                             KJE? Oba kraja lezita ob Atlantskem oceanu, juzno od pristani?ƒçca Bayonne, blizu ?ppanske meje in sta najbolj znan center Francoskega in morda tudi Evropskega surfanja. Zaradi najbolj?ih poletnih valov v Evropi in zaradi vsakoletnega Surferskega festivala v Biarritzu (od okoli 15. julija do hm, traja ene 4 dni) , kjer poleg zabave, razstave srfov in ostale sare in trave ter koncerta poteka tudi tekma najboljsih surferjev longboarderjev na svetu za svetovni pokal. Poleg festivala na plazah v blizini potekajo ?e druga tekmovanja z najbolj?imi surferji na svetu (Rip Curl Pro, O‚ÄôNeill Pro, Quicksilver Pro...). Hkrati je Biarritz eno najbol mondenih turistiƒçnih mest v Franciji. Golf igri?ƒça na vsakem koraku...                             BEACHBREAK Povsod sam pesek z redkimi skalami in cermi (predvsem na Il‚ÄôBarritz ). Voda je umazana zaradi samega Atlantika in bliznega pristanisca. Valovi so tako levi kot desni, s premikajocimi se vrhovi (shifting peaks). Po luknje se gre na Les Cavaliers v Anglet in seveda v Hossegor. Pazi na zastave, ki locujejo kopalce od surferjev. Guzva je precej konstantna. Bolj samotno je zgodaj zjutraj in zvecer. Seznam vseh breakov/plaz na koledarckih, ki jih dobis po surf shopih. Svetujem plazi L‚ÄôOcean in Les Cavalliers.                             SURF SHOP(ing)? Ce bos popravljal surfe prej vprasaj za ceno. V Anglet je SurfShop kjer je bil lastnik v BIH z UNPROFOROM in zna rect zdravo in ce reces da si od tam bo se bl sekal...NOVO: tega modela ni vec, stacuna je pa prenovljena rece se ji pa Rainbow planete surf. Tam vpra≈°aj za Roberta Jayo, pa mu rece≈°, da si od Slovenija Surfing Team, pa bo padla kak≈°na debata, pa pocen popravilo dinga...                             KAM SPAT? Campov je veliko, turistov pa tudi in prav lahko ostanes za nekaj dni pred vrati. V Angletu blizu obale je Youth Hostel in surf-weirdpeople camp. Lahko pa spis na pesku na plazi. Ali na parkiriscu. Vcasih te obiscejo tudi policaji, ki jim obljubis, da se bos umaknil. Jeseni ‚Äì novembra je odprt samo en camp v blizini letalisca.                             ITD...? Nekje v okolici je tudi tovarna od Quiksilverja. Biarritz je zvecer zaspan. Med festivalom je zur na plazi, tudi zastonj koncert (Nada Surf leta‚Äô97). Zvecer se splaca it v San Seabastian. Pezete dobis ob katerikoli uri v baru na ‚Äúmeji‚Äù. Dodaten info na tabli.                             Hitri info: dalec: Lj-Biarritz 1600km break: beachbreak guzva: DA! vreme: pogoste plohe surf scena: DA! zabava: San Sebastian in Hossegor (Rock Food) bencin: tankaj v L‚ÄôEclercu ali drugem supermarketu drugo: ce igras golf ti prav tako ne bo dolgcas
translation: Biarritz, June 1997 Biarritz, June 1997 Where? Both places are located along the Atlantic Ocean, south of the harbor? ƒåca Bayonne, near? Ppan border and are the most famous center of French and perhaps European surfing. Due to the most summer waves in Europe and the annual surfing festival in Biarritz (from July 15 to HM, it lasts one 4 days), where, in addition to entertainment, exhibitions of Srfs and Other Sarahs and Grasses and the concert, the match of the best longboard surfers takes place on World Cup to the World Cup. translation: Pay attention to hidden signs that can mean heart disease! Some signs that you can have heart problems are atypical. You probably don't even associate them with him. Check out in the article which are and pay attention! The main cause of death is still cardiovascular disease. Some signs that you can have problems with this, but they are hidden, do not even associate them with your heart, but it is right to pay attention to them and know them. If you have these signs, you do not have to have a diseased heart or blood vessels, but it is right to see your doctor and see for yourself. Continuous fatigue - this is not associated with too little sleep, we are talking about extreme fatigue that drags on day by day, about fatigue that is similar to a disease. If you are free of energy, flaky, without will, get tired immediately, breathe immediately, then see a doctor. Foot swelling - If your legs, feet keep swelling, it can be a sign that your heart does not work properly so that the blood does not circulate quickly enough. Walking pain - If you feel muscle pain while walking, if you are often grabbed in sword cramps while walking, this can indicate irregularities of the arteries. Dizziness - Even a constant dizziness is a sign of a problem. It can also be associated with clogged arteries. Air Cooling - You repeatedly cool through the air, you immediately breathe, even though you are in good condition? This can be a sign of heart problems. Frequent migraines - migraines that occur very often can be a regular companion to cardiac patients. As many as 40 percent of people who have problems with the heart and blood vessels have migraines. Visit your doctor.

text: Karmen Stavec z groteskno napolnjenimi ustnicami                             Karmen si je menda na prigovarjanje svojega fanta dala napolniti svoje ustnice, ki nikoli niso bile ravno najbolj soƒçne in polne. text: So pa fuka vredno svetlolasko za najlep≈°o razgla≈°ali tudi pri FHM, CKM, Maxim in Men‚Äôs health, pa moji prijatelji z mojim fotrom vred ... V medijih smo lahko o Joanni prebrali, da je pet let ≈æivela na Poljskem, potem se je z dru≈æino preselila v ZDA, tja med jezera, v vetrovno mesto. Baje je Joanna odra≈°ƒçala v strogem katoli≈°kem domu, lepo pa se obna≈°a ≈°e v zrelih mladostni≈°kih letih ne pije, se ne drogira in niti ne mara noƒçnih zabav. Sva≈°ta?! ≈†e posebej, ker sem pa na drugem medijskem koncu zasledil, da rada igra poker. He, he, ali pa je to le slaƒçi poker?! Po pisanju slovenskih medijev, sklepam, da so Joanni v≈°eƒç mo≈°ki s humorjem (to sem jaz!), so zabavni (no, ja) in so spro≈°ƒçeni (huh, se bojim, da v njeni dru≈æbi ne bi bil spro≈°ƒçen ‚Äì sploh). Na enaa lifestylu so objavili njeno izjavo, ki naj bi bila tak≈°na: ‚ÄúSem dekle, ki so mu v≈°eƒç preproste spodnjice, in sicer majhne tangice in nedrƒçki. Ko sem imela fanta, sem spala popolnoma gola, zato seksi spodnjega perila niti ne potrebujem. ƒåe mi ga fant kupi, ga obleƒçem, ampak samo zaradi njega; mislim, da sem zgodbo glede seksi spodnjega perila ≈æe davno prerasla.‚Äù Zdaj pa dovolj pisanja, ƒças je, da objavim nekaj lepih fotk. translation: However, they were worth the blonde for the most beautiful at FHM, CKM, Maxim and Men's Health, and my friends with my Fotra ... In the media, we could read about Joanna that she had lived in Poland for five years, then she and her family. moved to the United States, there between the lakes, to a windy city. She probably grew up in a strict Catholic home, but she behaves nicely during her adolescent years, she does not drink, she does not drug or like night parties. Eater?! Especially since at the other media, I found that I liked to play poker. HE, he, or is that just worn poker?! According to the Slovenian media, I conclude that Joanni likes men with humor (this is me!), They are fun (well, yes) and are relaxed (huh, I'm afraid that I would not be relaxed in her company - at all). On Enaa Lifestyl, they published her statement, which is supposed to be like this: ‚ÄúI am a girl who likes simple underpants, namely small thongs and bras. When I had a boyfriend, I slept completely naked, so I don't even need sexy underwear. If the boy buys it, I wear it, but just because of him; I think I have grown a story about sexy underwear. ‚Äù Now enough writing, it's time to post some nice photos. Enjoy. Oh, Come to Mommy! Ful reminds me of our conscientious Katja B.! Even in another photo, though I think our kat is still more beautiful!

Zato svetujemo, da pred ponovnimi padavinami opravite ≈°kropljenje proti breskovi kodravosti s pripravki na osnovi barka kot so: Champion 50 WG (0,5 - 1% konc.), Cuprablau Z 35 WP (2 kg/ha), Cuprablau Z ultra WP (1,8 kg/ha), Cuproxat ‚Äì staro ime Kupro 190 SC (1% konc.), Biotop bakrov fungicid plus (1% konc.), Kocide 2000 (2,5 kg/ha) ali Nordox 75 WG (1,5 kg/ha).                             V primeru noƒçnih temperaturah pod 0 ¬∞C, zaradi nevarnosti nastanka o≈æigov, s ≈°kropljenjem z bakrovimi pripravki poƒçakajte do otoplitve. translation: 2. Protection of peaches and nectarines and apricots - 01.03.2016 12:30 - completed in the Celje and Carinthian regions are peaches and nectarines in the phenological phase of buds (BBCH 01 - 03). In sunny and exposed locations, buds already have open scales and are in the end of swelling of the BBCH 03. The relatively warm and rainy weather has a beneficial effect on rapid bud development and creates conditions for peach curl. Therefore, before precipitation, you are advised to sprinkle against peach curls with a barge -based preparations such as: Champion 50 WG (0.5 - 1% conc 1.8 kg/ha), cuproxat - old name Kupro 190 SC (1% conc 5 kg/ha). In the case of night temperatures below 0 ¬∞ C, due to the risk of burning, spray copper preparations wait until warming. Warm winter also results in a very early start of budding of apple and pear. In the area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe Celje region, the pears are already in the budding phase B (BBCH 51 - 52), as well as certain varieties of apple: iceviƒç B (BBCH 51 - 52), Breaburn B (BBCH 51), while varieties of Gala, Jonagold, Golden Delesa entry In the A-B budding phase (BBCH 00-51). Estar and Fuji varieties, however, are still at rest. With the spring spray of the bakers, do not rush. We will inform you of the optimum spray time.

Protection of peaches and nectarin and apricots - 01.03.2016 12:30 - Completed  In the Celje and Carinthian regions, there are peaches and nectarines in the phenological phase of buds (BBCH 01 - 03).In sunny and exposed locations, buds already have open scales and are in the end of swelling of the BBCH 03. The relatively warm and rainy weather has a beneficial effect on rapid bud development and creates conditions for peach curl.Therefore, before precipitation, you are advised to sprinkle against peach curls with a barge -based preparations such as: Champion 50 WG (0.5 - 1% conc1.8 kg/ha), cuproxat - old name Kupro 190 SC (1% conc5 kg/ha).  In the case of night temperatures below 0 ¬∞ C, due to the risk of burning, spray copper preparations wait until warming.  Warm winter also results in a very early start of budding of apple and pear.In the area of the Celje region, the pears are already in the budding phase B (BBCH 51 - 52), as well as certain varieties of apple: iceviƒç B (BBCH 51 - 52), Breaburn B (BBCH 51), while varieties of Gala, Jonagold, Golden Delesa entryIn the A-B budding phase (BBCH 00-51).Estar and Fuji varieties, however, are still at rest.  With the spring spray of the bakers, do not rush.We will inform you of the optimum spray time.

text: Poslanec SD Jan ≈†koberne in strokovni sodelavec PS SD Gorazd Prah sta na novinarski konferenci podrobneje predstavila zakonski predlog novele Zakona o spremembah in dopolnitvah zakona o proizvodnji in prometu s prepovedanimi drogami ‚Äì legalizacija konoplje v medicinske namene, ki ga je pripravila Poslanska skupina SD. Cilj zakona je odpraviti neskladje v zakonu in tako na enostaven in varen naƒçin omogoƒçiti uporabo konoplje za uƒçne, znanstveno-raziskovalne in medicinske namene ter zagotoviti ƒçimprej≈°njo dostopnost konoplje kot zdravila za bolnike ter omogoƒçiti proizvodnjo in raziskave v Sloveniji.                             Socialni demokrati smo prepriƒçani, da je sedaj pravi ƒças za ukrepanje. ƒåas, da konopljo uvrstimo v III. skupino prepovedanih drog, za katero je dovoljena medicinska uporaba. Nadzor bi v tem primeru ‚Äì kot pri ostalih zdravilih ‚Äì opravljala Javna agencija za zdravila in medicinske pripomoƒçke (JAZMP).                             ‚Äì konec prepovedi rastlinske vrste (Cannabis Sativa L.) in konvencijsko pravilna regulacija Cannabis (torej cveta, sadnih vr≈°iƒçkov, smole in ekstraktov),                             ‚Äì uvrstitev konoplje v skupino III prepovedanih drog, ki omogoƒça medicinsko uporabo,                             ‚Äì konec nerazumne omejitve gojenja konoplje samo za industrijske in prehranske namene; s tem se ‚Äì po predpisih za ostala zdravila iz prepovedanih drog ‚Äì dovoli medicinska pridelava konoplje v Sloveniji,                             ‚Äì prevzem nadzora nad konopljo s strani Javne agencije za zdravila in medicinske pripomoƒçke (JAZMP), ki naj v ≈°estih mesecih pripravi vse potrebno za zaƒçetek zakonitega gojenja konoplje v medicinske namene v Sloveniji.                             https://socialnidemokrati.si/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Jan-≈†koberne-in-Gorazd-Prah-o-konoplji.jpg 1181 2214 Denis Sarkiƒá https://socialnidemokrati.si/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/sd_logo_main-300x300.png Denis Sarkiƒá2016-09-22 13:01:582016-09-22 13:02:58V SD smo pripravili predlog zakona o rabi konoplje za uƒçne, znanstveno-raziskovalne in medicinske namene ter njeno proizvodnjo v Sloveniji
translation: SD MP Jan ≈†koberne and PS SD expert Gorazd Prah at a press conference presented in more detail the bill of amendment to the law on amendments to the Production and Transport of Drugs - the legalization of cannabis for medical purposes prepared by the SD parliamentary group. The aim of the law is to eliminate the discrepancy in the law, thus enabling the use of cannabis for teaching, scientific and medical purposes in a simple and safe way, and ensure the accessibility of cannabis as soon as possible for patients and enable production and research in Slovenia. The Social Democrats are convinced that now is the right time to take action. Time to place cannabis in III. a group of illicit drugs for which medical use is allowed. In this case, as with other medicines, control would be performed by the Public Agency for Medicinal Products and Medical Devices (JAZMP). - End of the prohibition of plant species (Cannabis sativa L.) and conventionally correct cannabis regulation (ie flower, fruit tips, resins and extracts), - ranking cannabis in a group III for illicit drugs that allows medical use, - the end of unreasonable restriction of cannabis cultivation only for the cultivation of cannabis. industrial and nutritional purposes; This - according to regulations for other drugs from illicit drugs - allows medical cannabis production in Slovenia, - taking control of cannabis by the Public Agency for Medicinal Products and Medical Devices (JAZMP), which should prepare everything necessary within six months to start legal cultivation hemp for medical purposes in Slovenia. https://socalnidemocrats.si/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/jan-skoberne-in-grazd-prah-prah-prah-prah-konoplji.jpg 1181 2214 Denis Sarkiƒá /2020/03/sd_logo_main-300x300.PNG Denis Sarkiƒá2016-09-22 13: 01: 582016-09-22 13: 02: 58V SD We drafted a bill on the use of cannabis for teaching, scientific-research and medical purposes and its production in Slovenia

The Social Democrats are convinced that now is the right time to take action.Time to place cannabis in III.a group of illicit drugs for which medical use is allowed.In this case, as with other medicines, control would be performed by the Public Agency for Medicinal Products and Medical Devices (JAZMP).  - the end of the prohibition of plant species (Cannabis sativa L.) and conventionally correct control cannabis (ie flower, fruit tips, resins and extracts),  - ranking cannabis in Group III for illicit drugs that allows medical use,  - the end of unreasonable restrictions on cannabis cultivation only for industrial and nutritional purposes;This is allowed - according to regulations for other drug medicines - the medical cannabis production in Slovenia is allowed,  - Acceptance of cannabis by the Public Agency for Medicinal Products and Medical Devices (JAZMP), which should prepare everything necessary within six months to initiate legal cannabis cultivation for medical purposes in Slovenia.  https://socalnidemocrats.si/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/jan-skoberne-in-grazd-prah-prah-prah-prah-konoplji.jpg 1181 2214 Denis Sarkiƒá/2020/03/sd_logo_main-300x300.PNG Denis Sarkiƒá2016-09-22 13: 01: 582016-09-22 13: 02: 58V SD We drafted a bill on the use of cannabis for teaching, scientific-research and medical purposes and its productionin Slovenia

text: Zdravo, prosila bi za pomoƒç pri nalogi iz nihanja: Na gladko ravno podlago postavimo kockasto telo z maso M = 1 kg. S kolik≈°no frekvenca zaniha telo, ko ga za malenkost izmaknemo iz zaƒçetne lege? Nato na telo postavimo plo≈°ƒçico z maso m = 200 g. Kolik≈°na je sedaj frekvenca nihanja? translation: Hi, I would ask for help with the oscillation task: place a cube body with a mass of M = 1 kg on a smooth flat base. At the left and right sides of the body, place light springs with coefficients K1 = 10 n/m and K2 = 20 n/m, so that both are non -rigid. How much frequency does the body swing when it is slightly avoided from the initial position? Then place a tile with mass M = 200 g on the body. What is the frequency of oscillation now? But what is the biggest break from the initial position, in which the tile will not slip off the object if the coefficient of the glue between the tile and the cube body is equal to KT = 0, 2?

text: Strani                             Jul                             26                             V vertikali je neskonƒçna moƒç, sprejetje smrti je edina moƒç tega dne, vse drugo se razblinja v noƒç. Nosi kri≈æ v sebi, ne nosi kri≈æa pred seboj. Kdor zapu≈°ƒça svet zunanjega, se mu odpira svet notranjega. Ne varaj se z odnosom pred seboj in ne odtehtavaj zunaj, kar bi moral odtehtati znotraj. Kajti hitro nastopa ƒças, ko bo≈° moral vse odtehtati znotraj. Kajti Marija, Jezus in vse vdano zapu≈°ƒça mesto mrliƒça, ki je tehtal in ti pomagal nositi smrt. Pri≈°el je ƒças notranjega, ne odpiraj oƒçi zunanjega, kajti na tisoƒçe luƒçi bo vate sijalo in te zvabljalo v zunanje tehtanje, da bi odtehtal njih smrt. Ti pa zatisni oƒçi in zaupaj v moƒç notranjega in niƒç ne bo moglo pognati mlina na veter tvoje smrti.                             Z nikomer ne more≈° veƒç tehtati odnosa zunaj, kajti vse znotraj je odprto in v neizmerno veselje ti bo vsak atom odtehtanega znotraj, kajti duh, ki je izborjen znotraj, je duh ≈æivljenja, duh, ki ni odtehtan, je duh smrti. Je bilo re≈æiserja kaj strah, ko so snemali volkove in medvede? Kako so pre≈æiveli snemanje kozorogov v gorah na 2000 m med sne≈ænimi zameti? Je kaka ≈æival pustila, da jo bo≈æajo? translation: All the secrets of wild Slovenia's Kinobalon talk with the authors of the film Divja Slovenia at Kinobalon's conversation after watching the film Divja Slovenia is nothing else hidden. Questions by the author of the film Matej Vraniƒç (director, screenwriter and director of photography) and Marjan ≈Ωiberna (co -writer), raised many secrets in the backstage of the filming of the wonderful portrait of our nature and animals. Was the director afraid of filming wolves and bears? How did they survive the shooting of Capricorns in the mountains at 2000 m during the snowstorms? Did any animal let her caress her? And what happened to the fox in the city? Why isn't the lion in the movie? If you are interested in answers to these and other questions, listen to the conversation. Photos of the new film Matej Vraniƒç (Bird Lakes) is a wonderful documentary flight through the richness of the natural environment in Slovenia. The film is given a special stamp by extremely rarely seen scenes in nature.

text: Goran Jagodnik, 33-letni krilni ko≈°arkar, eden od stebrov slovenske ƒçlanske reprezentance, ki je na lanskem evropskem prvenstvu osvojila 7. mesto in se s tem prebila v kvalifikacije za leto≈°nje olimpijske igre in na EP 2009, se je 19. januarja oƒçitno precej resno po≈°kodoval. Na gostovanju njegovega Hemofarma v ligi NLB ABA pri ≈†irokem brijegu si je namreƒç, kot vse ka≈æe pretrgal kri≈æne vezi desnega kolena.                             Goran Jagodnik, 203 cm visoki slovenski reprezentant, se je lani izkazal z igrami na evropskem prvenstvu, zelo dobro pa je v tej sezoni igral tudi v ligi NLB ABA, kjer za Hemofarm v povpreƒçju na tekmo zbral po 14,1 toƒçke in 4,5 skoka, ter v pokalu ULEB, v katerem ja za mo≈°tvo iz Vr≈°ca v povpreƒçju vsak dvoboj nanizal po 13,4 toƒçke in 4,2 skoka.                             "Vse skupaj se je zgodilo precej nedol≈æno. Pri polaganju sem z vso te≈æo sicer resda pristal na desno nogo, a ≈°ele po pristanku me je moƒçno zabolelo. Kljub vsemu bom verjetno ≈æe v torek, najkasneje pa v sredo, pri≈°el v Slovenijo in opravil dodatne preglede, med drugim tudi pri zdravniku slovenske mo≈°ke ƒçlanske reprezentance dr. Slobodanu Macuri," o nesreƒçni po≈°kodbi in naslednjih korakih pravi Goran Jagodnik, katerega okrevanje bi v primeru, da si je kolenske vezi res strgal, trajalo vsaj ≈°est mesecev. To bi pomenilo, da priljubljeni "Jagoda" za slovensko izbrano vrsto na kvalifikacijskem turnirju za preboj na olimpijske igre, ki ga bodo med 14. in 20. julijem gostile Atene, ne bi mogel nastopiti.                             In za konec tako ≈æalostno pove ≈°e: "Tako zelo si ≈æelim igrati na olimpijskih igrah, da me je novica o tem, da je po≈°kodba tako resno, dobesedno ≈°okirala. Zato ostajam optimist vse, dokler diagnoze ne bodo potrdili tudi slovenski strokovnjaki. Na morebitno operacijo namreƒç raƒçunam v domovini."
translation: Goran Jagodnik, a 33-year-old wing basketball player, one of the pillars of the Slovenian national team, who won 7th place at last year's European Championships, thus breaking into qualifying for this year's Olympic Games and at the 2009 EP, was clearly quite serious on January 19 hurt. On the roaming of his hemopharme in the NLB ABA League near the Brijeg, he seems to have broken the cross ties of the right knee. Goran Jagodnik, a 203 cm high Slovenian national team player, proved to be played at the European Championships last year, and has also played very well this season in the NLB ABA league, where on average, he collected 14.1 points and 4.5 Jumping, and in the Uleb Cup, in which, on average, each duel scored 13.4 points and 4.2 rebounds for the Vr≈°ec team. "It all happened quite innocent. Although I had all the weight on my right leg, it was only after the landing did I get sick. My knee turned outwards, and the first magnetic resonance imaging in Novi Sad shows the cruciate ligaments . Now my knee does not hurt when walking, but that does not mean that the injury is not as serious as it currently seems. Nevertheless, I will probably be on Tuesday, but at the latest on Wednesday, come to Slovenia and perform additional checks, Among other things, with the doctor of the Slovenian men's national team, Dr. Slobodan Macuri, "says Goran Jagodnik about the unfortunate injury and the next steps, whose recovery would take at least six months if his knee ligaments would be torn. This would mean that the popular "strawberry" for the Slovenian selected type in the qualifying tournament for the Olympic Games, which will be hosted by Athens between July 14 and 20, could not perform. And finally, he says so sadly, "I want to play so much at the Olympics that the news that the injury was so seriously, literally shocked. That's why I remain optimistic all the time until the diagnosis is confirmed by Slovenian experts. I am counting the surgery in my homeland. "

translation: INTRODUCTION: Finding a job is often not an easy task, but lately, this is all the more true for young job seekers and fresh graduates, who usually (yet) cannot (yet) boast a lot of work experience. This does not in any way mean that young job seekers, despite their extensive employment by companies and fierce labor market competitions, do not have the opportunity to find good employment. What is it that convinces the employer? What are the most common mistakes that can cost good jobs quickly? You will find out all this and much more in the lecture. What we will talk about. What will you find out: how to find "real" vacancies? How to write a striking and interesting motivation letter? How to write a great CV or A CV that will stand out from average? How to prepare and convince yourself of a job interview? The most common issues of employment interviews are the most common job seekers (when finding jobs, writing a motivation letter and CV, in interview, etc.). Presentation of the Mojazaposlitva.si Portal: The presentation of the lecturer: Gregor Mesariƒá has been present at the employment portal Myzaposlitv.si since its founding (since 2010), as a key to key clients. It is in contact with many domestic and foreign companies daily, which during the recession generate high profits and employ a lot. Thus, it receives a lot of useful information from employers' 'firs' information, about the labor market issues, what kind of staff will be employed in the future, and what mistakes young seekers often cost employment. In the context of lectures and workshops, he has repeatedly selflessly shared his experience and advice on how to make (new) employment as part of lectures and workshops at the Employment Service of Slovenia and Maribor. He is also active in the field of career education of young people (students, graduates), especially the first job seekers, at various career -oriented events (student arena, Jobfair, Delo seek) and individual members of the University of Ljubljana (Faculty of Economics, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Faculty of Natural Sciences and Engineering , etc.).

text: Pomembno:                             Drage abonentke in abonenti,                             zaradi aktualne razgla≈°ene epidemije bolezni Covid-19 v Sloveniji in odpovedi kulturnih dogodkov je v aktualni MAMO abonmajski sezoni ostala ≈°e ena predstava: Palmyra. Na sporedu bo predvidoma spomladi leta 2021. Veƒç informacij najdete spodaj.                             ______________________________________________                             Sezona 2019/2020 (2021) MAMO abonma (Mednarodni Abonma Mariborskih Organizacij) je paket mednarodnih uprizoritev, ki predstavljajo nove oblike performativnih praks na preseku uveljavljenih umetni≈°kih oblik. MAMO abonma je v slovenskem prostoru unikaten, saj zdru≈æuje nevladne in institucionalne mariborske producente. Cilj je obƒçinstvu ponuditi prese≈æne predstave iz mednarodnega prostora, ki se spogledujejo s sodobnim dramskim, postdramskim, plesnim, lutkovnim in eksperimentalnim izrazom. Organizatorji smo izbrali predstave, ki po ustvarjalnem izrazu presegajo meje ustaljenih form in jih prepoznavamo kot zelo pomembne na podroƒçju uprizoritvenih umetnosti.                             Aktualna MAMO sezona vsebuje ≈°est predstav. Vse predstave so poleg abonentom namenjene tudi za izven.                             ______________________________________________                             *Pri izvedbi programa upo≈°tevamo aktualne smernice in navodila v zvezi s prepreƒçevanjem ≈°irjenja bolezni Covid-19. Pridr≈æujemo si pravico do spremembe programa.*                             Predstava z imenom uniƒçenega starodavnega sirskega mesta raziskuje politike uniƒçenja in psihologijo ma≈°ƒçevanja ter nudi razmislek o Siriji, civilizaciji in razpadu odnosov.                             Delo je na prvi pogled usmerjeno v skrb za ≈æivali, v resnici pa gre za nas in na≈° obƒçutek krivde. Threnos lahko predstavlja obredno ma≈°o ob smrti ≈æivali, kot je rekvijem ob smrti ljudi.                             Duh, ki hodi je fragmentarno in avtorefleksivno delo, dru≈æinska in dru≈æbena drama upora, v katero so vtkani sestavni deli parodije, trilerja, fantastike in absurda.                             Koreografski film v ≈æivo. Posnetki roƒçne kamere, ki jo usmerjajo performerji, pred oƒçmi publike vodijo skozi bizarne paralelne svetove organskih objektov.                             Predstava Muyte Maker slavi neposlu≈°nost in raziskuje radost, ki je postavljena kot eksistencialni in fiziƒçni postulat, kot po≈æelenje in ustvarjalni potencial.                             Performans Shifting Baselines je zastavljen kot izkustveno gledali≈°ƒçe, ki publiko popelje skozi razliƒçne svetove.
translation: Important: Dear subscribers and subscribers, due to the current proclaimed epidemic of COVID-19 disease in Slovenia and the cancellation of cultural events, another performance remained in the current mother of the subscription season: Palmyra. It will be scheduled for the spring of 2021. More information can be found below. ____________________________________________________________ the 2019/2020 season (2021) Mom Abonma (International Subscription of Maribor Organizations) is a package of international performances that represent new forms of performative practices at the cross -section of established artistic forms. The subscription is unique in the Slovenian territory, as it combines non -governmental and institutional Maribor producers. The goal is to offer the audience surplus performances from the international space, flirting with contemporary dramatic, post -red, dance, puppet and experimental terms. The organizers have chosen performances that, by creative expression, exceed the boundaries of established forms and recognize them as very important in the field of performing arts. The current mother of the season contains six shows. In addition to subscribers, all performances are intended for outside. __________________________________________ *When implementing the program, we follow the current guidelines and instructions regarding the prevention of the spread of COVID-19 disease. We reserve the right to change the program. The work is at first glance aimed at taking care of animals, but in reality it is us and our sense of guilt. Throsos can represent a ritual mass at the death of animals, such as props at the death of humans. The ghost that walks is fragmentary and autoreflexive work, a family and social drama of resistance, which includes components of parody, thriller, fiction and absurd. Live choreographic film. The footage of a manual camera, directed by the performers, leads the eyes of the audience through the bizarre parallel worlds of organic objects. The Muyte Maker performance celebrations disobedience and explores the joy that is set as an existential and physical postulate, as a lust and creative potential. The Shifting Baselines performance is designed as an experiential theater that takes the audience through different worlds.
translation (annotation, run 2): IMPORTANT:  Dear subscribers and subscribers,  Due to the current proclaimed epidemic of Covid-19 disease in Slovenia and the cancellation of cultural events, another performance remained in the current mother of the subscription season: Palmyra.It will be scheduled for the spring of 2021. More information can be found below.  ____________________________________________  The 2019/2020 season (2021) Mom Abonma (International Subscription of Maribor Organizations) is a package of international performances that represent new forms of performative practices at the cross -section of established artistic forms.The subscription is unique in the Slovenian territory, as it combines non -governmental and institutional Maribor producers.The goal is to offer the audience surplus performances from the international space, flirting with contemporary dramatic, post -red, dance, puppet and experimental terms.The organizers have chosen performances that, by creative expression, exceed the boundaries of established forms and recognize them as very important in the field of performing arts.  The current mother of the season contains six shows.In addition to subscribers, all performances are intended for outside.  ____________________________________________  *When implementing the program, we follow the current guidelines and instructions regarding the prevention of the spread of COVID-19 disease.We reserve the right to change the program.*  The performance by the name of the destroyed ancient Syrian city explores the policies of destruction and psychology of revenge and provides reflection on Syria, civilization and dissolution of relationships.  The work is at first glance aimed at taking care of animals, but in reality it is us and our sense of guilt.Throsos can represent a ritual mass at the death of animals, such as props at the death of humans.  The ghost that walks is fragmentary and autoreflexive work, a family and social drama of resistance, which includes components of parody, thriller, fiction and absurd.  Live choreographic film.The footage of a manual camera, directed by the performers, leads the eyes of the audience through the bizarre parallel worlds of organic objects.  The Muyte Maker performance celebrations disobedience and explores the joy that is set as an existential and physical postulate, as a lust and creative potential.  The Shifting Baselines performance is designed as an experiential theater that takes the audience through different worlds.

text: Opis                             Indigo v prahu je prijeten naraven izdelek posebej visoke kakovosti. Ne vsebuje grobih vlaken, zato se lahko me≈°a v kremasto pasto, brez nastanka grudic. Enostavne se izpere.                             Indigo zagotavlja intenzivno temno / ƒçrno barvo, ki se ovije okoli keratina las in tako ne opravlja le funkcije barvanja, ampak ≈°ƒçiti in neguje lase.                             Opomba: Blond lasje bi morali biti dvakrat pobarvani z indigom oziroma najprej z rdeƒço kano, pred nanosom indiga, za temen rezultat. Sive lase najprej pobarvajte z rdeƒço kano, ≈°ele nato jih pobarvajte z indigom.                             Uporaba:                             Zadostno koliƒçino prahu pome≈°ajte z mrzlo/toplo vodo in pustite mirovati 10 minut preden pasto nanesete na ƒçiste suhe lase.                             Za bolj≈°i obstoj lahko izdelku dodajte majhno koliƒçino natrona ali ≈°ƒçepec soli.                             Pasto na laseh pustite delovati 1-2 ure in nato lase splahnite brez uporabe ≈°ampona.                             Po potrebi uporabite majhno koliƒçino balzama.                             Za zadnjo splahnjevanje je priporoƒçljivo kislo izpiranje z me≈°anico vode in kisa. Tako podalj≈°ate barvne rezultate.
translation: Description of Indigo powder is a pleasant natural product of particularly high quality. It does not contain coarse fibers, so it can be mixed into a creamy paste, without the formation of lumps. It is easy to rinse. Indigo provides an intense dark / black color that wraps around keratin hair and thus performs not only the coloring function but protects and nourishes the hair. Note: Blond hair should be dyed twice with indigo or first with red henna, before applying indigo, for the result. First, dye the gray hair with red henna, then dyed with indigo. Use: Mix a sufficient amount of dust with cold/warm water and leave to rest for 10 minutes before applying the paste to clean dry hair. For better existence, you can add a small amount of natron or a pinch of salt to the product. Leave the paste on your hair for 1-2 hours and then flush your hair without the use of shampoo. Use a small amount of balm as needed. For the last flushing, it is advisable to sour rinse with a mixture of water and vinegar. This extends the color results.
translation (annotation, run 2): Description  Indigo powder is a pleasant natural product of particularly high quality.It does not contain coarse fibers, so it can be mixed into a creamy paste, without the formation of lumps.It is easy to rinse.  Indigo provides an intense dark / black color that wraps around keratin hair and thus performs not only the coloring function but protects and nourishes the hair.  Note: Blond hair should be dyed twice with indigo or first with red henna, before applying indigo, for the result.First, dye the gray hair with red henna, then dyed with indigo.  Use:  Mix a sufficient amount of dust with cold/warm water and leave to rest for 10 minutes before applying the paste to clean dry hair.  For better existence, you can add a small amount of natron or a pinch of salt to the product.  Leave the paste on your hair for 1-2 hours and then flush your hair without the use of shampoo.  Use a small amount of balm as needed.  For the last flushing, it is advisable to sour rinse with a mixture of water and vinegar.This extends the color results.

text: Luskavica                             Lezije na obrazu so pogostoma rezultat raz≈°irjenja made≈æev s skalpa na ƒçelo in na u≈°esa. Kadar se pojavi psoriaza na obrazu, pomeni, da je bolezen raz≈°irjena in huda, kot v primeru eritrodermiƒçne psoriaze. Bolezen se pojavi z belkastimi lamelnimi luskami, ki so veƒç...                             Osebe s psoriazo se morajo predvsem izogibati ko≈æne suhote z obiƒçajno uporabo kreme ali mehƒçalnih in hidratantnih olj. Suha ko≈æa namreƒç pripomore k poslab≈°anju psoriaze: obstojeƒçi made≈æi te≈æijo k zdru≈æitvi in tako nastanejo veƒçji made≈æi; ƒçe se zanemarja, se splo≈°no...                             Uporabljajte spodnje perilo iz bombaza ali lanu, izogibajte se volne ali umetnih tkanin, ki bi lahko dra≈æili ko≈æo v direktnem kontaktu.                             Treba je na vsak naƒçin podƒçrtati, da je terapevtska strategija drugaƒçna glede na obseg bolezni in kje se ta pojavi in da je njen namen zmanj≈°ati vnetje in ≈°tevilo made≈æev ter prepreƒçiti, da bi ta povr≈°ina postala groba. Poleg tega mora ponovno uravnovesiti mehanizme,...                             Psoriaza se pojavi na skalpu pogostoma na osebah, ki so ≈æe prizadete od psoriasis vulgaris; redkoma je to edini predel telesa, na katerem se pojavi. Pojavi se lahko kot eritemiƒçna krona z jasnim robom, pokrita z belo-srebrnimi suhimi luskami, kjer se priƒçnejo lasje...                             Do nekaj let nazaj seje mislilo, da se ta bolezen pojavi samo na odraslih. Danes pa se opa≈æa, da psoriaza lahko prizadene tudi otroka (in celo dojenƒçka), pa ƒçeprav poredkoma. Ta bolezen se najveƒç pojavi na ko≈ænih gubah: na pregibu komolca, pod pazduho, na ko≈æi pod... text: Zavod AIPA odvetniku, omenjenem v ƒçlanku, ni nakazal odvetni≈°kega avansa, kot so to nepravilno predstavili v uredni≈°tvu, temveƒç je pri odvetniku deponiral oz. hranil denar na njegovem fiduciarnem raƒçunu. Povsem enako, kot bi ga deponiral pri notarju, na sodi≈°ƒçu ali kje drugje, kakor to dopu≈°ƒça zakonodaja. To nakazilo je bilo izvr≈°eno v avgustu 2014 kot posledica nezakonitega poskusa prevzema vodenja Zavoda AIPA s strani oseb, med katerimi so tudi take, ki so tesno povezane z drugo kolektivno organizacijo, ki vse od dodelitve dovoljenja Zavodu AIPA sku≈°a le-tega onemogoƒçiti.                             Edini razlog te hrambe na fiduciarnem raƒçunu odvetnika je bila skrb, da nezakoniti "prevzemniki" ne bi prenesli teh sredstev na raƒçune, kjer upraviƒçeni in zakoniti imetniki pravic do zbranih nadomestil ne bi veƒç mogli priti do svojega denarja. Da je bila ta poteza vodstva povsem na mestu in v celoti upraviƒçena, ka≈æejo dejanja nezakonitih prevzemnikov, ki so si protipravno prilastili vse ostalo, do ƒçesar so imeli v tistem kratkem obdobju dostop (nezakonito razpolaganje z banƒçnimi izpiski, pohi≈°tvom ter drugimi premiƒçnimi predmeti...). Prepriƒçani smo, da bi nezakonito ‚Äì tako kot vse ostalo, do ƒçesar so imeli dostop - odtujili tudi denarna sredstva.                             Sodi≈°ƒçe je kasneje pravnomoƒçno odloƒçilo, da je bilo ravnanje "prevzemnikov" nezakonito, kar potrjuje torej pravilnost takratne odloƒçitve organa upravljanja Zavoda AIPA ‚Äì Sveta zavoda, da sredstva zavaruje tako, da jih zaƒçasno prenese na fiduciarni raƒçun.                             Zato namen zaƒçasne hrambe sredstev na fiduciarnem raƒçunu seveda ni bila nekak≈°na var≈°ƒçina za morebitne postopke v primeru razre≈°itve zakonitega vodstva Zavoda AIPA, temveƒç za≈°ƒçita sredstev imetnikov pravic. To je nenazadnje zapisano tudi v izseku v ƒçlanku omenjenega zapisnika skup≈°ƒçine z dne 4.3.2015, podrobneje pa v nadaljevanju tega zapisnika, ki ga uredni≈°tvo, ≈æal, ni ≈æelelo predstaviti.                             Za prikaz nasprotnih dejstev je potrebno pojasniti tudi naravo fiduciarnega raƒçuna odvetnika: sredstva na njem niso odvetnikova (!), nanje ni moƒç seƒçi z morebitno izvr≈°bo nad odvetnikom ipd., temveƒç so sredstva na fiduciarnem raƒçunu ≈°e vedno last stranke ‚Äì odvetnik jih zanjo le hrani. Zato je seveda nepravilno govoriti o 2-milijonskem avansu odvetniku, saj ni ≈°lo za noben avans, temveƒç hrambo denarja za Zavod AIPA.
translation: The AIPA Institute did not indicate a lawyer's advance to the lawyer mentioned in the article, as incorrectly presented in the editorial board, but deposited with a lawyer. kept money on his fiduciary account. Exactly the same as it would be deposited with a notary, in court or anywhere other than legislation. This transfer was carried out in August 2014 as a result of an illegal attempt to take over the management of AIPA by persons, including those who are closely related to another collecting organization, which has been trying to disable it since the grant of the AIPA permit. The only reason for this storage in the fiduciary account of the lawyer was that illegal "acquirers" would not transfer these funds to accounts where the eligible and legal holders of rights to the collected benefits could no longer be able to get their money. That this move of the management was completely in place and fully justified is indicated by the acts of illegal transferees who unlawfully added everything else, to which they had access at that short period (illegal disposal of bank statements, furniture and other movable objects. .). We are convinced that illegally - like everything else they had access to - we would have alienated money. The court later ruled that the conduct of the "acquirers" was illegal, which confirms the correctness of the then decision of the AIPA management body - the council of the institute to protect the funds by temporarily transferring them to a fiduciary account. Therefore, the purpose of temporary storage of funds in a fiduciary account, of course, was not a security for possible procedures in the event of the legal management of the AIPA Institute, but to protect the rights of rights. Last but not least, this is also written in the section in the article of the said record of the Assembly of 4.3.2015, and in more detail in the continuation of this record, which the editorial board, unfortunately, did not want to present. In order to show opposite facts, it is also necessary to explain the nature of the fiduciary account of the lawyer: the funds on it are not a lawyer (!) . Therefore, it is, of course, incorrectly talking about a 2 million advance to a lawyer, as it was no advance advance, but a storage of money for the AIPA Institute.

The court later ruled that the conduct of the "acquirers" was illegal, which confirms the correctness of the then decision of the AIPA management body - the council of the institute to protect the funds by temporarily transferring them to a fiduciary account. In order to show opposite facts, it is also necessary to explain the nature of the fiduciary account of the lawyer: the funds on it are not a lawyer (!).Therefore, it is, of course, incorrectly talking about a 2 million advance to a lawyer, as it was no advance advance, but a storage of money for the AIPA Institute.

text: Razno                             Prva umetna trebu≈°na slinavka                             FDA odobrila uporabo prve umetne trebu≈°ne slinavke za splo≈°no uporabo pri bolnikih s sladkorno boleznijo tip 1                             Prej≈°nje zdravljenje sladkorne bolezni tipa 1 je obiƒçajno vkljuƒçevalo bolnika, ki je spremljal raven glukoze v krvi in nato roƒçno spro≈æil inzulinsko ƒçrpalko v doloƒçenih trenutkih, ko so odƒçitki previsoki. Te inzulinske ƒçrpalke se lahko spro≈æijo tudi za ivbrizgati inzulina, ko bolnik poje obrok.                             Sistemi umetne trebu≈°ne slinavke zdru≈æujejo ta dva procesa v tako imenovani sistem "zaprte zanke". Monitor glukoze je name≈°ƒçen pod bolnikovo ko≈æo, poleg inzulinske ƒçrpalke, ki omogoƒça napravi, da samostojno nadzoruje raven glukoze.                             ≈†tevilna kliniƒçna presku≈°anja so pokazala, da je ta umetna trebu≈°na slinavka zelo uspe≈°na pri vzdr≈æevanju bolnikove ravni glukoze. Odstranjevanje potrebe, da mora bolnik nenehno spremljati svoj krvni sladkor, je tudi velik plus.                             Eden izzivov, s katerimi se sooƒçajo ti sistemi, je majhna zamuda med vbrizgavanjem inzulina, ki lahko traja do dve uri, da dose≈æe najvi≈°jo raven v krvnem obtoku. Nekateri raziskovalci raziskujejo hitreje delujoƒçe vrste inzulina, vendar se je ekipa na Harvardu lotila bolj algoritmiƒçnega pristopa k tej te≈æavi.                             I.K.
translation: Miscellaneous first artificial pancreas FDA approved the use of the first artificial pancreas for general use in patients with diabetes type 1 type 1 treatment of type 1 diabetes usually included a patient accompanying blood glucose levels and then manually triggered an insulin pump at certain moments, When the readings are too high. These insulin pumps can also be triggered for insulin insulin when the patient eats a meal. Artificial pancreas systems combine these two processes into the so -called "closed loop" system. The glucose monitor is installed under the patient's skin, in addition to an insulin pump, which allows the device to control the glucose level independently. Numerous clinical trials have shown that this artificial pancreas is very successful in maintaining the patient's glucose levels. Removing the need for the patient to constantly monitor his blood sugar is also a big plus. One of the challenges facing these systems is a small delay in insulin injection, which can take up to two hours to reach the highest level in the bloodstream. Some researchers are exploring faster -functioning insulin species, but the Harvard team has undertaken a more algorithmic approach to this problem. I.K.

Artificial pancreas systems combine these two processes into the so -called "closed loop" system.The glucose monitor is installed under the patient's skin, in addition to an insulin pump, which allows the device to control the glucose level independently.  Numerous clinical trials have shown that this artificial pancreas is very successful in maintaining the patient's glucose levels.Removing the need for the patient to constantly monitor his blood sugar is also a big plus.  One of the challenges facing these systems is a small delay in insulin injection, which can take up to two hours to reach the highest level in the bloodstream.Some researchers are exploring faster -functioning insulin species, but the Harvard team has undertaken a more algorithmic approach to this problem.  I.K.

translation: In conversation with Clara Maljuga and Maja Zupanc, the Madrigalists in Ljubljana are also an opportunity to realize their members and the surroundings what they have sown and what they want. The harvests at Slovenian choirs are usually abundant: because there are allegedly so hardworking and successful anywhere else in the world ... Ljubljana Madrigalists grew up 30 years ago. They have paved an important path in the Slovenian and world choir scene: especially as an extremely musical choir, as a choir with a wide program palette, good discography and - yes, in recent years also excellent photographic documentation. Ladies and gentlemen, what the choir has been doing lately, and most of all, how to celebrate and work on, we will find out from the guests, the conductor Klara Maljuga and President Maja Zupanc. text: Organ za BPP ugotavlja, da je bila presoja ali ima prosilec v obravnavani zadevi verjetne izglede za uspeh (24. ƒçlen Zakona o brezplaƒçni pravni pomoƒçi, v nadaljevanju ZBPP), pravilna, saj je Upravno sodi≈°ƒçe RS s sodbo I U 802/2014 z dne 8. 7. 2014 to≈ænikovo to≈æbo zoper odloƒçbo Bpp 31/2014 -2 z dne 25. 3. 2014, zavrnilo. Zato je to≈ænikovo pro≈°njo v navedeni zadevi zavrnil na podlagi prvega odstavka 24. ƒçlena v zvezi z drugim odstavkom 37. ƒçlena ZBPP.
translation: The BPP Authority notes that the assessment was whether the applicant has a probable appearance for success in the present case (Article 24 of the Law on Free Legal Assistance, hereinafter referred to as ZBPP), is correct, since the Administrative Court of the Republic of Slovenia with judgment I U 802/2014 of 8 . 7. 2014 The plaintiff's lawsuit against the decision of BPP 31/2014 -2 of 25 March 2014, dismissed. The BPP Authority states the provision of Article 63 of the Administrative Dispute Act (hereinafter referred to as ZUS-1), which is quoted. He estimates that the impugned decision is based on the correct legal basis and the information stated in the reasoning and that the proceedings in the administrative dispute against the decision of the Administrative Court of Ljubljana BPP 115/2014 -2 of 19 June 2014 does not have a probable appearance for a success that must be fulfilled next to the financial condition for the successful allocation of BPP. Therefore, he rejected the plaintiff's application in that case pursuant to the first paragraph of Article 24 in connection with the second paragraph of Article 37 of the ZBPP.

translation: The core court rejects a proposal for a simplified compulsory settlement if the applicant within eight days after receiving the decision to supplement the incomplete request for confirmation of simplified compulsory settlement within eight days after receiving the decision supplementing the incomplete request. The simplified compulsory settlement procedure, which is in the phase as considered, cannot be extended in order to achieve the required consent for the adoption of a simplified compulsory settlement. 5. The Court of Appeal notes that the creditor is legitimized for appeal against the impugned decision, since his claim is stated in the updated list of claims referred to in the fourth paragraph of Article 221 d of the ZFPPIPP. Therefore, since the creditor has the position of the party in this procedure (fourth paragraph of Article 221b of the ZFPPIPP regarding Article 56 of the ZFPPIPP), it has the right to file an appeal against the impugned decision (the first paragraph of Article 126 of the ZFPPIPP). 6. The complainant claims that as a creditor he voted to confirm the compulsory settlement, as did the majority of creditors - employees and other creditors, and voted only by D. claims that this could not be a reason to reject a proposal to confirm the simplified compulsory settlement, as This prevents the continued rehabilitation of the company and increases the likelihood of a negative scenario and the consequent loss of jobs. The court of first instance, in accordance with that provision, acted and called on the proposer to supplement the proposal, and reported to the court that it could not supplement the proposal, since despite the negotiation with the bank, it failed to obtain its consent to confirm the simplified compulsory settlement.

translation: Home Heroes have a new website! The new website allows older customers to easily choose the services they need. You will also find the opinions of our clients and contractors on the website. We have also made it easier to order services through our orders. We will also publish interesting content in our news. We also updated and increased the number of our help to the elderly at home. We newly offer subsidized services at home in the municipalities of Ig, Brezovica and ≈†kofljica. For those who need extra hours or services not included in subsidized home help, we offer you a wide selection of self -paying services at home, which ensure that you can live a better quality of life in your own home. Helping to the elderly, it is better to present on the website we also offer descriptions of our services, which are transformed in such a way that, given your needs and the needs of your relatives, it will be easier to decide which services you need or want to have. For individual services at home, we have better presented the help that Hero Heroes offer you. We have described the positive effects of our services and presented what all services cover. This makes it easier to decide what works best for you. In case of questions, we are available through a contact form on our website or a free phone number, where our expert advisor, coordinator of home assistance, will answer your questions. Our website still connects people who receive home services with various proven and tested contractors. Everyone can choose their own contractor or contact us to advise him in a professional way. We also regularly update the descriptions and presentations of our contractors, as we want to provide as much information as possible for your choice of hero. The purpose of all our services is to provide you with a better quality of life at our own home, to prevent loneliness and to relieve relatives. Heroes at home provide help to the elderly and support in integrating into everyday life. We adapt the services to our customers, so we always do our best to do everything in the way you want.

S sklicevanjem na iste razloge izpodbija tudi v izreku tega sklepa drugonavedeni odlok. Po doloƒçbi drugega odstavka 162. ƒçlena ustave da lahko vsakdo pobudo za zaƒçetek postopka pred ustavnim sodi≈°ƒçem, ƒçe izka≈æe svoj pravni interes. Izkazan pravni interes pobudnika je torej z ustavo doloƒçena predpostavka za zaƒçetek postopka pred ustavnim sodi≈°ƒçem na podlagi pobude.                             Zatrjevana retroaktivnost izpodbijanih odlokov ni v vzroƒçni zvezi s prenehanjem funkcije, katere opravljanje je bilo vnaprej doloƒçeno na dobo ≈°tirih let in ki se je iztekla na dan, ugotovljen v postopku pred sodi≈°ƒçem zdru≈æenega dela. Zato pobudnica za njihovo izpodbijanje nima pravnega interesa, kakr≈°en se zahteva kot procesna predpostavka za njihovo izpodbijanje.
translation: U-I-16/93 Decree on the composition of the Executive Council of the Kamnik Municipal Assembly (Official Gazette of the RS, No. 61/92) Decree on the administrative bodies of the Kamnik Municipal Assembly (Official Gazette of the RS, No. 22/90) The Constitutional Court does not adopt the initiative and It does not initiate the procedure for assessing the constitutionality of the impugned decrees. Record phrase: 16/12-1993 The Constitutional Court at the meeting on 16/12-1993 considered the initiative of Silva Svetiƒç from Kamnik and the Constitutional Court does not adopt or initiate the proceedings for the constitutional decision on the composition of the Executive Council of the Kamnik Assembly (Official Gazette of the Republic of Slovenia (Official Gazette of the Republic of Slovenia , No. 61/92) and Decree on the Administrative Authorities of the Municipality of Kamnik (Official Gazette RS, No. 22/90). The initiator challenges the constitutionality of the Decree on the drafting of the Executive Council of the Municipality of Kamnik, because it considers that it is substantively related to the decree of the same municipality on the composition of the Executive Council of 1990, with which the secretary of the Executive Council is allegedly affected in his rights due to his retroactivity. By referring to the same reasons, he also challenges the second -preached decree. Pursuant to the provision of the second paragraph of Article 162 of the Constitution, that everyone can initiate the initiative to initiate the proceedings before the Constitutional Court if they show their legal interest. The initiator's legal interest, therefore, determined the premise for initiating the Constitutional Court on the basis of an initiative. The alleged retroactivity of the contested decrees is not in a causal relation to the termination of the function, which has been predetermined for a period of four years and which has expired on the day found in the proceedings before the court of the united work. Therefore, the initiator to challenge them does not have the legal interest as it requires as a procedural assumption for them.

The alleged retroactivity of the contested decrees is not in a causal relation to the termination of the function, which has been predetermined for a period of four years and which has expired on the day found in the proceedings before the court of the united work.Therefore, the initiator to challenge them does not have the legal interest as it requires as a procedural assumption for them.

Magic Johnson is a retired American basketball player who played in the position of organizer for Los Angeles Lakers in the NBA. After winning the US University Basketball Championships, he was selected in 1979 on the NBA League set by the Lakers. In his first professional season, he won the award for the most useful basketball player of the NBA final in the title of champion, and in the 1980s he then won four more championship titles. In 1991, he retired as a basketball player after disclosing that he was infected with HIV, but in 1992 he still played at the Olympic tournament, where he won a gold medal with the US national team, and the NBA matches of the NBA, where he won the award for the most useful basketball player games. The achievements of three times have been selected as the most useful basketball player of the regular NBA and the NBA League final, twelve times of all stars and ten times in the first or second NBA league lineup. Four times he has been the best passenger of the season and is a leader in passing through the entire career with 11.2. In 1996, he was selected from the 50 best NBA basketball players, and in 2002 he was admitted to the Basketball Temple of Fame. text: Objavljeno: 11 Okt 2010 14:49 Naslov sporoƒçila: nepremiƒçnine v hurghadi in sharm el sheikhu                             Zanima me, kak≈°na je razlika med nabavo nepremiƒçnine nas tujcev v Hurghadi oz. v Sharm el Sheikhu in sicer, kar se tiƒçe vpisa v zemlji≈°ko knjigo oz pridobitve proksija (sli≈°im, da je v Sharm el Sheikhu nekoliko drugaƒçe glede na to, da je Sharm na Arabskem polotoku, vendar ≈°e vedno v dr≈æavi Egipt). V ƒçem je razlika? Hvala za odgovore! ƒåe se vpi≈°em v zemlji≈°ko knjigo v Hurghadi, potem ne morem nepremiƒçnine prodati v 5 letih, pridobim pa lahko njihovo vizo. S proksijem sem vpisana kot lastnik, vendar pa nimam pravice do njihove vize( lahko pa nepremiƒçnino prodam). Razumem prav?                             zanimivo, da se doslej se nihce ni javil od tistih, ki tako veselo prodajajo egipcanske nepremicnine Slovencem... ja, vi samo prinesite denar in nic ne sprasujte jaz ne vem o nepremicninah nic, proksi je zame nov pojem. bom morala malo vprasat. prijateljica, ki je kupila stanovanje v Hurgadi, ima vizo za eno leto. vem le to, da na Sinaju ne mores biti lastnik zemljisca, ce si tujec. pred dvema letoma je v veljavo stopila uredba, da niti Egipcani ne morejo biti lastniki. Vse se najema za 99 let. To je en tak obrambni mehanizem, ki preprecuje, da bi Izraelci preko Anglezev vse pokupili in aneksirali Izraelu (kot so sistematsko naredili s Palestino). Jim z vojno ni uspelo, zato so Egipcani pripravljeni tudi na bolj "prefinjene" oblike okupacije. Sinajski polotok, Boba... ne arabski _________________ Ni vse zlato, kar se sveti. Ni vse dopust, kar je Sharm el-Sheik.                             boba                             Glede na to, da Arabski polotok na zahodu meji na Afriko (po enciklopediji), sem razumela, da je Sinajski polotok del Arabskega polotoka, kajti Sinaj se smatra za Azijo. Oƒçitno si Pojoƒça edina, ki ti je do klepeta z mano. Ciao! (lepo je tebi, ki si na 35 stopinjah, ti kar zavidam!)                             Jaz sem bila odsotna pa verjetno prepozno odgovarjam...ƒçeprav nevem kaj toƒçno naj odgovorim.... Uglavnem, v Hurghadi si kot tujec lahko lastnik zemlje in se vpi≈°e≈° v zemlji≈°ko knjigo kar ponavadi, po mojih info, ne delajo v veliki meri prav zaradi tega razloga, ker potem nepremiƒçnine kao ne more≈° 5 let prodat. Tudi v Sharmu se lahko vpi≈°ete v zemlji≈°ko knjigo ampak ne more≈° pa biti lastnik zemlje....dobi≈° samo pogodbo za 99 let.... lahko pa nepremƒçnino proda≈° kadarkoli....

translation: Erna Ferjaniƒç | (Photo: Jo≈æe Bartolj) Being the light of the world! 26. Art colony for Caritas at Sinji Vrh above Ajdov≈°ƒçina as every year, despite the coronavirus, artists for Caritas are held. On Monday, August 17, all invited artists gathered, creating until Friday 21 August. We also visited them with a microphone and camera. Again this year, an expert team led by Anamarija Stibilj ≈†ajn took care of the selection. The request of Caritas was kindly nodded by ten selected creators and honorary guest. The events at the blue summit were adapted to the prevention measures COVID-19. Gifts for fine art are this time for children of artists who have been left without regular income due to corona. The motto of this colony and exhibitions 2020/2021 is "... you are the light of the world ..." The director of the Diocesan Caritas Koper Jo≈æica Liƒçen, who has been the organizational soul of this project for 26 years, was impressed by the response of the participants. She also said: ‚ÄúFor 25 years, artists have donated their works and talent for others, so it is right to give them the twenty -sixth year to allocate the funds raised to the children of those creators who have a crisis of the crisis have made their family budget well. text: 5 razteznih vaj za tekaƒçe                             Poglejte kako se ustrezno raztegniti po napornem treningu.                             Saj vemo, da bi se po dolgem teku najraje sesedli na kavƒç in obsedeli, a to bi vam prej ≈°kodilo kot koristilo. Zato se po treningu raje prvo dobro raztegnite, saj boste tako poveƒçali elastiƒçnost in zmanj≈°ali mo≈ænost, da bi se poƒçutili otrdeli.                             Na kaj morate paziti, ko se raztezate? Pazite, da z raztezanjem ne boste pretiravali! Raztezanje lahko povzroƒçi manj≈°e nelagodje v mi≈°icah, a ne tudi boleƒçin. ƒåe jo zaƒçutite, je mo≈æno, da ste se po≈°kodovali. Sicer pa je dobro, da med raztezanjem tudi globoko dihate, saj ste boste tako tudi sprostili.                             Kak≈°ne vaje izvajati? Vsekakor vam med raztezanjem ne bo potrebno poskakovati, ampak bo dovolj, ƒçe boste le dobro (a previdno) raztegnili svoje telo. Da boste la≈æje zaƒçeli, pa smo izbrskali nekaj najpogostej≈°ih in tudi uƒçinkovitih vaj za to ... Stegna: Desno nogo raztegnite tako, da bo peta na tleh pred vami. Koleno leve noge upognite in z boki poƒçasi drsite navpiƒçno navzdol ter nato nazaj v prvotni polo≈æaj. Trup naj bo vseskozi vzravnan. Vajo ponovite ≈°e z drugo nogo. Meƒça: S stopali stojte na stopnici ali privzdignjeni podlagi, desno nogo potisnite nazaj tako, da bo peta visela ƒçez rob. Nato desno nogo potisnite navzdol tako, da zaƒçutite, kako se meƒçna mi≈°ica zategne. Isto ponovite ≈°e z drugo nogo. Kvadriceps: Stojte na levi nogi in desno nogo privzdignite nazaj ter z roko primite gle≈æenj ali stopalo z levo roko. Ne≈æno pritisnite stopalo proti zadnjici. Kolena naj bodo poravnana in pazite, da ne upogibate hrbta. Vajo ponovite ≈°e z drugo nogo. Zadnjiƒçne mi≈°ice: Namestite desno nogo tik nad levim kolenom in se spustite navzdol kot da bi ≈æeleli narediti poƒçep. Primite se stene ali stola, da boste la≈æje dr≈æali ravnote≈æje, nato pa ne≈æno potisnite navzdol desno koleno. Vajo ponovite ≈°e z drugo nogo. Prsi: Stojite z nogami razkoraƒçenimi v ≈°irini va≈°ih ramen. Prepletite prste skupaj za glavo nad vratom. Stisnite lopatice skupaj medtem ko s komolci silite navzven in nazaj, da razprete prsni ko≈°. Roke pa lahko nato tudi dvignete iz nad glave, kot da bi hoteli poseƒçi proti nebu, saj se bose tudi tako lahko dobro raztegnili.
translation: 5 Running exercises for runners see how to stretch properly after strenuous workout. We know that after a long run, they would prefer to collapse on the couch and obsess, but that would hurt you sooner. Therefore, after training, you prefer to stretch the first well to increase elasticity and reduce the chance of feeling hardened. What do you need to look out for when you stretch? Be careful not to overdo it! Stretching can cause minor discomfort in the muscles, but also not pain. If you feel it, it is possible that you were injured. Otherwise, it is good to breathe deeply during stretching, as you will also relax. What kind of exercises to perform? You will certainly not have to jump during stretching, but it will be enough if you only (but carefully) stretch your body. To make it easier to start, we have searched some of the most common and also effective exercises for this ... Thighs: Stretch your right leg so that the heel is on the floor in front of you. Bend your left leg knee and slowly slide your hips vertically down and then back to the original position. Keep the torso straight. Repeat the exercise with the other leg. Sword: Stand on the step or elevated base with your feet, push your right leg back so that the heel hung over the edge. Then push the right leg down by feeling how the spin muscle tightens. Repeat the same with the other leg. Quadriceps: Stand on your left leg and lift your right leg back and grasp your ankle or foot with your left hand. Press the foot gently against the buttocks. Keep your knees aligned and be careful not to bend your back. Repeat the exercise with the other leg. Back muscles: Install the right foot just above the left knee and get down as if you would like to make a start. Grasp the walls or chair to make it easier to keep balance, then gently push down your right knee. Repeat the exercise with the other leg. Breasts: Stand with your feet rubbed in the width of your shoulders. Bend your fingers together behind your head over your neck. Squeeze the blades together while forcing your elbows out and back to open your chest. You can then lift your hands from above your head, as if you wanted to reach for the sky, as barefoot can also stretch well.

text: Za≈°ƒçita oƒçi pred ble≈°ƒçanjem - za≈°ƒçitna oƒçala Bolle Safety                             9. januar 2012                             Zmanj≈°ajte stres in utrujenost va≈°ih oƒçi z zatemnjenimi in polarizacijsimi oƒçali Bolle Safety.                             UV ≈æarki lahko prodrejo prav do oƒçesne mre≈ænice in jo po≈°kodujejo. Veƒçina UV ≈æarkov se zbere na ro≈æenici, nekateri pa prehajajo skozi zenico in se absorbirajo v oƒçesni leƒçi. ≈†kodljivi vplivi UV svetlobe se akumulirajo in dolgotrajna izpostavljenost UV ≈æarkom lahko privede do sive mrene ali ko≈ænega raka na vekah.                             Gradnja v sonƒçnih zimskih dneh, delo na morju, vo≈ænja, delo na smuƒçi≈°ƒçih...so delovne okoli≈°ƒçine, kjer so za≈°ƒçitna oƒçala nepogre≈°ljivo za≈°ƒçitno sredstvo za va≈°e oƒçi. Sonƒçna svetloba je veƒçsmerna. Ko se odbije od ravne povr≈°ine (voda, cesta, vetrobransko steklo ...) se os nihanja spremeni v polarizirano svetlobo. Moƒçna svetloba nemudoma povzroƒçi neugodje in zmanj≈°a zaznavanje in kontrast. Tega ni mogoƒçe prepreƒçiti z navadnimi leƒçami. Moƒçna svetloba povzroƒçi solzenje, motnjo vida, utrujenost in dolgoroƒçno pe≈°anje vida. Polarizacijski filter, ki ga vsebujejo oƒçala POLARIZED, zadr≈æujejo kristale, ki ovirajo vodoravno polarizirano svetlobo.
translation: Eye Protection from glare - Bolle Safety Glasses on January 9, 2012 Reduce the stress and fatigue of your eyes with darkened and polarizing glasses of Bolle Safety. UV rays can penetrate the retina right and damage it. Most UV rays are collected on the cornea, and some pass through the pupil and absorb in the eye lens. The adverse effects of UV light are accumulated and prolonged exposure to UV rays can lead to gray cataract or skin cancer. Construction on sunny winter days, work at sea, ride, work on ski resorts ... are work circumstances where safety goggles are an indispensable protective for your eyes. The sunlight is multi -way. When it is reflected from the flat surface (water, road, windshield ...), the oscillation axis turns into polarized light. Strong light immediately causes discomfort and reduces perception and contrast. This cannot be prevented with ordinary lenses. Strong light causes tearing, visual impairment, fatigue and long -term vision. The polarized polarizing filter retains crystals that impede horizontally polarized light.

translation: June 2010 in Ljubljana the cultural and entertaining varied month of June awaits us in Ljubljana. From June 11 to June 27, 2010, there will be more than 60 free music, dance and theater events at Pre≈°eren Square. In the morning, puppet shows are aimed at young and big children. In the year when Ljubljana is the world capital of the book, the Kazina Dance School will stage a dance performance with a book. In the afternoon, there will be lighter dance and music points. Among other things, we will be able to have fun at the Dixieland concert, ethno music, we will also be able to listen to the Slovenian Armed Forces orchestra at a classical music concert, and dance stories come from Casina. Evenings will be aimed at top dance, theater and music events. The SNG Opera and Ballet will present to us the Swan Lake, this time as the love story of the Slovenian poet France Pre≈°eren and his Julia. The Opera from Maribor will also be hosted with the play Greek Zorba. The diverse June event in Ljubljana will be completed by a theater performance, a musical cabaret performed by the Ljubljana City Theater. Source: Visitljubljana.si, where there is also an accurate schedule of all performances

text: To, da so psi izredno soƒçutna bitja, pogosto celo bistveno bolj kot ljudje, ve marsikateri skrbnik psa. Kako brezpogojna je njihova empatija, pa dokazuje ganljiva zgodba o herojski psiƒçki iz Argentine, ki je re≈°ila ≈æivljenje zapu≈°ƒçenemu novorojenƒçku tako, da ga je vzela pod svoje okrilje. translation: The fact that dogs are extremely compassionate beings, often even more much more than humans, know many dog ‚Äã‚Äãcaretakers. How unconditional their empathy is is evidenced by the moving story of the hero puppy from Argentina, who saved the life of an abandoned newborn baby by taking it under her wing. The homeless puppy, named China, just gave birth to six of her puppies when she heard a newborn baby cry from a nearby trash, which his fourteen -year -old mother discarded. The puppy's incredible maternal instinct saved the newborn baby certain deaths. Somehow, she managed to transfer the baby to her litter without damaging him. Shortly afterwards, the baby's crying was also due to neighbors, who made sure the boy had medical care and that everything would be in the best order. For this, you can thank the dog's mother who has proven that dog love really knows no boundaries. Privacy Preferences Center

text: Vid Valiƒç: ¬ªPo predstavi se z veseljem slikam s tistimi, ki si to ≈æelijo.¬´                             146                             Zakaj se splaƒça videti predstavo Tvoj bodoƒçi biv≈°i mo≈æ? Vendar, ƒçe mi obljubite, da skupaj poi≈°ƒçemo in najdemo Perkmandeljca, potem pa z veseljem.                             Pojma nimam, kaj so to ≈°krince. A so dobre? translation: Vid Valic: "After the show, I am happy to take pictures with those who want it." 146 Why is it worth seeing your future ex -husband? I think for that because it offers a lot of fun. If you want to relax a little, think about your daily chores and problems, then stand up comedy is always one of the better choices. Have you ever been married? I've been. In the seventh grade of elementary school, I married my sympathy in nature. Basically, this was the closing event of this school in nature. At the time, quite a few couples breathed us unannounced. In fact, we never divorced, so we are still technically married. I just don't know if it would like her current partner. You had to get an experience somewhere so you could make up the show so well, right? The show not only talks about marriage, but above all about relationships, finding a relationship and what happens to you along the way. Otherwise, for things you don't know yet, you can best use your imagination and many things can fall by heart. Given that you have already played with the show in Trbovlje, how satisfied were you with the audience? It was great in Trbovlje. I had a lot of fun, as it was known that the audience came to have fun too. If people come to have fun, then it's much more fun to perform for them. How else do you know Zasavje? As a region where I like to come. Except for a few wishes for painting and autographs, I have not yet been besieged in the back. I think I should be a rock star so that this would happen to me. When you are in Zagorje, will you have any option to take pictures with you after the show, you are knocked by your sleeve? Of course. After the show, I am happy to take pictures with those who want it. Also with visitors? Haha, are you also a comedian? Of course, with anyone. I can also take a picture with a dog if he gives a paw. translation: Cop Land Freddy cops is a sheriff in Garrison, a small suburban place where New York police officers live. One of them has committed a violent crime and Freddy is investigating the case, encountering racial prejudices and conspiracy at the men's men. The good -natured Freddy Heflin (Sylvester Stallone) is a sheriff in Garrison, a small and seemingly serene suburban place in which a group of New York police officers, who has admired them all his life, lives. However, something sinister is happening behind the quiet facade of a friendly town; One of the police officers apparently committed a violent crime and Freddy is undertaking. In doing so, it encounters racial prejudices and a dangerous conspiracy in the men's men. He has to decide how he acts to preserve the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe honesty of his idols and at the same time ensure that he is satisfied with the letter of the law.
