text: Sestavine                             350 g zmrznjenih jagod (ali sve≈æih)                             1 limona                             Priprava                             Lubenico prere≈æemo na pol. ƒåe je to potrebno, ji odre≈æemo malo dna, da bo stala pri miru, a ne zare≈æemo preveƒç, da ne bo pu≈°ƒçala vsebine.                             Z zajemalko za sladoled (ali s ƒçim podobnim) jo izdolbemo in damo v blender kozarec. ƒåe imamo dober blender, lahko ko≈°ƒçice brez skrbi damo poleg, saj so zelo zdrave.                             Dodamo jagode (prihranimo kak≈°no za dekoracijo), sok limone (pazimo na ko≈°ƒçice in prihranimo rezino limone za dekoracijo) in led, ƒçe jagode niso zamrznjene ali ƒçe ≈æelimo resniƒçno leden napitek. translation: Ingredients 350 g frozen berries (or fresh) 1 lemon preparation watermelon cut in half. If necessary, cut off a little bottom to stand alone, but do not cut too much so that it does not leave content. With an ice cream scoop (or anything like), chop it and put it in a blender glass. If we have a good blender, we can give the kernels without worry, as they are very healthy. Add strawberries (save some for decoration), lemon juice (keep an eye on the pits and save a slice of lemon for decoration) and ice if the berries are not frozen or if you want a truly ice beverage. For LED, the blender must have a special function or be powerful enough. Pour the mixture into watermelon, add the straws and decorate with a slice of lemon and strawberry.

With an ice cream scoop (or anything like), chop it and put it in a blender glass.If we have a good blender, we can give the kernels without worry, as they are very healthy.  Add strawberries (save some of the decoration), lemon juice (keep an eye on the pits and save a slice of lemon for decoration) and ice if the berries are not frozen or if you want a truly ice beverage.For LED, the blender must have a special function or be powerful enough.  Pour the mixture into watermelon, add the straws and decorate with a slice of lemon and strawberry.

text: Skrivnost megalitov - patra                             Skrivnost megalitov (pesm v prozi) avtor patra Patra, tejle super pesmi bi na tvojem mestu odstranila podnaslov pesem v prozi, ker ga ne potrebuje! Smem? LP, lidija                             Zelo dobra pesem v proznem zapisu kot je avtorica zapisala, polnokrvna kot rada reƒçem za zelo dopadljivo napisano. So pa v zapisu ≈°kratki, ki bi jih bilo dobro popraviti. Nisem lovilka ≈°kratovja, ampak, nekaj sem jih nalovila:).                             V naslovu v oklepaju ne vem ali je namenoma pesm in ne pesem? in sem vtisnjena = velika zaƒçetnica In beseda pitka ne razumem najbolj, morda plitka ali pa se motim Llahko se = en l preveƒç zeledenelega jezera = zaledenelega nepredvdiljivo = nepredvidljivo                             No, kot sem zapisala, nisem lovilka ≈°kratkov, a vseeno:).                             Se strinjam, pesem, ki oƒçara, zaƒçara in te ne pusti iz svojega objema:)). Glede te pitke se mi je pa zdelo, da bo kar dr≈æalo, zato sem tudi zapisala, da se morda motim:).                             podnaslov, lidija, sploh ni bil mi≈°ljen, da bi bil objavljen;), kar se tiƒçe ≈°kratkov ima≈° v vsem popolnoma prav, moji prsti so leteƒçi, js paƒç to poƒçnem med parminutnimi pavzicami, ki mi ne dovoljujejo vƒçasih ƒçasovnega odmika in pregleda in kaj bi se opraviƒçevala, so in paƒç. in z veliko zaƒçetnico...tega je v moji poeziji veliko in je hoteno. jesih ji pravi fragmentarnost, sama pa raje reƒçem, da nekdo paƒç skozme pi≈°e in pi≈°e kot paƒç pi≈°e...tega ne morem, noƒçem spreminjati. kjer ƒçutim klopco, na njej poƒçijem...tako je z mano s pikami. vsekakor hvala za komentraje in hvala, Toma≈æ, za ƒçarnost...enako;)                             Patra, Lidija je le prilepila moj tekst o ≈°kratih pod ≈æe odprto temo. Nisi razumela glede in. Lej tale: katerem o≈æivi≈°. in sem vtisnjena. Ker je prej pika, bi verjetno morala biti velika zaƒçetnica. In kot reƒçeno, niƒç proti zaƒçetnim in, da ne bo pomote. Tvoje pisanje je odgovor Lidiji, bom paƒç drugiƒç premislila, ƒçe bom kaj podobnega pisala, ƒçe sem tako nevidna, da odgovor ni bil naslovljen name.                             ≈†kratki odpravljeni, sama sem jih prej spregledala, hvala ajdi za pozornost. Sama sem opozorila samo na odveƒçnost podnaslova. ajda, patra te gotovo ni namerno spregledala, saj je sama rekla, ima samo kak≈°no minutko za branje med odmorƒçki ;). Prestavljen post jo je zmedel, pa je najbr≈æ mislila, da sem ≈°e naprej pisala jaz. Ob ponovnem branju bo gotovo vedela. ;) Tvoj komentar sem prestavila, ker je pravilo, da se teme ne podvajajo.                             Ja, res zanimiva pesem, zgrajena na eni sami ideji: ko si tukaj (med navdihom in nenavdihom), sem jaz lahko karkoli - in nato bum - milijon nezamisljivih reƒçi, stanj, ƒçustev, dejanj, milijon ≈æivljenj, s katerimi te prekrijem, prese≈æem, pre≈æivim. Patra, ma kako zna≈° ti pripovedovat, preskakovat, preseƒçt priƒçakovano, zavit v nepriƒçakovane smeri! Bravo! In na koncu - seveda, se (znova, bli≈æje) izhodi≈°ƒçi≈°, saj si navdih sam!

text: Nordijska kombinacija                             Mladi kombinatorci so na pravi poti                             03.02.2013                             Druga tekma alpskega pokala v nordijski kombinaciji, ki je potekala v Kranju in na Pokljuki, je pripadla avstrijskim tekmovalcev, saj so slavili trojno zmago. V ciljnem fini≈°u je bil za 0,4 sekunde bolj≈°i od Philippa Orterja, tretji pa je bil David Pommer.                             Najbolj≈°e izhodi≈°ƒçe izmed Slovencev je imel na pet kilometrski teka≈°ki preizku≈°nji na Pokljuki Alja≈æ Osterc. ƒålan SSK Velenje je na premierni mednarodni tekmi sicer na teku nekoliko izgubil, tako da je zdrsnil iz 19. na 44. mesto. Na koncu je bil tako na≈° najbolj≈°i Borut Mavc, ki je na Rudnem polju napredoval za 17. mest in se na koncu razveselil 20. mesta. Luka Oblak je deseto tekmo alpskega pokala konƒçal kot 32., Alja≈æ Ogrinc je bil 38., Toma≈æ Seme 40. in Vid Vrhovnik 41.                             "S tekmami sem zadovoljen, predvsem z vƒçeraj≈°njo. Na prej≈°njih tekmah alpskega pokala, ki so bile v Planici in na Pokljuki, ter na mladinski svetovnem prvenstvu smo imeli nekoliko smole. Tako nismo naredili priƒçakovanih rezultatov. V soboto smo dokazali, da smo dobro trenirali. Fantje so odskakali bolje kot na treningih. Seveda imajo ≈°e veliko rezerv na skakalnici. Oba dneva so odtekli super. Danes smo imeli nekaj te≈æav na skakalnici. Bila je dokaj neregularna tekma, razmere so se zelo menjale. Za vse tekmovalce tako ni bilo enako. Po skokih nam ni najbolje kazalo, od njih smo priƒçakovali nekaj veƒç. ≈Ωal so tekmovalci imeli slabe pogoje in bi veƒç te≈æko iztr≈æili. Pokazali so, da smo dobro trenirali in da smo na pravi poti. Definitivno je to vzpodbuda za naprej, za trdo delo," je analizo dvodnevnega dogajanja napravil vodja mladinske ekipe nordijskih kombinatorcev An≈æe Obreza.                             An≈æe Obreza [foto: Ale≈° Gros]                             Na sobotni preizku≈°nji je na skakalnici de≈æevalo, vendar so bile razmere za vse tekmovalce konstantne. "Veter se v soboto ni obraƒçal. Na Pokljuki je bilo pa potem te≈æko. Ni bilo sicer mrzlo, vendar je pihalo in moƒçno sne≈æilo. Bila je te≈æka tekma, a so se fantje zna≈°li in vsi napredovali," je varovance pohvalil Obreza.                             Sedaj tekmovalce ƒçakajo ≈°e domaƒçe tekme in finale alpskega pokala 2. in 3. marca v francoskem Chaux Neuvu. "Na teh tekmah upamo na dobro uvrstitev. Mislim, da bomo to uspeli tudi realizirati," je dejal Obreza.                             V vmesnem obdobju pa bodo seveda ≈°e trenirali, da bodo tekmovalci odpravili napake, ki se jim ≈°e dogajajo. "Dokazali smo, da spadamo v to konkurenco in se lahko enakovredno kosamo s preostalimi. Seveda pridejo vzponi in padci, kar je za ≈°portno kariero povsem normalno. Delali bomo naprej ƒçim bolj kvalitetno in odpravljali rezerve, kar jih imamo. Prepriƒçan sem, da se bodo stvari slej ko prej obrnile ≈°e na bolje," je pogovor zakljuƒçil Obreza.
translation: The Nordic combination of young combiners are on the right track on 03.02.2013 the second Nordic Combination Alpine Cup match, which took place in Kranj and Pokljuka, belonged to the Austrian competitors as they celebrated a triple victory. The first victories in this rank was pleased by Martin Fritz, who finished third after jumping in Kranj. In the finish finish, he was 0.4 seconds better than Philipp Orter and the third was David Pommer. Alja≈æ Osterc had the best starting point of the Slovenes. A member of SSK Velenje lost a bit at the premiere international race, slipping from 19th to 44th. In the end, our best was Borut Mavc, who advanced for 17th place in Rudno Polje and eventually rejoiced in 20th place. Luka Oblak finished the tenth game of the Alpine Cup as 32nd, Alja≈æ Ogrinc was 38th, Toma≈æ Semen 40th and Vid Vrhovnik 41. " At Pokljuka, and we had a bit of pitch at the Junior World Championships. We did not do the expected results. On Saturday we proved that we trained well. The boys bounced better than in training. . We had some problems on the jump today. It was a fairly unregulated match, the situation was changing. It was not the same for all the competitors. It didn't show us the best after jumping, we expected something more. Unfortunately, the competitors had bad conditions and It would be more difficult to get rid of. They showed that we have been training well and that we are on the right track. It is definitely an encouragement for the future, for hard work, "said the leader of the Nordic Nordic Combinators Youth team, Anze Obrez, analysis. An≈æe Obreza [photo: Ale≈° Gros] At Saturday's test, it was raining on the jump, but the conditions for all competitors were constant. "The wind was not turning on Saturday. It was difficult then at Pokljuka. It was not cold, but it was blowing and snowing. It was a tough match, but the boys found themselves and everyone progressed," praised the guards. Now the contestants are waiting for home games and the Alpine Cup finals on March 2 and 3 in Chaux Neuvo French. "In these games we hope for a good ranking. I think we will be able to realize it too," Obreza said. In the interim, however, they will, of course, train that the competitors will correct the mistakes that are still happening to them. "We have proven that we are in this competition and we can handle the same with the rest. Of course, the ups and downs come, which is completely normal for a sports career. We will work forward as good as possible and eliminate the reserves we have. Things will turn even better sooner, "Obreza concluded.

text: Predstavljaj si, da...                             Precej vode je ≈æe preteklo od takrat, ko je John Lennon sanjavo prepeval o tem, kako lepo bi bilo, ƒçe bi bili ljudje drugaƒçni. To prepletanje virtualnega in snovnega dobro poznajo propagandisti. Tisti komercialni ga uporabijo za to, da nam prodajo svojo robo. Oni politiƒçne vrste pa za to, da nam slikajo lep≈°i svet, ki nam ga bodo priƒçarali v zameno za na≈°o podporo. Propagandisti toƒçno vedo , da si ƒçlovek stvar ali dejanje najprej predstavi, si ustvari umsko podobo o njej, ≈°ele potem jo sprejme ali odkloni. To je lepo povedano v zgodbi o padcu Adama in Eve: sku≈°njavec jima je najprej slikovito opisal uƒçinke prepovedanega sade≈æa. Onadva sta si zadevo predstavila, si jo ‚Äúpred-oƒçila‚Äù in ≈°ele potem segla po nesreƒçnem jabolku: ‚Äú≈Ωena je videla, da je drevo dobro za jed, mikavno za oƒçi in vredno po≈æelenja, ker daje spoznanje. Vzela je torej od njegovega sadu in jedla, dala pa je tudi mo≈æu, ki je bil z njo, in je jedel.‚Äù                             Zdaj pa zares: predstavljajte si svet, v katerem va≈°a sreƒça ni odvisna od tega, kaj bodo drugi mislili o vas, kak≈°en avto ima sosed, koliko zaslu≈æite in kaj si lahko privo≈°ƒçite. ≈Ωe res, da je tudi to pomembno, ampak sreƒçe pa kljub vsemu ne more dati. Ste zmo≈æni predstaviti si sebe, kako ste pravzaprav blagoslovljeni, ko ≈æivite bolje kot ogromna veƒçina ljudi, ko vam za razliko od milijonov ni treba trepetati za ≈æivljenje? Ste si zmo≈æni predstavljati, da so osebe, ki se vam upirajo in bi jih najraje ≈æive po≈ærli, pravzaprav ƒçisto spodobni ljudje, podobni vam in si ≈æelijo predvsem ≈æiveti v miru in slogi? Si znate predstavljati svet, v katerem so otroci, mo≈æ ali ≈æena ter stari ljudje blagoslov in ne nadloga ali stro≈°ek. Ljubezen, mir in vse drugo, po ƒçemer hrepenimo, paƒç ne rastejo na drevesu in se ne skrivajo v rudnikih. Vse to ustvarimo mi, z vsakim trenutkom, ki ga posvetimo soƒçloveku.                             ƒåe ste si vse to to zmo≈æni predstavljati, potem ste z eno nogo ≈æe vstopili v ta svet.
translation: Imagine that ... a lot of water has passed since John Lennon sang to the dream about how nice it would be if people were different. In youth and student groups, we were similarly dreamed of the Slovene version ‚ÄúWhen people would love to be brothers and sisters ..." Warm feelings did not last for long, hippies grown and mature, instead of universal harmony and justice, we observe helpless They claim increasingly rough forms of violence and inequality. Is a better world of an unattainable utopia? Is it really an insurmountable gap between dreams and reality? I stand in a row in front of the cash register to order something small for breakfast. My eyes are grazing through the soft posters, which offer idealized croissants, cappuccino and a series of other delicacies and beverages. I got involved how I had already begun to consume them. When the waiter will serve me and bite me in the croissant and heart cappuccino, I will enjoy that idealized image from the poster that has already encouraged my imagination. In my experience, the pastry and beverage are indelibly marked by the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthem that you created while waiting in line. This interplay of virtual and material is well aware of propagandists. Those commercial use it to sell us their goods. They are political kinds to paint a more beautiful world, which they will conjure up in exchange for our support. Propagandists know exactly that one can first present a thing or action, to create a mental image of it, only then does it accept or refuse it. This is beautifully said in the story of the fall of Adam and Eve: the temptation first described them the effects of the forbidden fruit. They both presented the matter, "pre-him", and then reached for an unfortunate apple: ‚ÄúThe wife saw that the tree was good for a dish, a fishing for the eyes and worthy lust because it gives realization. So she took from his fruit and ate, and she also gave her husband who was with her and ate. " Now really: imagine a world in which your happiness is not dependent on what others think of you, what kind of car the neighbor has, how much you deserve and what you can afford. It is true that this is also important, but he cannot give luck. Are you capable of presenting yourself, how blessed are you when you live better than huge most people when you don't have to tremble for life unlike millions? Are you able to imagine that the people who resist you and would prefer to devour them alive, in fact, quite decent people, similar to you and want to live in peace and style above all? You know how to imagine a world where children, husband or wife and old people are a blessing and not a nuisance or expense. Love, peace and everything else we crave, but they do not grow in a tree and do not hide in mines. We create all this, with every moment we dedicate to our fellow human beings. If you are able to imagine all this, then you have already entered this world with one foot.

translation: Can weight loss be accelerated differently except by reducing daily intake of food? The answer is, of course, that you can. One of the best ways to accelerate weight loss is aerobic workout in the morning before eating breakfast. It sounds quite cruel, but this is one of the better ways to add to the weight loss another element that will speed up the path to the desired figure. How does such morning aerobic workout affect fat loss? We usually have dinner before going to bed. Some hours earlier, but others like to increase just before they fall asleep, because they sleep better. But no matter when they ate the last meal, there is a sleep that lasts for hours. Weight loss continues during this time as the body consumes energy even when we sleep. A heartbeat, breathing, internal organs, digestion and other processes require the energy that the body uses from different sources. When we wake up in the morning, we are fasting, which means we had some shorter night fasting. We can make good use of this situation. Weight loss can be accelerated by cycling or running on an empty stomach because the body will need its own fat as energy. For example, if you ate breakfast in the morning, which would include some fat and carbohydrates, then the body would use these resources during running or cycling, which would be consumed before the activity. Thus, weight loss can continue quite intensively if we decide on such a morning exercise. It should also be noted here that moderate activity is recommended in this case, which means that cycling or running is easy and not too fast.

text: Izbrisano ƒçustvo                             Dekle Emily obi≈°ƒçe digitalizirana kopija nje iz prihodnosti, ki se trudi poiskati vse obƒçutke in spomine, ki jih je skozi ƒças izgubila. Najprej se dogajanje odvija na beli povr≈°ini, Emily in razliƒçica iz prihodnosti imata izrisane samo osnovne dele telesa. Vizualna podoba se popolnoma spremeni, ko se podata na potovanje po Emilyjem umu. Spomini in ƒçustva, po katerih potujeta, so prikazani v spranih odtenkih in abstraktnih oblikah, ki se razprostirajo po prostoru, ki spominja na vesolje. Jasna je razlika med nepravilnimi organskimi oblikami spominov in hladno natanƒçnostjo digitalne Emily, ki je v morju spominov zmedena. Vsak spomin je prikazan drugaƒçe; spomin iz otro≈°tva Hertzfeldt avtor prika≈æe s podobami kadeƒçih se dimnikov termoelektrarne, ki jih ima Emily za ¬ªzelene planote¬´, s ƒçimer se dotakne tudi tematike okoljevarstva.                             V prihodnosti so Emilyjin um prenesli v kopijo, ki ji je na las podobna, vendar malo manj ƒçlove≈°ka, bolj mehanska ‚Äì ne zna se ƒçustveno odzivati, obna≈°a se strogo uradno, govori z resnim, monotonim glasom. Kopija se v doloƒçenem trenutku spomni, da zna igrati na klavir, ko pa poskusi igrati, zaigra le nekaj nakljuƒçnih tonov. Svojo nezmo≈ænost igranja klavirja obrazlo≈æi s tem, da ga je starej≈°a verzija kopije sicer znala igrati, vendar se je s ponovnim kopiranjem sposobnost izgubila, ostal pa je le medel spomin. Tako kot spomin na koncu zbledi tudi Emilyjina kopija, s ƒçimer avtor opomni na minljivost ≈°e tako izpopolnjene tehnologije.
translation: The erased emotion of the girl Emily is visited by a digitized copy of her from the future, trying to find all the feelings and memories she has lost over time. First, the events take place on the white surface, Emily and the version from the future have only the base parts of the body. The visual image completely changes as they embark on an emily mind trip. The memories and emotions they travel through are shown in washed shades and abstract shapes that spread across a space that is reminiscent of space. Clear is the difference between irregular organic forms of memories and the cold precision of digital emily, which is confused in the sea of ‚Äã‚Äãmemories. Each memory is shown differently; Hertzfeldt's childhood memory is shown by the images of smoking chimneys of the thermal power plant that Emily has for "green plateaus", thus touching on the topic of environmentalism. In the future, Emily's mind has been transferred to a copy that is similar to her hair but a little less human, more mechanical - he cannot respond emotionally, behaves strictly officially, speaking with a serious, monotony voice. At some point, the copy remembers that he can play the piano, but when he tries to play, he plays only a few random tones. He explains his inability to play the piano by the fact that the older version of the copy knew how to play him, but by re -copying, the ability was lost, and only Medel memory remained. Like the memory, Emily's copy fades, which reminds the author of the transience of even sophisticated technology.
comment: Hard example, could be also Prose/Lyrical

text: Domel aktivno sodeloval na Konferenci najbolj≈°e prakse 2019                             Sekcija uporabnikov sistemov stalnih izbolj≈°av (SuSSI) ter soorganizatorja Grozd Pametne tovarne (gPT) in Strokovno dru≈°tvo za operativno odliƒçnost ( SDOO) so 1. in 2. oktobra na Gospodarski zbornici Slovenije organizirali konferenco DAN NAJBOLJ≈†E PRAKSE                             Konferenca je udele≈æence sooƒçila z razmi≈°ljanji in primeri s prakse, zakaj je potrebno pospe≈°iti digitalno preobrazbo v industrijskih podjetjih in kako s sistematiƒçnim nadgrajevanjem avtomatiziranega proizvodnega ekosistema v avtonomen in inteligenten ekosistem zmanj≈°ati stro≈°ke v procesih in zvi≈°ati vrednost proizvodom. translation: Domel actively participated in the Best Practice Conference 2019 Section of Users of the Systems of Permanent Improvements (Sussi) and co -organizer of the Grozd Smart Factory (GPT) and the Expert Society for Operational Excellence (SDOO) organized the Best Practice Conference Conference on 1 and 2 October at the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia at the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia has faced the participants with thinking and examples from the practice of why it is necessary to accelerate digital transformation in industrial companies and how to reduce costs in processes by systematic upgrading of automated production ecosystem into autonomous and intelligent ecosystem. In addition to other Slovenian companies, such as Talum, Kolektor, Hidria, Domel also participated in the conference. Logistics Director, dr. Matja≈æ Roblek presented Domel's experience in lecture by digital optimization of production supply in the function of providing leanness. Logistics development leader Rado Lenkic, however, has held a workshop of visualization, analysis and formation of measures for quality production logistics by VALUE Stream Mapping.
